śironnatiḥ prakartavyā lalāṭaṃ nāsikā tataḥ // 54.042cd //
vadanaṃ civukaṃ grīvā yugabhāgair bhujākṣibhiḥ / 54.043ab /
karābhyāṃ mukulīkṛtya pratimāyāḥ pramāṇataḥ // 54.043cd //
mukhaṃ prati samaḥ kāryo vistārādaṣṭamāṃśataḥ / 54.044ab /
caturmukhaṃ mayā proktaṃ trimukhañcocyate śṛṇu // 54.044cd //
karṇapādādhikāstasya lalāṭādīni nirdiśet / 54.045ab /
bhujau caturbhirbhāgaistu kartavyau paścimorjitaṃ // 54.045cd //
vistarādaṣṭamāṃśena mukhānāṃ pratinirgamaḥ / 54.046ab /
ekavaktraṃ tathā kāryaṃ pūrvasyāṃ saumyalocanaṃ // 54.046cd //
lalāṭanāsikāvaktragrīvāyāñca vivartayet / 54.047ab /
||page:156
bhujācca pañcamāṃśena bhujahīnaṃ vivartayet // 54.047cd //
vistārasya ṣaḍaṃśena mukhair nirgamanaṃ hitaṃ / 54.048ab /
sarveṣāṃ mukhaliṅgānāṃ trapuṣaṃ vātha kukkuṭaṃ // 54.048cd //
||ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye vyaktāvyaktalakṣaṇaṃ nāma catuḥpañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
||atha pañcapañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
piṇḍikālakṣaṇakathanaṃ
bhagavānuvāca
ataḥ paraṃpravakṣyāmi pratimānāntu piṇḍikām / 55.001ab /
dairghyeṇa pratimātulyā tadardhena tu vistṛtā // 55.001cd //
ucchritāyāmatordhena suvistārārdhabhāgataḥ / 55.002ab /
tṛtīyena tu vā tulyaṃ tattribhāgeṇa mekhalā // 55.002cd //
khātaṃ ca tatpramāṇaṃ tu kiñciduttarato natam / 55.003ab /
vistārasya caturthena praṇālasya vinirgamaḥ // 55.003cd //
samūlasya vistāramagre kuryāttadardhataḥ / 55.004ab /
vistārasya tṛtīyena toyamārgantu kārayet // 55.004cd //
piṇḍikārdhena vā tulyaṃ dairghyamīśasya kīrtitam / 55.005ab /
īśaṃ vā tulyadīrghañca jñātvā sūtraṃ prakalpayet // 55.005cd //
||page:157
ucchrāyaṃ pūrvavat kuryādbhāgaṣoḍaśasaṅkhyayā / 55.006ab /
adhaḥ ṣaṭkaṃ dvibhāgantu kaṇṭhaṃ kuryāttribhāgakam // 55.006cd //
śeṣāstvekaikaśaḥ kāryāḥ pratiṣṭhānirgamās tathā / 55.007ab /
paṭṭikā piṇḍikā ceyaṃ sāmānyapratimāsu ca // 55.007cd //
prāsādadvāramānena pratimādvāramucyate / 55.008ab /
gajavyālakasaṃyuktā prabhā syāt pratimāsu ca // 55.008cd //
piṇḍikāpi yathāśobhaṃ kartavyā satataṃ hareḥ / 55.009ab /
sarveṣāmeva devānāṃ śiṣṇūktaṃ mānamucyate / 55.009cd /
devīnāmapi sarvāsāṃ lakṣmyuktaṃ mānamucyate // 55.009ef //
||ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye piṇḍikālakṣaṇaṃ nāma pañcapañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ ||
||atha ṣaṭpañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
dikpālayāgakathanaṃ
bhagavānuvāca
pratiṣṭhāpañcakaṃ vakṣye pratimātmā tu pūruṣaḥ / 56.001ab /
prakṛtiḥ piṇḍikā lakṣmīḥ pratiṣṭhā yogakastayoḥ // 56.001cd //
icchāphalārthibhistasmātpratiṣṭhā kriyate naraiḥ / 56.002ab /
garbhasūtraṃ tu niḥsārya prāsādasyāgrato guruḥ // 56.002cd //
aṣṭaṣoḍaśaviṃśāntaṃ maṇḍapañcādhamādikam / 56.003ab /
snānaṃ kalaśārthañca yāgadravyārthamardhataḥ // 56.003cd //
tribhāgeṇārdhabhāgena vediṃ kuryāttu śobhanām / 56.004ab /
||page:158
kalaśair ghaṭikābhiś ca vitānādyaiś ca bhūṣayet // 56.004cd //
pañcagavyena samprokṣya sarvadravyāṇi dhārayet / 56.005ab /
alaṅkṛto gururviṣṇuṃ dhyātvātmānaṃ prapūjayet // 56.005cd //
aṅgulīyaprabhṛtibhirmūrtipān valayādibhiḥ / 56.006ab /
kuṇḍe kuṇḍe sthāpayecca mūrtipāṃstatra pāragān // 56.006cd //
catuṣkoṇe cārdhakoṇe vartule padmasannibhe / 56.007ab /
pūrvādau toraṇārthantu pippaloḍumbarau vaṭaṃ // 56.007cd //
plakṣaṃ suśobhanaṃ pūrvaṃ subhadrandakṣatoraṇaṃ / 56.008ab /
sukarma ca suhotrañca āpye saumye samucchrayam // 56.008cd //
pañcahastaṃ tu saṃsthāpya syonāpṛthvīti pūjayet / 56.009ab /
toraṇastambhamūle tu kalaśānmaṅgalāṅkurān // 56.009cd //
pradadyādupariṣṭācca kuryāccakraṃ sudarśanaṃ / 56.010ab /
pañcahastapramāṇantu dhvajaṃ kuryāddvicakṣaṇaḥ // 56.010cd //
vaipulyaṃ cāsya kurvīta ṣoḍaśāṅgulasanmitaṃ / 56.011ab /
saptahastocchritaṃ vāsya kuryāt kuṇḍaṃ surottama // 56.011cd //
aruṇogninibhaś caiva kṛṣṇaḥ śuklotha pītakaḥ / 56.012ab /
raktavarṇas tathā śvetaḥ śvetavarṇādikakramāt // 56.012cd //
kumudaḥ kumudākṣaś ca puṇḍarīkotha vāmanaḥ / 56.013ab /
śaṅkukarṇaḥ sarvanetraḥ sumukhaḥ supratiṣṭhitaḥ // 56.013cd //
pūjyā koṭiguṇair yuktāḥ pūrvādyā dhvajadevatāḥ / 56.014ab /
jalāḍhakasupūrāstu pakvavimbopamā ghaṭāḥ // 56.014cd //
kṛṣṇavarṇaḥ kramāddhvajā iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ 
||page:159
aṣṭāviṃśādhikaśataṃ kālamaṇḍanavarjitāḥ / 56.015ab /
sahiraṇyā vastrakaṇṭhāḥ sodakāstoraṇādvahiḥ // 56.015cd //
ghaṭāḥ sthāpyāś ca pūrvādau vedikāyāś ca koṇagān / 56.016ab /
caturaḥ sthāpayet kumbhānājighreti ca mantrataḥ // 56.016cd //
kumbheṣvāvāhya śakrādīn pūrvādau pūjayet kramāt / 56.017ab /
indrāgaccha devarāja vajrahasta gajasthita // 56.017cd //
pūrvadvārañca me rakṣa devaiḥ saha namostu te / 56.018ab /
trātāramindramantreṇa arcayitvā yajed budhaḥ // 56.018cd //
āgacchāgre śaktiyuta cchāgastha balasaṃyuta / 56.019ab /
rakṣāgneyīṃ diśaṃ devaiḥ pūjāṃ gṛha namostu te // 56.019cd //
agnimūrdhetimantreṇa yajedvā āgneya namaḥ / 56.020ab /
mahiṣastha yamāgaccha daṇḍahasta mahābala // 56.020cd //
rakṣa tvaṃ dakṣiṇadvāraṃ vaivasvata namostu te / 56.021ab /
vaivasvataṃ saṅgamanamityanena yajedyamaṃ // 56.021cd //
nairṛtāgaccha khaḍgāḍhya balavāhanasaṃyuta / 56.022ab /
idamarghyamidaṃ pādyaṃ rakṣa tvaṃ nairṛtīṃ diśaṃ // 56.022cd //
eṣa te nairṛte mantreṇa yajedarghyādibhir naraḥ / 56.023ab /
makarārūḍha varuṇa pāśahasta mahābala // 56.023cd //
āgaccha paścimaṃ dvāraṃ rakṣa rakṣa namostu te / 56.024ab /
uruṃ hi rājā varuṇaṃ yajedarghyādibhirguruḥ // 56.024cd //
āgaccha vāyo sabala dhvajahasta savāhana / 56.025ab /
vāyavyaṃ rakṣa devaistvaṃ samarudbhir namostu te // 56.025cd //
||page:160
vāta ity ādibhiścārvedonnamo vāyavepi vā / 56.026ab /
āgaccha soma sabalā gadāhasta savāhana // 56.026cd //
rakṣa tvamuttaradvāraṃ sakuvera namostu te / 56.027ab /
somaṃ rājānamiti vā yajetsomāya vai namaḥ // 56.027cd //
āgaccheśāna sabala śūlahasta vṛṣasthita / 56.028ab /
yajñamaṇḍapasyaiśānīṃ diśaṃ rakṣa namostu te // 56.028cd //
īśānamasyeti yajedīśānāya namopi vā / 56.029ab /
brahmannāgaccha haṃsastha sruksruvavyagrahastaka // 56.029cd //
salokordhvāṃ diśaṃ rakṣa yajñasyāja namostu te / 56.030ab /
hiraṇyagarbheti yajennamaste brahmaṇepi vā // 56.030cd //
anantāgaccha cakrāḍhya kūrmasthāhigaṇeśvara / 56.031ab /
adhodiśaṃ rakṣa rakṣa ananteśa namostu te / 56.031cd /
namostu sarpeti yajedanantāya namopi vā // 56.031ef //
||ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye dikpatiyāgo nāma ṣaṭpañcāśattamodhyāyaḥ ||
||atha saptapañcāśodhyāyaḥ
kumbhādhivāsavidhiḥ
bhagavānuvāca
bhūmeḥ parigrahaṃ kuryāt kṣipedbrīhīṃś ca sarṣapān / 57.001ab /
nārasiṃhena rakṣoghnān prokṣoghnān prokṣayet pañcagavyataḥ // 57.001cd //
bhūmiṃ ghaṭe tu sampūjya saratne sāṅgakaṃ hariṃ / 57.002ab /
astramantreṇa karakaṃ tatra cāṣṭaśataṃ yajet // 57.002cd //
acchinnadhārayā siñcan brīhīn saṃskṛtya dhārayet / 57.003ab /
||page:161
pradakṣiṇaṃ paribhrāmya kalaśaṃ vikiropari // 57.003cd //
savastre kalaśe bhūyaḥ pūjayedacyutaṃ śriyaṃ / 57.004ab /
yoge yogeti mantreṇa nyasecchayyāntu maṇḍale // 57.004cd //
kuśopari tūlikāñca śayyāyāṃ digvidikṣu ca / 57.005ab /
vidyādhipān yajedviṣṇuṃ madhughātaṃ trivikramaṃ // 57.005cd //
vāmanaṃ dikṣu vāyvādau śrīdharañca hṛṣīkapaṃ / 57.006ab /
padmanābhaṃ dāmodaramaiśānyāṃ snānamaṇḍape // 57.006cd //
abhyarcya paścādaiśānyāṃ catuṣkumbhe savedike / 57.007ab /
snānamaṇḍaṣake sarvadravyāṇyānīya nikṣipet // 57.007cd //
snānakumbheṣu kumbhāṃstāṃś caturdikṣvadhivāsayet / 57.008ab /
kalaśāḥ sthāpanīyāstu abhiṣekārthamādarāt // 57.008cd //
vaṭodumbarakāśvatthāṃś campakāśokaśrīdrumān / 57.009ab /
palāśārjunaplakṣāṃstu kadambavakulāmrakān // 57.009cd //
pallavāṃstu samānīya pūrvakumbhe vinikṣipet / 57.010ab /
padmakaṃ rocanāṃ dūrvāṃ darbhapiñjalameva ca // 57.010cd //
jātīpuṣpaṃ kundapuṣpacandanaṃ raktacandanaṃ / 57.011ab /
siddhārthaṃ tagarañcaiva taṇḍulaṃ dakṣiṇe nyaset // 57.011cd //
savarṇaṃ rajatañcaiva kūladvayamṛdantathā / 57.012ab /
nadyāḥ samudragāminyā viśeṣāt jāhnavīmṛdaṃ // 57.012cd //
gomayañca yavān śālīṃstilāṃś caivāpare nyaset / 57.013ab /
viṣṇuparṇīṃ śyāmalatāṃ bhṛṅgarājaṃ śatāvarīṃ // 57.013cd //
||page:162
sahadevāṃ mahādevīṃ balāṃ vyaghrīṃ salakṣmaṇāṃ / 57.014ab /
aiśānyāmapare kumbhe maṅgalyānviniveśayet // 57.014cd //
valmīkamṛttikāṃ saptasthānotthāmapare nyaset / 57.015ab /
jāhnavīvālukātoyaṃ vinyasedapare ghaṭe // 57.015cd //
varāhavṛṣanāgendraviṣāṇoddhṛtamṛttikāṃ / 57.016ab /
mṛttikāṃ padmamūlasya kuśasya tvapare nyaset // 57.016cd //
tīrthaparvatamṛdbhiś ca yuktamapyapare nyaset / 57.017ab /
nāgakeśarapuṣpañca kāśmīramapare nyaset // 57.017cd //
candanāgurukarpūraiḥ puṣpaṃ caivāpare nyaset / 57.018ab /
vaidūryaṃ vidrumaṃ muktāṃ sphaṭikaṃ vajrameva ca // 57.018cd //
etānyekatra nikṣipya sthāpayeddevasattama / 57.019ab /
nadīnadataḍāgānāṃ salilair aparaṃ nyaset // 57.019cd //
ekāśītipade cānyānmaṇḍape kalaśān nyaset / 57.020ab /
gandhodakādyaiḥ sampūrṇān śrīsūktenābhimantrayet // 57.020cd //
yavaṃ siddhārthakaṃ gandhaṃ kuśāgraṃ cākṣataṃ tathā / 57.021ab /
tilān phalaṃ tathā puṣpamarghyārthaṃ pūrvato nyaset // 57.021cd //
padmaṃ śyāmalatāṃ dūrvāṃ viṣṇuparṇīṃ kuśāṃstathā / 57.022ab /
pādyārthaṃ dakṣiṇe bhāge madhuparkaṃ tu dakṣiṇe // 57.022cd //
kakkolakaṃ lavaṅgañca tathā jātīphalaṃ śubhaṃ / 57.023ab /
uttare hy ācamanāya agnau dūrvākṣatānvitaṃ // 57.023cd //
pātraṃ nīrājanārthaṃ ca tathodvartanamānile / 57.024ab /
gandhapuṣpānvitaṃ pātramaiśānyāṃ pātrake nyaset // 57.024cd //
||page:163
murāmāṃsī cāmalakaṃ sahadevāṃ niśādikaṃ / 57.025ab /
ṣaṣṭidīpānnyasedaṣṭau nyasennīrājanāya ca // 57.025cd //
śaṅkhaṃ cakrañca śrīvatsaṃ kuliśaṃ paṅkajādikaṃ / 57.026ab /
hemādipātre kṛtvā tu nānāvarṇādipuṣpakaṃ // 57.026cd //
||ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye kalaśādhivāso nāma saptapañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ ||
||atha aṣṭapañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
snānādividhiḥ
bhagavānuvāca
aiśānyāṃ janayet kuṇḍaṃ gururvahniñca vaiṣṇavaṃ / 58.001ab /
gāyatryaṣṭaśataṃ hutvā sampātavidhinā ghaṭān // 58.001cd //
prokṣayet kāruśālāyāṃ śilpibhirmūrtipair vrajet / 58.002ab /
tūryaśabdaiḥ kautukañca bandhayeddakṣiṇe kare // 58.002cd //
viṣṇave śipiviṣṭeti ūrṇāsūtreṇa sarṣapaiḥ / 58.003ab /
paṭṭavastreṇa kartavyaṃ deśikasyāpi kautukaṃ // 58.003cd //
maṇḍape pratimāṃ sthāpya savastrāṃ pūjitān stuvan / 58.004ab /
namastercye sureśāni praṇīte viśvakarmaṇā // 58.004cd //
prabhāvitāśeṣajagaddhātri tubhyaṃ namo namaḥ / 58.005ab /
tvayi sampūjayāmīśe nārāyaṇamanāmayaṃ // 58.005cd //
rahitā śilpidoṣaistvamṛddhiyuktā sadā bhava / 58.006ab /
evaṃ vijñāpya pratimāṃ nayettāṃ snānamaṇḍapaṃ // 58.006cd //
śilpinantoṣayeddravyair gurave gāṃ pradāpayet / 58.007ab /
citraṃ deveti mantreṇa netre conmīlayettataḥ // 58.007cd //
||page:164
agnirjyotīti dṛṣṭiñca dadyādvai bhadrapīṭhake / 58.008ab /
tataḥ śuklāni puṣpāṇi ghṛtaṃ siddhārthakaṃ tathā // 58.008cd //
dūrvāṃ kuśāgraṃ devasya dadyācchirasi deśikaḥ / 58.009ab /
madhuvāteti mantreṇa netre cābhyañjayedguruḥ // 58.009cd //
hiraṇyagarbhamantreṇa imaṃ meti ca kīrtayet / 58.010ab /
ghṛtenābhyañjayet paścāt paṭhan ghṛtavatīṃ punaḥ // 58.010cd //
masūrapiṣṭe nodvartya ato deveti kīrtayan / 58.011ab /
kṣālayeduṣṇatoyena sapta te 'greti deśikaḥ // 58.011cd //
drupadādivetyanulimpedāpo hi ṣṭheti secayet / 58.012ab /
nadījaistīrthajaiḥ snānaṃ pāvamānīti ratnajaiḥ // 58.012cd //
samudraṃ gaccha candanaistīrthamṛtkalaśena ca / 58.013ab /
śanno devīḥ snāpayecca gāyatryāpyuṣṇavāriṇā // 58.013cd //
pañcamṛddhirhiraṇyeti snāpayetparameśvaraṃ / 58.014ab /
sikatādbhirirmaṃ meti valmīkodaghaṭena ca // 58.014cd //
tadviṣṇoriti oṣadhyadbhiryā oṣadhīti mantrataḥ / 58.015ab /
yajñāyajñeti kāṣāyaiḥ pañcabhirgavyakaistataḥ // 58.015cd //
payaḥ pṛthivyāṃ mantreṇa yāḥ phalinī phalāmbubhiḥ / 58.016ab /
viśvataś cakṣuḥ saumyena pūrveṇa kalasena ca // 58.016cd //
somaṃ rājānamityevaṃ viṣṇo rarāṭaṃ dakṣataḥ / 58.017ab /
haṃsaḥ śuciḥ paścimena kuryādudvartanaṃ hareḥ // 58.017cd //
mūrdhānandivamantreṇa dhātrīṃ māṃsīṃ ca ke dadet / 58.018ab /
mānastoketi mantreṇa gandhadvāreti gandhakaiḥ // 58.018cd //
||page:165
idamāpeti ca ghaṭair etāśītipadasthitaiḥ / 58.019ab /
ehyehi bhagavan viṣṇo lokānugrāhakāraka // 58.019cd //
yajñabhāgaṃ gṛhāṇemaṃ vāsudeva namostu te / 58.020ab /
anenāvāhya deveśaṃ kuryāt kautukamocanaṃ // 58.020cd //
muñcāmi tveti sūktena deśikasyāpi mocayet / 58.021ab /
hiraṇmayena pādyaṃ dadyādato deveti cārghyakaṃ // 58.021cd //
madhuvātā madhuparkaṃ mayi gṛhṇāmi cācamet / 58.022ab /
akṣannamīmadanteti kireddarvākṣataṃ budhaḥ // 58.022cd //
kāṇḍānnirmañchanaṃ kuryādgandhaṃ gandhavatīti ca / 58.023ab /
unnayāmīti mālyañca idaṃ viṣṇuḥ pavitrakaṃ // 58.023cd //
vṛhaspate vastrayugmaṃ vedāhamityuttarīyakaṃ / 58.024ab /
mahāvratena sakalīpuṣpaṃ cauṣadhayaḥ kṣipet // 58.024cd //
dhūpaṃ dadyāddhūrasīti vibhrāṭsūktena cāñjanaṃ / 58.025ab /
yuñjantīti ca tilakaṃ dīrghāyuṣṭveti mālyakaṃ // 58.025cd //
indracchatreti chatrantu ādarśantu virājataḥ / 58.026ab /
cāmarantu vikarṇena bhūṣāṃ rathantareṇa ca // 58.026cd //
vyajanaṃ vāyudaivatyair muñcāmi tveti puṣpakaṃ / 58.027ab /
vedādyaiḥ saṃstutiṃ kuryāddhareḥ puruṣasūktataḥ // 58.027cd //
sarvametatsamaṃ kuryāt piṇḍikādau harādike / 58.028ab /
devasyotthānasamaye sauparṇaṃ sūktamuccaret // 58.028cd //
uttiṣṭheti samutthāpya śayyāyā maṇḍape nayet / 58.029ab /
śākunenaiva sūktena devaṃ brahmarathādinā // 58.029cd //
ato deveti sūktena prātimāṃ piṇḍikāṃ tathā / 58.030ab /
śrīsūktena ca śayyāyāṃ viṣṇostu śakalīkṛtiḥ // 58.030cd //
||page:166
mṛgarājaṃ vṛṣaṃ nāgaṃ vyajanaṃ kalaśaṃ tathā / 58.031ab /
vaijayantīṃ tathā bherīṃ dīpamityaṣṭamaṅgalaṃ // 58.031cd //
darśayedaśvasūktena pādadeśe tripāditi / 58.032ab /
ukhāṃ pidhānakaṃ pātramambikāṃ darvikāṃ dadet // 58.032cd //
muṣalolūkhalaṃ dadyācchilāṃ sammārjanīṃ tathā / 58.033ab /
tathā bhojanabhāṇḍāni gṛhopakāraṇāni ca // 58.033cd //
śirodeśe ca nidrākhyaṃ vastraratnayutaṃ ghaṭaṃ / 58.034ab /
khaṇḍakhādyaiḥ pūrayitvā snapanasya vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ // 58.034cd //
||ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye snapanādividhānaṃ nāma aṣṭapañcāśo 'dhyāyaḥ ||
||athonaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
adhivāsanakathanaṃ
bhagavānuvāca
hareḥ sānnidhyakaraṇamadhivāsanamucyate / 59.001ab /
sarvajñaṃ sarvagaṃ dhyātvā ātmānaṃ puruṣottamaṃ // 59.001cd //
oṃkāreṇa samāyojya cicchaktimabhimāninīṃ / 59.002ab /
niḥsāryātmaikatāṃ kṛtvā svasmin sarvagate vibhau // 59.002cd //
yojayenmarutāṃ pṛthvīṃ vahnivījena dīpayet / 59.003ab /
saṃharedvāyunā cāgniṃ vāyumākāśato nayet // 59.003cd //
||page:167
adhibhūtādidevaistu sādhyākhyair vibhavaiḥ saha / 59.004ab /
tanmātrapātrakān kṛtvā saṃharettat kramād budhaḥ // 59.004cd //
ākāśaṃ manasāhatya manohaṅkaraṇe kuru / 59.005ab /
ahaṅkārañca mahati tañcāpyavyākṛte nayet // 59.005cd //
avyākṛtaṃ jñānarūpe vāsudevaḥ sa īritaḥ / 59.006ab /
sa tāmavyākṛtiṃ māyāmabhyaṣṭa sisṛkṣayā // 59.006cd //
saṅkarṣaṇaṃ saṃ śabdātmā sparśākhyamasṛjat prabhuḥ / 59.007ab /
kṣobhya māyāṃ sa pradyumnaṃ tejorūpaṃ sa cāsṛjat // 59.007cd //
aniruddhaṃ rasamātraṃ brahmāṇaṃ gandharūpakaṃ / 59.008ab /
aniruddhaḥ sa ca brahmā apa ādau sasarja ha // 59.008cd //
tasmin hiraṇmayañcāṇḍaṃ so 'sṛjat pañcabhūtavat / 59.009ab /
tasmin saṅkrāmite jīve śaktirātmopasaṃhṛtā // 59.009cd //
prāṇo jīvena saṃyukto vṛttimāniti śabdyate / 59.010ab /
jīvovyāhṛtisañjñastu prāṇeṣvādhyātmikaḥ smṛtaḥ // 59.010cd //
prāṇair yuktā tato buddhiḥ sañjātā cāṣṭamūrtikī / 59.011ab /
ahaṅkārastato jajñe manastasmādajāyata // 59.011cd //
arthāḥ prajajñire pañca saṅkalpādiyutāstataḥ / 59.012ab /
śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpañca raso gandha iti smṛtā // 59.012cd //
jñānaśaktiyutānyetair ārabdhānīndriyāṇi tu / 59.013ab /
sādhyādyair vibhavair iti ṅa, cihinitapustakapāṭhaḥ
||page:168
tvakśrotraghrāṇacakṣūṃṣi jihvābuddhīndriyāṇi tu // 59.013cd //
pādau pāyuḥs tathā pāṇī vāgupasthaś ca pañcamaḥ / 59.014ab /
karmendriyāṇi caitāni pañcabhūtānyataḥ śṛṇu // 59.014cd //
ākāśavāyutejāṃsi salilaṃ pṛthivī tathā / 59.015ab /
sthūlamebhiḥ śarīrantu sarvādhāraṃ prajāyate // 59.015cd //
eteṣāṃ vācakā mantrā nyāsāyocyanta uttamāḥ / 59.016ab /
jīvabhūtaṃ makārantu devasya vyāpakaṃ nyaset // 59.016cd //
prāṇatattvaṃ bhakārantu jīvopādhigataṃ nyaset / 59.017ab /
hṛdayasthaṃ bakārantu buddhitattvaṃ nyased budhaḥ // 59.017cd //
phakāramapi tatraiva ahaṅkāramayaṃ nyaset / 59.018ab /
manastattvaṃ pakārantu nyasetsaṅkalpasambhavaṃ // 59.018cd //
śabdatanmātratattvantu nakāraṃ mastake nyaset / 59.019ab /
sparśātmakaṃ dhakārantu vaktradeśe tu vinyaset // 59.019cd //
dakāraṃ rūpatattvantu hṛddeśe viniveśayet / 59.020ab /
thakāraṃ vastideśe tu rasatanmātrakaṃ nyaset // 59.020cd //
takāraṃ gandhatanmātraṃ jaṅghayorviniveśayet / 59.021ab /
ṇakāraṃ śrotrayor nyasya ḍhakāraṃ vinyasettvaci // 59.021cd //
ḍakāraṃ netrayugme tu rasanāyāṃ ṭhakārakaṃ / 59.022ab /
ṭakāraṃ nāsikāyāntu ñakāraṃ vāci vinyaset // 59.022cd //
jhakāraṃ karayor nyasya pāṇitattvaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ / 59.023ab /
jakāraṃ padayor nyasya chaṃ pāyau camupasthake // 59.023cd //
vinyaset pṛthivītattvaṃ ṅakāraṃ pādayugmake / 59.024ab /
vastau ghakāraṃ gaṃ tattvaṃ taijasaṃ hṛdi vinyaset // 59.024cd //
||page:169
khakāraṃ vāyutattvañca nāsikāyāṃ niveśayet / 59.025ab /
kakāraṃ vinyasennityaṃ khatattvaṃ mastake budhaḥ // 59.025cd //
hṛtpuṇḍarīke vinyasya yakāraṃ sūryadaivataṃ / 59.026ab /
dvāsaptatisahasrāṇi hṛdayādabhiniḥsṛtāḥ // 59.026cd //
kalāṣoḍaśasaṃyuktaṃ makāraṃ tatra vinyaset / 59.027ab /
tanmadhye cintayenmantrī vinduṃ vahnestu maṇḍalaṃ // 59.027cd //
hakāraṃ vinyasettatra praṇavena surottamaḥ / 59.028ab /
oṃ āṃ parameṣṭhyātmane āṃ namaḥ puruṣātmane // 59.028cd //
oṃ vāṃ manonivṛttyātmane nāñca viśvātmane namaḥ / 59.029ab /
oṃ vaṃ namaḥ sarvātmane ity uktāḥ pañca śaktayaḥ // 59.029cd //
sthāne tu prathamā yojyā dvitīyā āsane matā / 59.030ab /
tṛtīyā śayane tadvaccaturthī pānakarmaṇi // 59.030cd //
pratyarcāyāṃ pañcamī syātpañcopaniṣadaḥ smṛtāḥ / 59.031ab /
hūṅkāraṃ vinyasenmadhye dhyātvā mantramayaṃ hariṃ // 59.031cd //
yāṃ mūrtiṃ sthāpayettasmāt mūlamantraṃ nyasettataḥ / 59.032ab /
oṃ namo bhagavate vāsudevāya mūlakaṃ // 59.032cd //
śiroghrāṇalalāṭeṣu mukhakaṇṭhahṛdi kramāt / 59.033ab /
bhujayorjaṅghayoraṅghyroḥ keśavaṃ śirasi nyaset // 59.033cd //
nārāyaṇaṃ nyasedvaktre grīvāyāṃ mādhavaṃ nyaset / 59.034ab /
||page:170
govindaṃ bhujayornyasya viṣṇuṃ ca hṛdaye nyaset // 59.034cd //
madhusūdanakaṃ pṛṣṭhe vāmanaṃ jaṭhare nyaset / 59.035ab /
kakṣyāntrivikramaṃ nyasya jaṅghāyāṃ śrīdharaṃ nyaset // 59.035cd //
hṛṣīkeśaṃ dakṣiṇāyāṃ padmanābhaṃ tu gulphake / 59.036ab /
dāmodaraṃ pādayoś ca hṛdayādiṣaḍaṅgakaṃ // 59.036cd //
etat sādhāraṇaṃ proktamādirmūrtestu sattama / 59.037ab /
athavā yasya devasya prārabdhaṃ sthāpanaṃ bhavet // 59.037cd //
tasyaiva mūlamantreṇa sajīvakaraṇaṃ bhavet / 59.038ab /
yasyā mūrtestu yannāma tasyādyaṃ cākṣaraṃ ca yat // 59.038cd //
tat svairair dvādaśair bhedya hy aṅgāni parikalpayet / 59.039ab /
hṛdayādīni deveśa mūlañca daśamākṣaraṃ // 59.039cd //
yathā deve tathā dehe tattvāni viniyojayet / 59.040ab /
cakrābjamaṇdale viṣṇuṃ yajedgandhādinā tathā // 59.040cd //
pūrvavaccāsanaṃ dhyāyetsagātraṃ saparicchadaṃ / 59.041ab /
śubhañcakraṃ dvādaśāraṃ hy upariṣṭādvicintayet // 59.041cd //
trinābhicakraṃ dvinemi svaraistacca samanvitaṃ / 59.042ab /
pṛṣṭhadeśe tataḥ prājñaḥ prakṛtyādīnniveśayet // 59.042cd //
pūjayedārakāgreṣu sūryaṃ dvādaśadhā punaḥ / 59.043ab /
||page:171
kalāṣoḍaśasaṃyuktaṃ somantatra vicintayet // 59.043cd //
sabalaṃ tritayaṃ nābhau cintayeddeśikottamaḥ / 59.044ab /
padmañca dvādaśadalaṃ padmamadhye vicintayet // 59.044cd //
tanmadhye pauruṣīṃ śaktiṃ dhyātvābhyarcya ca diśikaḥ / 59.045ab /
pratimāyāṃ hariṃ nyasya tatra taṃ pūjayet surān // 59.045cd //
gandhapuṣpādibhiḥ samyak sāṅgaṃ sāvaraṇaṃ kramāt / 59.046ab /
dvādaśākṣaravījaistu keśavādīn samarcayet // 59.046cd //
dvādaśāre maṇḍale tu laukapālādikaṃ kramāt / 59.047ab /
pratimāmarcayet paścādgandhapuṣpādibhirdvijaḥ // 59.047cd //
pauruṣeṇa tu sūktena śriyāḥ sūktena piṇḍikāṃ / 59.048ab /
jananādikramāt paścājjanayedvaiṣṇavānalaṃ // 59.048cd //
hutvāgniṃ hutamiti kuṇḍegniṃ praṇayedbudhaḥ / 59.049ab /
agnipraṇayane mantrastvamagne hy agnirucyate // 59.049cd //
dakṣiṇegniṃ hutamiti kuṇḍegniṃ praṇayedbudhaḥ / 59.050ab /
agnimagnīti pūrve tu kuṇḍegniṃ praṇayedbudhaḥ // 59.050cd //
uttare praṇayedagnimagnimagnī havāmahe / 59.051ab /
agnipraṇayane mantrastvamagne hy agnirucyate // 59.051cd //
palāśasamidhānāntu aṣṭottarasahasrakaṃ / 59.052ab /
kuṇḍe kuṇḍe homayecca vrīhīn vedādikais tathā // 59.052cd //
sājyāṃstilān vyāhṛtibhirmūlamantreṇa vai ghṛtaṃ / 59.053ab /
kuryāttataḥ śāntihomaṃ madhuratritayena ca // 59.053cd //
dvādaśārṇaiḥ spṛśet pādau nābhiṃ hṛn mastakaṃ tataḥ / 59.054ab /
ghṛtaṃ dadhi payo hutvā spṛśenmūrdhanyatho tataḥ // 59.054cd //
||page:172
spṛṣṭvā śironābhipādāṃś catasraḥ sthāpayennadīḥ / 59.055ab /
gaṅgā ca yamunā godā kramānnāmnā sarasvatī // 59.055cd //
dahettu viṣṇugāyatryā gāyatryā śrapayeccaruṃ / 59.056ab /
homayecca baliṃ dadyāduttare bhojayeddvijān // 59.056cd //
sāmādhipānāṃ tuṣṭyarthaṃ hemagāṃ gurave dadet / 59.057ab /
dikpatibhyo baliṃ dattvā rātrau kuryācca jāgaraṃ / 59.057cd /
brahmagītādiśabdena sarvabhāgadhivāsanāt // 59.057ef //
||ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye adhivāsanaṃ nāma ūnaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ ||
||atha ṣaṣṭitamodhyāyaḥ
vāsudevapratiṣṭhādividhiḥ
bhagavānuvāca
piṇḍikāsthāpanārthantu garbhāgāraṃ tu saptadhā / 60.001ab /
vibhajed brahmabhāge tu pratimāṃ sthāpayed budhaḥ // 60.001cd //
devamanuṣapaiśācabhāgeṣu na kadācana / 60.002ab /
brahmabhāgaṃ parityajya kiñcidāśritya cāṇḍaja // 60.002cd //
devamānuṣabhāgābhyāṃ sthāpyā yatnāttu piṇḍikā / 60.003ab /
napuṃsakakaśilāyāntu ratnanyāsaṃ samācaret // 60.003cd //
nārasiṃhena hutvā ratnanyāsaṃ ca tena vai / 60.004ab /
||page:173
vrīhīn ratnāṃstridhātūṃś ca lohādīṃś candanādikān // 60.004cd //
pūrvādinavagarteṣu nyasen madhye yathāruci / 60.005ab /
atha cendrādimantraiś ca garto guggulunāvṛtaḥ // 60.005cd //
ratnanyāsavidhiṃ kṛtvā pratimāmālabhedguruḥ / 60.006ab /
saśalākair darbhapuñjaiś ca sahadevaiḥ samanvitaiḥ // 60.006cd //
savāhyantaiś ca saṃskṛtya pañcagavyena śodhayet / 60.007ab /
prokṣayeddarbhatoyena nadītīrthodakena ca // 60.007cd //
homārthe khaṇḍilaṃ kuryāt sikatābhiḥ samantataḥ / 60.008ab /
sārdhahastapramāṇaṃ tu caturasraṃ suśobhanaṃ // 60.008cd //
aṣṭadikṣu yathānyāsaṃ kalaśānapi vinyaset / 60.009ab /
pūrvādyānaṣṭavarṇena agnimānīya saṃskṛtaṃ // 60.009cd //
tvamagnedyubhiriti gāyatryā samidho hunet / 60.010ab /
aṣṭārṇenāṣṭaśatakaṃ ājyaṃ pūrṇāṃ pradāpayet // 60.010cd //
śāntyudakaṃ āmrapatraiḥ mūlena śatamantritaṃ / 60.011ab /
siñceddevasya tanmūrdhni śrīś ca te hy anayā ṛcā // 60.011cd //
brahmayānena coddhṛtya uttiṣṭha brahmaṇaspate / 60.012ab /
tadviṣṇoriti mantreṇa prāsādābhimukhaṃ nayet // 60.012cd //
śivikāyāṃ hariṃ sthāpya bhrāmayīta purādikaṃ / 60.013ab /
gītavedādiśabdaiś ca prāsādadvāri dhārayet // 60.013cd //
||page:174
strībhirviprair maṅgalāṣṭaghaṭaiḥ saṃsnāpayeddhariṃ / 60.014ab /
tato gandhādinābhyarcya mūlamantreṇa deśikaḥ // 60.014cd //
ato deveti vastrādyamaṣṭāṅgārghyaṃ nivedya ca / 60.015ab /
sthire lagne piṇḍikāyāṃ devasya tveti dhārayet // 60.015cd //
oṃ trailokyavikrāntāya namastestu trivikrama / 60.016ab /
saṃsthyāpya piṇḍikāyāntu sthiraṃ kuryādvicakṣaṇaḥ // 60.016cd //
dhruvā dyauriti mantreṇa viśvataś cakṣurityapi / 60.017ab /
pañcagavyena saṃsnāpya kṣālya gandhadakena ca // 60.017cd //
pūjayet sakalīkṛtya sāṅgaṃ sāvaraṇaṃ hariṃ / 60.018ab /
dhyāyet svaṃ tasya mūrtintu pṛthivī tasya pīṭhikā // 60.018cd //
kalpayedvigrahaṃ tasya taijasaiḥ paramāṇubhiḥ / 60.019ab /
jīvamāvāhayiṣyāmi pañcaviṃśatitattvagaṃ // 60.019cd //
caitanyaṃ paramānandaṃ jāgratsvapnavivarjitaṃ / 60.020ab /
dehendriyamanobuddhiprāṇāhaṅkāravarjitaṃ // 60.020cd //
brahmādistambaparyantaṃ hṛdayeṣu vyavasthitaṃ / 60.021ab /
hṛdayāt pratimāvimbe sthiro bhava pareśvara // 60.021cd //
sajīvaṃ kuru bimbaṃ tvaṃ savāhyābhyantarasthitaḥ / 60.022ab /
aṅguṣṭhamātraḥ puruṣo dehopādhiṣu saṃsthitaḥ // 60.022cd //
jyotirjñānaṃ paraṃ brahma ekamevādvitīyakaṃ / 60.023ab /
sajīvīkaraṇaṃ kṛtvā praṇavena nibodhayet // 60.023cd //
sānnidhyakaraṇannāma hṛdayaṃ spṛśya vai japet / 60.024ab /
sūktantu pauruṣaṃ dhyāyan idaṃ guhyamanuṃ japet // 60.024cd //
namastestu sureśāya santoṣavibhavātmane / 60.025ab /
||page:175
jñānavijñānarūpāya brahmatejonuyāyine // 60.025cd //
guṇātikrāntaveśāya puruṣāya mahātmane / 60.026ab /
akṣayāya purāṇāya viṣṇo sannihito bhava // 60.026cd //
yacca te paramaṃ tattvaṃ yacca jñānamayaṃ vapuḥ / 60.027ab /
tat sarvamekato līnamasmindehe vibudhyatāṃ // 60.027cd //
ātmānaṃ sannidhīkṛtya brahmādiparivārakān / 60.028ab /
svanāmnā sthāpayedanyānāyudhān svamudrayā // 60.028cd //
yātrāvarṣādikaṃ dṛṣṭvā jñeyaḥ sannihito hariḥ / 60.029ab /
natvā stutvā stavādyaiś ca japtvā cāṣṭākṣarādikaṃ // 60.029cd //
caṇḍapracaṇḍau dvārasthau nirgatyābhyarcayedguruḥ / 60.030ab /
agnimaṇḍapamāsādya garuḍaṃ sthāpya pūjayet // 60.030cd //
digīśān diśi devāṃś ca sthāpya sampūjya deśikaḥ / 60.031ab /
viśvaksenaṃ tu saṃsthāpya śaṅkhacakrādi pūjayet // 60.031cd //
sarvapārṣadakebhyaś ca baliṃ bhūtebhya arcayet / 60.032ab /
paramavastrasuvarṇādi gurave dakṣiṇāṃ dadet // 60.032cd //
yāgopayogidravyādyamācāryāya narorpayet / 60.033ab /
ācāryadakṣiṇārdhantu ṛtvigbhyo dakṣiṇāṃ dadet // 60.033cd //
anyebhyo dakṣiṇāṃ dadyādbhojayed brāhmaṇāṃstataḥ / 60.034ab /
avāritān phalān dadyādyajamānāya vai guruḥ // 60.034cd //
viṣṇuṃ nayet pratiṣṭhātā cātmanā sakalaṃ kulaṃ / 60.035ab /
||page:176
sarveṣāmeva devānāmeṣa sādhāraṇo vidhiḥ / 60.035cd /
mūlamantrāḥ pṛthakteṣāṃ śeṣaṃ kāryaṃ samānakaṃ // 60.035ef //
||ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye vāsudevapratiṣṭhādikathanaṃ nāma ṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ ||
||atha ekaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
dvārapratiṣṭhādhvajārohāṇādividhiḥ
bhagavānuvāca
vakṣe cāvabhṛtasnānaṃ viṣṇor natveti homayet / 61.001ab /
ekāśītipade kumbhān sthāpya saṃsthāpayeddhariṃ // 61.001cd //
pūjayed gandhapuṣpādyair baliṃ datvā guruṃ yajet / 61.002ab /
dvārapratiṣṭhāṃ vakṣyāmi dvārādho hema vai dadet // 61.002cd //
aṣṭabhiḥ kalaśaiḥ sthāpya śākhodumbarakau guruḥ / 61.003ab /
gandhādibhiḥ samabhyarcya mantrair vedādibhirguruḥ // 61.003cd //
kuṇḍeṣu homayedvahniṃ samillājatilādibhiḥ / 61.004ab /
datvā śayyādikañcādho dadyādādhāraśaktikāṃ // 61.004cd //
śākhayorvinyasenmūle devau caṇḍapracaṇdakau / 61.005ab /
ūrdhvodumbarake devīṃ lakṣmīṃ suragaṇārcitāṃ // 61.005cd //
nyasyābhyarcya yathānyāyaṃ śrīsūktena caturmukhaṃ / 61.006ab /
datvā tu śrīphalādīni ācāryādestu dakṣiṇāṃ // 61.006cd //
pratiṣṭhāsiddhadvārasya tvācāryaḥ sthāpayeddhariṃ / 61.007ab /
||page:177
prāsādādasya pratiṣṭhantu hṛtpratiṣṭheti tāṃ śṛṇu // 61.007cd //
samāptau śukanāśāyā vedyāḥ prāgdarbhamastake / 61.008ab /
sauvarṇaṃ rājataṃ kumbhamathavā śuklanirmitaṃ // 61.008cd //
aṣṭaratnauṣadhīdhātuvījalauhānvitaṃ śubhaṃ / 61.009ab /
savastraṃ pūritaṃ cādbhirmaṇḍale cādhivāsayet // 61.009cd //
sapallavaṃ nṛsiṃhena hutvā sampātasañcitaṃ / 61.010ab /
nārāyaṇākhyatattvena prāṇabhūtaṃ nyasettataḥ // 61.010cd //
vairājabhūtāntaṃ dhyāyet prāsādasya sureśvara / 61.011ab /
tataḥ puruṣavatsarvaṃ prāsādaṃ cintayed budhaḥ // 61.011cd //
adho datvā suvarṇaṃ tu tadvavad bhūtaṃ ghaṭaṃ nyaset / 61.012ab /
gurvādau dakṣiṇāṃ dadyād brāhmaṇādeś ca bhojanaṃ // 61.012cd //
tataḥ paścādvedibandhaṃ tadūrdhvaṃ kaṇṭhabandhanaṃ / 61.013ab /
kaṇṭhopariṣṭāt kartavyaṃ vimalāmalasārakaṃ // 61.013cd //
tadūrdhvaṃ vṛkalaṃ kuryāccakrañcādyaṃ sudarśanaṃ / 61.014ab /
mūttiṃ śrīvāsudevasya grahaguptāṃ nivedayet // 61.014cd //
kalaśaṃ vātha kurvīta tadūrdhvaṃ cakramuttamaṃ / 61.015ab /
vedyāś ca paritaḥ sthāpyā aṣṭau vighneśvarāstvaja // 61.015cd //
tadūrdhvaṃ culvakaṃ kuryāditi kha, gha, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ
||page:178
catvāro vā caturdikṣu sthāpanīyā garutmataḥ / 61.016ab /
dhvajārohaṃ ca vakṣyāmi yena bhūtādi naśyati // 61.016cd //
prāsādavimbadravyāṇāṃ yāvantaḥ paramāṇavaḥ / 61.017ab /

||ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye lakṣmīsthāpanaṃ nāma dviṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ

||ity ādimahāputrāṇe āgneye devādipratiṣṭhāpustakapratiṣṭhākathanaṃ nāma triṣaṣṭitamodhyāyaḥ

bhagavānuvāca

kṛtvāṣṭau sthaṇḍilān ramyān saikatān deśikottamaḥ / 64.028ab /
varuṇasyeti mantreṇa sājyamaṣṭaśataṃ tataḥ // 64.028cd //
caruṃ yavamayaṃ hutvā śāntitoyaṃ samācaret / 64.029ab /
secayenmūrdhni devaṃ tu sajīvakaraṇaṃ caret // 64.029cd //
dhyāyettu varuṇaṃ yuktaṃ gauryā nadanadīgaṇaiḥ / 64.030ab /
oṃ varuṇāya namo 'bhyarcya tataḥ sānnidhyamācaret // 64.030cd //
utthāpya nāgapṛṣṭhādyair bhrāmayettaiḥ samaṅgalaiḥ / 64.031ab /
āpo hi ṣṭheti ca kṣipettrimadhvākte ghaṭe jale // 64.031cd //
jalāśaye madhyagataṃ suguptaṃ viniveśayet / 64.032ab /
snātvā dhyāyecca varuṇaṃ sṛṣṭiṃ brahmāṇḍasañjñikāṃ // 64.032cd //
agnivījena sandagddhya tadbhasma plāvayeddharāṃ / 64.033ab /
sarvamapomayaṃ lokaṃ dhyāyet tatra jaleśvaraṃ // 64.033cd //
toyamadhyasthitaṃ devaṃ tato yūpaṃ niveśayet / 64.034ab /
caturasramathāṣṭāsraṃ vartulaṃ vā pravartitaṃ // 64.034cd //
ārādhya devatāliṅgaṃ daśahastaṃ tu kūpake / 64.035ab /
yūpaṃ yajñīyavṛkṣotthaṃ mūle haimaṃ phalaṃ nyaset // 64.035cd //
vāpyāṃ pañcadaśakaraṃ puṣkariṇyāṃ tu viṃśatikaṃ / 64.036ab /
taḍāge pañcaviṃśākhyaṃ jalamadhye niveśayet // 64.036cd //
yāgamaṇḍapāṅgeṇa vā yūpabrasketi mantrataḥ  / 64.037ab /
sthāpya tadveṣṭayedvastrair yūpopari patākikāṃ // 64.037cd //
||page:190
tadabhyarcya ca gandhādyair jagacchāntiṃ samācaret / 64.038ab /
dakṣiṇāṃ gurave dadyādbhūgohemāmbupātrakaṃ // 64.038cd //
dvijebhyo dakṣiṇā deyā āgatān bhojayettathā / 64.039ab /
ābrahmastambaparyantā ye kecitsalilārthinaḥ // 64.039cd //
te tṛptimupagacchantu taḍāgasthena vāriṇā / 64.040ab /
toyamutsarjayedevaṃ pañcagavyaṃ vinikṣipet // 64.040cd //
āpo hi ṣṭheti tisṛbhiḥ śāntitoyaṃ dvijaiḥ kṛtaṃ / 64.041ab /
tīrthatoyaṃ kṣipet puṇyaṃ gokulañcārpayedvijān // 64.041cd //
anivāritamannādyaṃ sarvajanyañca kārayet / 64.042ab /
aśvamedhasahasrāṇāṃ sahasraṃ yaḥ samācaret // 64.042cd //
ekāhaṃ sthāpayettoyaṃ tatpuṇyamayutāyutaṃ / 64.043ab /
.vimāne modate svarge narakaṃ na sa gacchati // 64.043cd //
gavādi pivate yasmāttasmāt kartur na pātakaṃ / 64.044ab /
toyadānātsarvadānaphalaṃ prāpya divaṃ yajet // 64.044cd //
||ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye
kūpavāpītaḍāgādipratiṣṭhākathanaṃ nāma
catuḥṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ ||
||atha pañcaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
sabhāsthāpanakathanaṃ
bhagavānuvāca
sabhādisthānaṃ vakṣye tathaiva teṣāṃ pravartanaṃ / 65.001ab /
bhūmau parīkṣitāyāñca vāstuyāgaṃ samācaret // 65.001cd //
svecchayā tu sabhāṃ kṛtvā svecchayā sthāpayet surān / 65.002ab /
||page:191
catuṣpathe grāmādau ca na śūnye kārayet sabhāṃ // 65.002cd //
nirmalaḥ kulamuddhṛtya kartā svarge vimodate / 65.003ab /
anena vidhinā kuryāt saptabhaumaṃ harergṛhaṃ // 65.003cd //
yathā rājñāṃ tathānyeṣāṃ pūrvādyāś ca dhvajādayaḥ / 65.004ab /
koṇabhujān varjayitvā catuḥśālaṃ tu vartayet // 65.004cd //
triśālaṃ vā dviśālaṃ vā ekaśālamathāpi vā / 65.005ab /
vyayādhikaṃ na kurvīta vyayadoṣakaraṃ hi tat // 65.005cd //
āyādhike bhavet pīḍā tasmāt kuryāt samaṃ dvayaṃ / 65.006ab /
kararāśiṃ samastantu kuryādvasuguṇaṃ guruḥ // 65.006cd //
saptārciṣā hṛte bhāge gargavidyāvicakṣaṇaḥ / 65.007ab /
aṣṭadhā bhājite tasmin yaccheṣaṃ sa vyayo gataḥ // 65.007cd //
athavā kararāśiṃ tu hanyāt saptārciṣā budhaḥ / 65.008ab /
vasubhiḥ saṃhṛte bhāge pṛthvyādi parikalpayet // 65.008cd //
dhvajo dhūmras tathā siṃhaḥ śvā vṛṣastu kharo gajaḥ / 65.009ab /
tathā dhvāṅkṣastu pūrvādāvudbhavanti vikalpayet // 65.009cd //
triśālakatrayaṃ śastaṃ udakpūrvavivarjitaṃ / 65.010ab /
yāmyāṃ paragṛhopetaṃ dviśālaṃ labhyate sadā // 65.010cd //
yāmye śālaikaśālaṃ tu pratyakśālamathāpi vā / 65.011ab /
ekaśāladvayaṃ śastaṃ śeṣāstvanye bhayāvahāḥ // 65.011cd //
catuḥśālaṃ sadā śastaṃ sarvadoṣavivarjitaṃ / 65.012ab /
ekabhaumādi kurvīta bhavanaṃ saptabhaumakaṃ // 65.012cd //
dvāravedyādirahitaṃ pūraṇena vivarjitaṃ / 65.013ab /
devagṛhaṃ devatāyāḥ pratiṣṭhāvidhinā sadā // 65.013cd //
||page:192
saṃsthāpya manujānāñca samudāyoktakarmaṇā / 65.014ab /
prātaḥ sarvauṣadhīsnānaṃ kṛtvā śuciratandritaḥ // 65.014cd //
madhuraistu dvijān bhojya pūrṇakumbhādiśobhitaṃ / 65.015ab /
satoraṇaṃ svasti vācya dvijān goṣṭhahastakaḥ // 65.015cd //
gṛhī gṛhaṃ praviśecca daivajñān prārcya saṃviśet / 65.016ab /
gṛhe puṣṭikaraṃ mantraṃ paṭheccemaṃ samāhitaḥ // 65.016cd //
oṃ nande nandaya vāśiṣṭhe vasubhiḥ prajayā saha / 65.017ab /
jaye bhārgavadāyade prajānāṃ vijayāvahe // 65.017cd //
pūrṇe 'ṅgirasadāyāde pūrṇakāmaṃ kurudhva māṃ / 65.018ab /
bhadre kāśyapadāyāde kuru bhadrāṃ matiṃ mama // 65.018cd //
sarvavījauṣadhīyukte sarvaratnauṣadhīvṛte / 65.019ab /
rucire nandane nande vāsiṣṭhe ramyatāmiha // 65.019cd //
prajāpatisute devi caturasre mahīyasi / 65.020ab /
subhage suvrate devi gṛhe kāśyapi ramyatāṃ // 65.020cd //
pūjite paramācāryair gandhamālyair alaṅkṛte / 65.021ab /
bhavabhūtikare devi gṛhe bhārgavi ramyatāṃ // 65.021cd //
avyakte vyākṛte pūrṇe muneraṅgirasaḥ sute / 65.022ab /
iṣṭake tvaṃ prayaccheṣṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāṃ kārayāmyahaṃ // 65.022cd //
deśasvāmipurasvāmigṛhasvāmiparigrahe / 65.023ab /
manuṣyadhanahastyaśvapaśuvṛddhikarī bhava // 65.023cd //
||ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye sabhāgṛhasthāpanaṃ nāma pañcaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ ||
||page:193
||atha ṣaṭṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
sādhāraṇapratiṣṭhāvidhānaṃ
bhagavānuvāca
samudāyapratiṣṭhāñca vakṣye sā vāsudevavat / 66.001ab /
ādityā vasavo rudrāḥ sādhyā viśve 'śvinau tathā // 66.001cd //
ṛṣayaś ca tathā sarve vakṣye teṣāṃ viśeṣakaṃ / 66.002ab /
yasya devasya yannāma tasyādyaṃ gṛhya cākṣaraṃ // 66.002cd //
mātrābhirbhedayitvā tu dīrghāṇyaṅgāni bhedayet / 66.003ab /
prathamaṃ kalpayedvījaṃ savinduṃ praṇavaṃ natiṃ // 66.003cd //
sarveṣāṃ mūlamantreṇa pūjanaṃ sthāpanaṃ tathā / 66.004ab /
niyamavratakṛcchrāṇāṃ maṭhasaṅkramaveśmanāṃ // 66.004cd //
māsopavāsaṃ dvādaśyāṃ ity ādisthāpanaṃ vade / 66.005ab /
śilāṃ pūrṇaghaṭaṃ kāṃsyaṃ sambhāraṃ sthāpayettataḥ // 66.005cd //
brahmakūrcaṃ samāhṛtya śraped yavamayaṃ caruṃ / 66.006ab /
kṣīreṇa kapilāyāstu tadviṣṇoriti sādhakaḥ // 66.006cd //
praṇavenābhighāryaiva darvyā saṅghaṭṭayettataḥ / 66.007ab /
sādhayitvāvatāryātha viṣṇumabhyarcya homayet // 66.007cd //
vyāhṛtā caiva gāyatryā tadviprāseti homayet / 66.008ab /
viśvataś cakṣurvedyair bhūragnaye tathaiva ca // 66.008cd //
sūryāya prajāpataye antarikṣāya homayet / 66.009ab /
dyauḥ svāhā brahmaṇe svāhā pṛthivī mahārājakaḥ // 66.009cd //
tasmai somañca rājānaṃ indrādyair homamācaret / 66.010ab /
||page:194
evaṃ hutvā carorbhāgān dadyāddigbalimādarāt // 66.010cd //
samidho 'ṣṭaśataṃ hutvā pālāśāṃścājyahomakaṃ / 66.011ab /
kuryāt puruṣasūktena irāvatī tilāṣṭakaṃ // 66.011cd //
hutvā tu brahmaviṣṇvīśadevānāmanuyāyināṃ / 66.012ab /
grahāṇāmāhutīrhutvā lokeśānāmatho punaḥ // 66.012cd //
parvatānāṃ nadīnāñca samudrāṇāṃ tathāhutīḥ / 66.013ab /
hutvā ca vyāhṛtīrdaddyāt sruvapūrṇāhutitrayaṃ // 66.013cd //
vauṣaḍantena mantreṇa vaiṣṇavena pitāmaha / 66.014ab /
pañcagavyaṃ caruṃ prāśya datvācāryāya dakṣiṇāṃ // 66.014cd //
tilapātraṃ hemayuktaṃ savastraṃ gāmalaṅkṛtāṃ / 66.015ab /
prīyatāṃ bhagavān viṣṇurityutsṛjedvrataṃ budhaḥ // 66.015cd //
māsopavāsāderanyāṃ pratiṣṭhāṃ vacmi pūrṇataḥ / 66.016ab /
yajñenātoṣya deveśaṃ śrapayedvaiṣṇavaṃ caruṃ // 66.016cd //
tilataṇḍulanīvāraiḥ śyāmākair athavā yavaiḥ / 66.017ab /
ājyenādhārya cottārya homayenmūrtimantrakaiḥ // 66.017cd //
viṣṇvādīnāṃ māsapānāṃ tadante homayet punaḥ / 66.018ab /
oṃ viṣṇave svāhā / oṃ viṣṇave nibhūyapāya svāhā / oṃ viṣṇave śipiviṣṭāya svāhā / oṃ narasiṃhāya svāhā / oṃ puruṣottamāya svāhā
dvādaśāśvatthasamidho homayedghṛtasamplutāḥ // 66.018cd //
viṣṇo rarāṭamantreṇa tato dvādaśa cāhutīḥ / 66.019ab /
||page:195
idaṃ viṣṇurirāvatī carordvādaśa āhutīḥ // 66.019cd //
hutvā cājyāhutīstadvattadviprāseti homayet / 66.020ab /
śeṣahomaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā dadyāt pūrṇāhutitrayaṃ // 66.020cd //
yuñjatetyanuvākantu japtvā prāśīta vai caruṃ / 66.021ab /
praṇavena svaśabdānte kṛtvā pātre tu paippale // 66.021cd //
tato māsādhipānāntu viprān dvādaśa bhojayet / 66.022ab /
trayodaśa gurustatra tebhyo dadyāttrayodaśa // 66.022cd //
kumbhān svādvambusaṃyuktān sacchatropānahānvitān / 66.023ab /
gāvaḥ prītiṃ samāyāntu pracarantu praharṣitāḥ / 66.024ab /
iti gopathamutsṛjya yūpaṃ tatra niveśayet // 66.024cd //
daśahastaṃ prapārāmamaṭhasaṅkramaṇādiṣu / 66.025ab /
gṛhe ca homamevantu kṛtvā sarvaṃ yathāvidhi // 66.025cd //
pūrvoktena vidhānena praviśecca gṛhaṃ gṛhī / 66.026ab /
anivāritamannādyaṃ sarveṣveteṣu kārayet // 66.026cd //
dvijebhyo dakṣiṇā deyā yathāśaktyā vicakṣaṇaiḥ / 66.027ab /
ārāmaṃ kārayedyastu nandane sa ciraṃ vaset // 66.027cd //
maṭhapradānāt svarloke śakraloke vasettataḥ / 66.028ab /
prapādānādvāruṇena saṅkrameṇa vaseddivi // 66.028cd //
iṣṭakāsetukārī ca goloke mārgakṛdgavāṃ / 66.029ab /
niyamavratakṛdviṣṇuḥ kṛcchrakṛtsarvapāpahā // 66.029cd //
gṛhaṃ datvā vasetsvarge yāvadābhūtasamplavaṃ / 66.030ab /
||page:196
samudāyapratiṣṭheṣṭā śivādīnāṃ gṛhātmanāṃ // 66.030cd //
||ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye samudāyapratiṣṭhākathanaṃ nāma ṣaṭṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ ||
||atha saptaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
jīrṇoddhāravidhānaṃ
bhagavānuvāca
jīrṇāddhāravidhiṃ vakṣye bhūṣitāṃ snapayedguruḥ / 67.001ab /
acalāṃ vinyasedgehe atijīrṇāṃ parityajet // 67.001cd //
vyaṅgāṃ bhagnāṃ ca śailāḍhyāṃ nyasedanyāṃ ca pūrvavat / 67.002ab /
saṃhāravidhinā tatra tattvān saṃhṛtya deśikaḥ // 67.002cd //
sahasraṃ nārasiṃhena hutvā tāmuddhared guruḥ / 67.003ab /
dāravīṃ dārayedvahnau śailajāṃ prakṣipejjale // 67.003cd //
dhātujāṃ ratnajāṃ vāpi agādhe vā jale 'mbudhau / 67.004ab /
yānamāropya jīrṇāṅgaṃ chādya vastrādinā nayet // 67.004cd //
vāditraiḥ prakṣipettoye gurave dakṣiṇāṃ dadet / 67.005ab /
yatpramāṇā ca yaddravyā tanmānāṃ sthāpayeddine / 67.005cd /
kūpavāpītaḍāgāderjīrṇoddhāre mahāphalaṃ // 67.005ef //

yātrotsavavidhikathanaṃ
bhagavānuvāca
vakṣye vidhiṃ cotsavasya sthāpite tu sure caret / 68.001ab /
tasminnabde caikarātraṃ trirātrañcāṣṭarātrakaṃ // 68.001cd //
utsavena vinā yasmāt sthāpanaṃ niṣphalaṃ bhavet / 68.002ab /
ayane viṣuve cāpi śayanopavane gṛhe // 68.002cd //
kārakasyānukūle vā yātrāndevasya kārayet / 68.003ab /
maṅgalāṅkuraropaistu gītanṛtyādivādyakaiḥ // 68.003cd //
śarāvaghaṭikāpālīstvaṅkurārohaṇe hitāḥ / 68.004ab /
yavāñchālīṃstilān mudgān godhūmān sitasarṣapān // 68.004cd //
kulatthamāṣaniṣpāvān kṣālayitvā tu vāpayet / 68.005ab /
pūrvādau ca baliṃ dadyāt bhraman dīpaiḥ puraṃ niśi // 68.005cd //
indrādeḥ kumudādeś ca sarvabhūtebhya eva ca / 68.006ab /
anugacchanti te tatra pratirūpadharāḥ punaḥ // 68.006cd //
pade pade 'śvamedhasya phalaṃ teṣāṃ na saṃśayaḥ / 68.007ab /
āgatya devatāgāraṃ devaṃ vijñāpayed guruḥ // 68.007cd //
tīrthayātrā tu yā deva śvaḥ kartavyā surottama / 68.008ab /
tasyārambhamanujñātumarhase deva sarvathā // 68.008cd //
devamevantu vijñāpya tataḥ karma samārabhet / 68.009ab /
prarohaghaṭikābhyāntu vedikāṃ bhūṣitāṃ vrajet // 68.009cd //
||page:198
catuḥstambhāntu tanmadhye svastike pratimāṃ nyaset / 68.010ab /
kāmyārthāṃ lekhyacitreṣu sthāpya tatrādhivāsayet // 68.010cd //
vaiṣṇavaiḥ saha kurvīta ghṛtābhyaṅgantu mūlataḥ / 68.011ab /
ghṛtadhārābhiṣekaṃ vā sakalāṃ śarvarīṃ budhaḥ // 68.011cd //
darpaṇaṃ darśya nīrājaṃ gītavādyaiś ca maṅgalaṃ / 68.012ab /
vyajanaṃ pūjanaṃ dīpaṃ gandhapuṣpādibhiryajet // 68.012cd //
haridrāmudgakāśmīraśuklacūrṇādi mūrdhni / 68.013ab /
pratimāyāś ca bhaktānāṃ sarvatīrthaphalaṃ dhṛte // 68.013cd //
snāpayitvā samabhyarcya yātrāvimbaṃ rathe sthitaṃ / 68.014ab /
nayedgurur nadīrnādaiśchatrādyai rāṣṭrapālikāḥ // 68.014cd //
nimnagāyojanādarvāk tatra vedīntu kārayet / 68.015ab /
vāhanādavatāryainaṃ tasyāṃ vedyānniveśayet // 68.015cd //

abliṅgaiḥ vaidikair mantraistīrthānāvāhayettataḥ // 68.016cd //
āpo hiṣṭhopaniṣadaiḥ pūjayedarghyamukhyakaiḥ / 68.017ab /
punardevaṃ samādāya toye kṛtvāghamarṣaṇaṃ // 68.017cd //

||ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye devayātrotsavakathanaṃ nāma aṣṭaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ ||

||athonasaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
snānavidhānaṃ
agnir uvāca
brahman śṛṇu pravakṣāmi snapanotsavavistaraṃ / 69.001ab /
prāsādasyāgrataḥ kumbhānmaṇḍape maṇḍale nyaset // 69.001cd //
kuryād dhyānārcanaṃ homaṃ harerādau ca karmasu / 69.002ab /
sahasraṃ vā śataṃ vāpi homayet pūrṇayā saha // 69.002cd //
snānadravyāṇyathāhṛtya kalaśāṃścāpi vinyaset / 69.003ab /
adhivāsya sūtrakaṇṭhān dhārayenmaṇḍale ghaṭān // 69.003cd //
caturasraṃ puraṃ kṛtvā rudraistaṃ pravibhājyet / 69.004ab /
madhyena tu caruṃ sthāpya pārśve paṅktiṃ pramārjayet // 69.004cd //
śālicūrṇādināpūrya pūrvādinavakeṣu ca / 69.005ab /
kumbhamudrāṃ tato badhvā ghaṭaṃ tatrānayed budhaḥ // 69.005cd //
puṇḍarīkākṣamantreṇa darbhāṃstāṃstu visarjayet / 69.006ab /
adbhiḥ pūrṇaṃ sarvaratnayutaṃ madhye nyased ghaṭaṃ // 69.006cd //
yavavrīhitilāṃś caiva nīvarān śyāmakān kramāt / 69.007ab /
kulatthamudgasiddhārthāṃstacchuktānaṣṭadikṣu ca // 69.007cd //
aindre tu navake madhye ghṛtapūrṇaṃ ghaṭaṃ nyaset / 69.008ab /
palāśāśvatthanyagrodhavilvodumbaraśīrṣāṃ // 69.008cd //
jambūśamīkapitthānāṃ tvakkaṣāyair ghaṭāṣṭakaṃ / 69.009ab /
āgneyanavake madhye madhupūrṇaṃ ghaṭaṃ nyaset // 69.009cd //
gośṛṅganaśvagaṅgāgajendradaśaneṣu ca / 69.010ab /
tīrthakṣetrakhaleṣvaṣṭau mṛttikāḥ syurghaṭāṣṭake // 69.010cd //
||page:200
yāmye tu navake madhye tilatailaghaṭaṃ nyaset / 69.011ab /
nāraṅgamatha jambīraṃ kharjūraṃ mṛdvikāṃ kramāt // 69.011cd //
nārikelaṃ nyaset pūgaṃ dāḍimaṃ panasaṃ phalaṃ / 69.012ab /
nairṛte navake madhye kṣīrapūrṇaṃ ghaṭaṃ nyaset // 69.012cd //
kuṅkumaṃ nāgapuṣpañca campakaṃ mālatīṃ kramāt / 69.013ab /
mallikāmatha punnāgaṃ karavīraṃ mahotpalaṃ // 69.013cd //
puṣpāṇi cāpye navake madhye vai nārikelakam / 69.014ab /
nādayematha sāmudraṃ sārasaṃ kaupameva ca // 69.014cd //
varṣajaṃ himatoyañca nairjharaṅgāṅgameva ca / 69.015ab /
udakānyatha vāyavye navake kadalīphalaṃ // 69.015cd //
sahadevīṃ kumārīṃ ca siṃhīṃ vyāghrīṃ tathāmṛtāṃ / 69.016ab /
viṣṇuparṇīṃ śataśivāṃ vacāṃ divyauṣadhīrnyaset // 69.016cd //
pūrvādau saumyanavake madhye dadhighaṭaṃ nyaset / 69.017ab /
patramelāṃ tvacaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ bālakaṃ candanadvayaṃ // 69.017cd //
latāṃ kastūrikāṃ caiva kṛṣṇāgurumanukramāt / 69.018ab /
siddhadravyāṇi pūrvādau śāntitoyamathaikataḥ // 69.018cd //
candratāraṃ kramācchuklaṃ girisāraṃ trapu nyaset / 69.019ab /
ghanasāraṃ tathā śīrṣaṃ pūrvādau ratnameva ca // 69.019cd //
ghṛtenābhyarjya codvartya snapayenmūlamantrataḥ / 69.020ab /
gandhādyaiḥ pūjayedvahnau hutvā pūrṇāhutiṃ caret // 69.020cd //
baliñca sarvabhūtebhyo bhojayeddattadakṣiṇaḥ / 69.021ab /
devaiś ca munibhirbhūpair devaṃ saṃsthāpya ceśvarāḥ // 69.021cd //
||page:201
babhūvuḥ sthāpitvetthaṃ snapanotsavakaṃ caret / 69.022ab /
aṣṭottarasahasreṇa ghaṭānāṃ sarvabhāg bhavet // 69.022cd //

gaurīlakṣmīvivāhādi cotsavaṃ snānapūrvakam // 69.023cd //
||ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye yajñāvabhṛtasnānaṃ nāma ūnasaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ ||
||atha saptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
vṛkṣādipratiṣṭhākathanaṃ
bhagavānuvāca
pratiṣṭhāṃ pādapānāñca vakṣye 'haṃ bhuktimuktidāṃ / 70.001ab /
sarvauṣadhyudakair liptān piṣṭātakavibhūṣitān // 70.001cd //
vṛkṣānmālyair alaṅkṛtya vāsobhirabhiveṣṭayet / 70.002ab /
sūcyā sauvarṇayā kāryaṃ sarveṣāṃ karṇavedhanam // 70.002cd //
hemaśalākayāñjanañca vedyāntu phalasaptakam / 70.003ab /
adhivāsayecca pratyekaṃ ghaṭān balinivedanaṃ // 70.003cd //
indrāderadhivāso 'tha homaḥ kāryo vanaspateḥ / 70.004ab /
vṛkṣamadhyādutsṛjedgāṃ tato 'bhiṣekamantrataḥ // 70.004cd //
ṛgyajuḥsāmamantraiś ca vāruṇair maṅgalai ravaiḥ / 70.005ab /
vṛkṣavedikakumbhakaiś ca snapanaṃ dvijapuṅgavāḥ // 70.005cd //
tarūṇāṃ yajamānasya kuryuś ca yajamānakaḥ / 70.006ab /

||page:202
kṣīreṇa bhojanaṃ dadyādyāvaddinacatuṣṭayaṃ / 70.007ab /
homastilādyaiḥ kāryastu palāśasamidhais tathā // 70.007cd //
ācārye dviguṇaṃ dadyāt pūrvavan maṇḍapādikam / 70.008ab /
pāpanāśaḥ parā siddhirvṛkṣārāmapratiṣṭhayā // 70.008cd //
skandāyeśo yathā prāha pratiṣṭhādyaṃ tathā śṛṇu / 70.009ab /

gaṇeśapūjāvidhiḥ
aiśvara uvāca
gaṇapūjāṃ pravakṣyāmi nirvighnāmakhilārthadāṃ / 71.001ab /
gaṇāya svāhā hṛdayamekadaṃṣṭrāya vai śiraḥ // 71.001cd //
gajakarṇine ca śikhā gajavaktrāya varma ca / 71.002ab /
mahodarāya svadantahastāyākṣi tathāstrakam // 71.002cd //

mukhyāsthimaṇḍalaṃ cādhaścordhvacchadanamarcayet // 71.003cd //

||page:203
satyāṃ ca vighnanāśā ca āsanaṃ gandhamṛttikā / 71.005ab /

īśvara uvāca

||page:204

sarvadikṣu kṣipet pūrvaṃ hūṃ phaḍantaśarātmanā // 72.009cd //

sarvāṅgamaṅgajaptena mūrdhādicaraṇāvadhi // 72.010cd //
dakṣiṇena samālabhya paṭhannaṅgacatuṣṭayam / 72.011ab /

śivaṃ smarannimajjeta hariṃ gaṅgeti vā smaran / 72.012ab /

||page:205
īśatatpuruṣāghoraguhyakājātasañcaraiḥ // 72.016cd //

||page:206
praskandamālinīṃ dakṣe vāme daṇḍakamaṇḍaluṃ // 72.027cd //

||page:207
tarpaṇaṃ sampravakṣyāmi devatīrthena mantrakāt / 72.039ab /

atreye 'tha vasiṣṭhāya namaścātha pulastaye / 72.042ab /

pracetase manuṣyāṃś ca sanakāya vaṣaṭ tathā / 72.043ab /

sūryapūjāvidhiḥ
īśvara uvāca
vakṣye sūryārcanaṃ skanda karāṅganyāsapūrvakaṃ / 73.001ab /
ahaṃ tejomayaḥ sūrya iti dhyātvārghyamarcayet // 73.001cd //
pūrayedraktavarṇena lalāṭākṛṣṭavindunā / 73.002ab /
taṃ saṃpūjya raveraṅgaiḥ kṛtvā rakṣāvaguṇṭhanaṃ // 73.002cd //
samprokṣya tajjalair dravyaṃ pūrvāsyo bhānumarcayet / 73.003ab /
oṃ aṃ hṛdvījādi sarvatra pūjanaṃ daṇḍipiṅgalau // 73.003cd //
dvāri dakṣe vāmapārśve īśāne aṃ gaṇāya ca / 73.004ab /
agnau guruṃ pīṭhamadhye prabhūtaṃ cāsanaṃ yajet // 73.004cd //
agnyādau vimalaṃ sāramārādhyaṃ paramaṃ sukhaṃ / 73.005ab /
sitaraktapītanīlavarṇān siṃhanibhān yajet // 73.005cd //
padmamadhye rāṃ ca dīptāṃ rīṃ sūkṣmāṃ raṃ jayāṃkramāt / 73.006ab /
rūṃ bhadrāṃ reṃ vibhūtīś ca vimalāṃ raimamoghayā // 73.006cd //
roṃ rauṃ vidyutā śaktiṃ pūrvādyāḥ sarvatomukhāḥ / 73.007ab /
||page:209
raṃ madhye arkāsanaṃ syāt sūryamūrtiṃ ṣaḍakṣaraṃ // 73.007cd //
oṃ haṃ khaṃ kholkayeti yajedāvāhya bhāskaraṃ / 73.008ab /
lalāṭākṛṣṭamañjalyāṃ dhyātvā raktaṃ nyasedraviṃ // 73.008cd //
hrāṃ hrīṃ saḥ sūryāya namo mudrayāvāhanādikaṃ / 73.009ab /
vidhāya prītaye vimbamudrāṃ gandhādikaṃ dadet // 73.009cd //
padmamudrāṃ bilvamudrāṃ pradarśyāgnau hṛdīritaṃ / 73.010ab /
oṃ āṃ hṛdayāya namaḥ arkāya śirase tathā // 73.010cd //
bhūrbhuvaḥ svaḥ sureśāya śikhāyai nairṛte yajet / 73.011ab /
huṃ kavacāya vāyavye hāṃ netrāyeti madhyataḥ // 73.011cd //
vaḥ astrāyeti pūrvādau tato mudrāḥ pradarśayet / 73.012ab /
dhenumudrā hṛdādīnāṃ goviṣāṇā ca netrayoḥ // 73.012cd //
astrasya trāsanī yojyā grahaṇāṃ ca namaskriyā / 73.013ab /
soṃ somaṃ buṃ budhaṃ vṛñca jīvaṃ bhaṃ bhārgavaṃ yajet // 73.013cd //
dale pūrvādike 'gnyādau aṃ bhaumaṃ śaṃ śanaiś caraṃ / 73.014ab /
raṃ rāhuṃ keṃ ketave ca gandhādyaiś ca khakholkayā // 73.014cd //
mūlaṃ japtvārghyapātrāmbu datvā sūryāya saṃstutiḥ / 73.015ab /
natvā parāṅmukhañcārkaṃ kṣamasveti tato vadet // 73.015cd //
śarāṇunā phaḍantena samāhatyāṇusaṃhṛtiṃ / 73.016ab /
||page:210
hṛtpadme śivasūryetisaṃhāriṇyopasaṃskṛtiṃ // 73.016cd //
yojayettejaś caṇḍāya ravinirmālyamarpayet / 73.017ab /
abhyarcyaiśe japāddhyānāddhomātsarvaṃ raverbhavet // 73.017cd //
||ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye sūryapūjā nāma trisaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ ||
||atha catuḥsaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
śivapūjākathanaṃ
īśvara uvāca
śivapūjāṃ pravakṣyāmi ācamya praṇavārghyavān / 74.001ab /
dvāramastrāmbunā prokṣya homādidvārapānyajet // 74.001cd //
gaṇaṃ sarasvatīṃ lakṣmīmūrdhvodumbarake yajet / 74.002ab /
nandigaṅge dakṣiṇe 'tha sthite vāmagate yajet // 74.002cd //
mahākālaṃ ca yamunāṃ divyadṛṣṭinipātitaḥ / 74.003ab /
utsārya divyān vighnāṃś ca puṣpākṣepāntarikṣagān // 74.003cd //
dakṣapārṣṇitribhirghātaibhūmiṣṭhānyāgamandiraṃ / 74.004ab /
dehalīṃ laṅghayedvāmaśākhāmāśritya vai viśet // 74.004cd //
praviśya dakṣapādena vinyasyāstramudumbare / 74.005ab /
oṃ hāṃ vāstvadhipataye brahmaṇe madhyato yajet // 74.005cd //
saṃhāriṣṇopasaṃhṛtamiti ga, ṅa, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ
||page:211
nirīkṣaṇādibhiḥ śastraiḥ śuddhānādāya gaḍḍukān / 74.006ab /
labdhānujñaḥ śivānmaunī gaṅgādikamanuvrajet // 74.006cd //

pūrayedambudhau tāṃstān gayatryā hṛdayena vā // 74.007cd //
gandhakākṣata puṣpādisarvadravyasamuccayaṃ / 74.008ab /
sannidhīkṛtya pūjārthaṃ bhūtaśuddhādi kārayet // 74.008cd //
devadakṣe tato nyasya saumyāsyaś ca śarīrataḥ / 74.009ab /

pakṣadvayamiḍādīnāṃ trayaṃ cājye vibhāvayet / 75.036ab /

svetyagnau hā ghṛte bhāgaṃ śeṣamājyaṃ kṣipet kramāt / 75.037ab /
oṃ hāṃ agnaye svāhā / oṃ hāṃ somāya svāhā / oṃ hāṃ agnīṣomābhyāṃ svāhā
udghāṭanāya netrāṇāṃ agnernetratraye mukhe // 75.037cd //
sruveṇa ghṛtapūrṇena caturthīmāhutiṃ yajet / 75.038ab /
oṃ hāṃ agnaye sviṣṭakṛte svāhā abhimantrya ṣaḍaṅgena bodhayeddhenumudrayā // 75.038cd //
avaguṇṭhya tanutreṇa rakṣedājyaṃ śarāṇunā / 75.039ab /
hṛdājyavinduvikṣepāt kuryādabhyukṣya śodhanaṃ // 75.039cd //
vaktrābhighārasandhānāṃ vaktraikīkaraṇaṃ tathā / 75.040ab /
oṃ hāṃ sadyojātāya svāhā / oṃ hāṃ vāmadevāya svāhā / oṃ hāṃ
||page:223
aghorāya svāhā / oṃ tatpuruṣāya svāhā / oṃ hāṃ īśānāya svāhā
ityekaikaghṛtāhutyā kuryādvaktrābhighārakaṃ // 75.040cd //
auṃ hāṃ sadyojātavāmadevābhyāṃ svāhā / oṃ hāṃ vāmadevāghorābhyāṃ svāhā / oṃ hāṃ aghoratatpuruṣābhyāṃ svāhā / oṃ hāṃ tatpuruṣeśānābhyāṃ svāhā
itivaktrānusandhānaṃ mantrair ebhiḥ kramāccaret / 75.041ab /
agrito gatayā vāyuṃ nirṛtādiśivāntayā // 75.041cd //

itīṣṭavaktre vaktrāṇāmantarbhāvastadākṛtiḥ // 75.042ef //
īśena vahnimabhyarcya datvāstreṇāhutitrayaṃ / 75.043ab /
kuryāt sarvātmanā nāma śivāgnistvaṃ hutāśana // 75.043cd //
hṛdārcitau visṛṣṭāgnau pitarau vidhipūraṇīṃ / 75.044ab /
mūlena vauṣaḍantena dadyāt pūrṇāṃ yathāvidhi // 75.044cd //
tato hṛdambuje sāṅgaṃ sasenaṃ bhāsuraṃ paraṃ / 75.045ab /
yajet pūrvavadāvāhya prārthyājñāntarpayecchivaṃ // 75.045cd //
yāgāgniśivayoḥ kṛtvā nāḍīsandhānamātmanā / 75.046ab /
śaktyā mūlāṇunā homaṃ kuryādaṅgair daśāṃśataḥ // 75.046cd //
ghṛtasya kārṣiko homaḥ kṣīrasya madhunas tathā / 75.047ab /
śaktimātrāhutirdadhnaḥ prasṛtiḥ pāyasyatu // 75.047cd //
yathāvat sarvabhakṣāṇāṃ lājānāṃ muṣṭisammitaṃ / 75.048ab /
khaṇḍatrayantu mūlānāṃ kalānāṃ svapramāṇataḥ // 75.048cd //
||page:224
grāsārdhamātramannānāṃ sūkṣmāṇi pañca homayet / 75.049ab /
ikṣorāparvikaṃ mānaṃ latānāmaṅguladvayaṃ // 75.049cd //
puṣpaṃ patraṃ svamānena samidhāṃ tu daśāṅgulaṃ / 75.050ab /
candracandanakāśmīrakastūrīyakṣakardamān // 75.050cd //
kalāyasammitānenān guggulaṃ vadarāsthivat / 75.051ab /
kandānāmaṣṭamaṃ bhāgaṃ juhuyādvidhivat paraṃ // 75.051cd //
homaṃ nirvartayedevaṃ brahmavījapadaistataḥ / 75.052ab /
ghṛtena sruci pūrṇāyāṃ nidhāyādhomukhaṃ sruvaṃ // 75.052cd //
srugagre puṣpamāropya paścādvāmena pāṇinā / 75.053ab /
punaḥ savyena tau dhṛtvā śaṅkhasannibhamudrayā // 75.053cd //
samudgato ardhakāyaś ca samapādaḥ samitthitaḥ / 75.054ab /
nābhau tanmūlamādhāya srugagravyagralocanaḥ // 75.054cd //
brahmādikāraṇātyāgādviniḥsṛtya suṣumṇayā / 75.055ab /
vāmastanāntamānīya tayormūlamatandritaḥ // 75.055cd //
mūlamantramavispaṣṭaṃ vauṣaḍantaṃ samuccaret / 75.056ab /
tadagnau juhuyādājyaṃ yavasammitadhārayā // 75.056cd //
ācāmaṃ candanaṃ datvā tāmbūlaprabhṛtīnapi / 75.057ab /
bhaktyā tadbhūtimāvandya vidadhyātpraṇatiṃ parāṃ // 75.057cd //
tato vahniṃ samabhyarcya paḍantāstreṇa saṃvarān / 75.058ab /
saṃhāramudrayāhṛtya kṣamasvetyabhidhāya ca // 75.058cd //
bhāsurān paridhīstāṃś ca pūrakeṇa hṛdāṇunā / 75.059ab /
||page:225
śraddhayā parayātmīye sthāpayeta hṛdambuje // 75.059cd //
sarvapākāgramādāya kṛtvā maṇḍalakadvayaṃ / 75.060ab /
antarvahirbaliṃ dadyādāgneyyāṃ kuṇḍasannidhau // 75.060cd //
oṃ hāṃ rudrebhyaḥ svāhā pūrve mātṛbhyo dakṣiṇe tathā / 75.061ab /
vāruṇe hāṃ gaṇebhyaś ca svāhā tebhyastvayaṃ baliḥ // 75.061cd //
uttare hāñca yakṣebhya īśāne hāṃ grahebhya u / 75.062ab /
agnau hāmasurebhyaś ca rakṣobhyo nairṛte baliḥ // 75.062cd //
vāyavye hāñca nāgebhyo nakṣatrebhyaś ca madhyataḥ / 75.063ab /
hāṃ rāśibhyaḥ svāhā vahnau viśvebhyo nairṛte yathā // 75.063cd //
vāruṇyāṃ kṣetrapālāya antarbalirudāhṛtaḥ / 75.064ab /
dvitīye maṇḍale vāhye indyāyāgniyamāya ca // 75.064cd //
nairṛtāya jaleśāya vāyave dhanarakṣiṇe / 75.065ab /
īśānāya ca pūrvādau hīśāne brahmaṇe namaḥ // 75.065cd //
nairṛte viṣṇave svāhā vāyasādervahirbaliḥ / 75.066ab /
balidvayagatānmantrān saṃhāramudrayātmani // 75.066cd //
||ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye agnikāryaṃ nāma pañcasaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ ||

||atha ṣaṭsaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
caṇdapūjākathanaṃ
īśvara uvāca
tataḥ śivāntikaṅgatvā pūjāhomādikaṃ mama / 76.001ab /
gṛhāṇa bhagavan puṇyaphalamityabhidhāya ca // 76.001cd //
arghyodakena devāya mudrayodbhavasañjñayā / 76.002ab /
hṛdvījapūrvamūlena sthiracitto nivedayet // 76.002cd //
tataḥ pūrvavadabhyarcya stutvā stotraiḥ praṇamya ca / 76.003ab /
arghyaṃ parāṅmukhaṃ datvā kṣamasvetyabhidhāya ca // 76.003cd //
nārācamudrayāstreṇa phaḍantenātmasañcayaṃ / 76.004ab /
saṃhṛtya divyayā liṅgaṃ mūrtimantreṇa yojayet // 76.004cd //
sthaṇḍile tvarcite deve mantrasaṅghātamātmani / 76.005ab /
niyojya vidhinoktena vidadhyāccaṇḍapūjanaṃ // 76.005cd //
oṃ caṇḍeśānāya namo madhyataś caṇḍamūrtaye / 76.006ab /
oṃ dhūlicaṇḍeśvarāya hūṃ phaṭ svāhā tamāhṇayet // 76.006cd //
caṇḍahṛdayāya hūṃ phaṭ oṃ caṇḍaśirase tathā / 76.007ab /
oṃ caṇḍaśikhāyai hūṃ phaṭ caṇḍāyuḥ kavacāya ca // 76.007cd //
caṇḍastrāya tathā hūṃ phaṭ caṇḍaṃ rudrāgnijaṃ smaret / 76.008ab /
śūlaṭaṅkadharaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ sākṣasūtrakaṇḍaluṃ // 76.008cd //
ṭaṅkākare 'rdhacandre vā caturvaktraṃ prapūjayet / 76.009ab /
||page:227
yathāśakti japaṃ kuryādaṅgānāntu daśāṃśataḥ // 76.009cd //
gobhūhiraṇyavastrādimaṇihemādibhūṣaṇaṃ / 76.010ab /
vihāya śesanirmālyaṃ caṇḍeśāya nivedayet // 76.010cd //
lehyacoṣyādyanuvaraṃ tāmbūlaṃ sragvilepanaṃ / 76.011ab /
nirmālyaṃ bhojanaṃ tubhyaṃ pradattantu śivājñayā // 76.011cd //
sarvametat kriyākāṇḍaṃ mayā caṇḍa tavājñayā / 76.012ab /
nyūnādhikaṃ kṛtaṃ mohāt paripūrṇaṃ sadāstu me // 76.012cd //
iti vijñāpya deveśaṃ datvārghyaṃ tasya saṃsmaran / 76.013ab /
saṃhāramūrtimantreṇa śanaiḥ saṃhāramudrayā // 76.013cd //

||ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye caṇḍapūjākathanaṃ nāma ṣaṭsaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ ||
||atha saptasaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
kapilādipūjāvidhanaṃ
īśvara uvāca
kapilāpūjanaṃ vakṣye ebhirmantrair yajecca gāṃ / 77.001ab /
oṃ kapile nande namaḥ oṃ kapile bhadrike namaḥ // 77.001cd //
oṃ kapile suśīle namaḥ kapile surabhiprabhe / 77.002ab /
oṃ kapile sumanase namaḥ oṃ bhuktimuktiprade namaḥ // 77.002cd //
saurabheyi jaganmātardevānāmamṛtaprade / 77.003ab /
gṛhāṇa varade grāsamīpsitārthañca dehi me // 77.003cd //
||page:228
vanditāsi vasiṣṭhena viśvāmitreṇa dhīmatā / 77.004ab /
kapile hara me pāpaṃ yanmayā duṣkṛtaṃ kṛtaṃ // 77.004cd //
gāvo mamāgrato nityaṃ gāvaḥ pṛṣṭhata eva ca / 77.005ab /
gāvo me hṛdaye cāpi gavāṃ madhye vasāmyahaṃ // 77.005cd //
dattaṃ gṛhṇantu me grāsaṃ japtvā syāṃ nirmalaḥ śivaḥ / 77.006ab /
prārcya vidyāpustakāni gurupādau namennaraḥ // 77.006cd //
yajet snātvā tu madhyāhne aṣṭapuṣpikayā śivaṃ / 77.007ab /
pīṭhamūrtiśivāṅgānāṃ pūjā syādaṣṭapuṣpikā // 77.007cd //
madhyāhne bhojanāgāre sulipte pākamānayet / 77.008ab /
tato mṛtyuñjayenaiva vauṣaḍantena saptadhā // 77.008cd //
japtaiḥ sadarbhaśaṅkhasthaiḥ siñcettaṃ vārivindubhiḥ / 77.009ab /
sarvapākāgramuddhṛtya śivāya vinivedayet // 77.009cd //
athārdhaṃ cullikāhome vidhānāyopakalpayet / 77.010ab /
viśodhya vidhinā cullīṃ tadvahniṃ pūrakāhutiṃ // 77.010cd //
hutvā nābhyagninā caikaṃ tato recakavāyunā / 77.011ab /
vahnivījaṃ samādāya kādisthānagatikramāt // 77.011cd //
śivāgnistvamiti dhyātvā cullikāgnau niveśayet / 77.012ab /
oṃ hāṃ agnaye namo vai hāṃ somāya vai namaḥ // 77.012cd //
sūryāya vṛhaspataye prajānāṃ pataye namaḥ / 77.013ab /
sarvebhyaś caiva devebhyaḥ sarvaviśvebhya eva ca // 77.013cd //
kādisthānamatikramāditi kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ 
||page:229
hāmagnaye khiṣṭikṛte pūrvādāvarcayedimān / 77.014ab /
svāhāntāmāhutiṃ datvā kṣamayitvā visarjayet // 77.014cd //
cullyā dakṣiṇabāhau ca yajeddharmāya vai namaḥ / 77.015ab /
vāmabāhāvadharmāya kāñjikādikabhāṇḍake // 77.015cd //
rasaparivartamānāya varuṇāya jalāgnaye / 77.016ab /
vighnarājo gṛhadvāre peṣaṇyāṃ subhage namaḥ // 77.016cd //
oṃ raudrike namo girike namaś caolūkhale yajet / 77.017ab /
balapriyāyāyudhāya namaste muṣale yajet // 77.017cd //

madhyastambhe ca skandāya datvā vāstubaliṃ tataḥ // 77.018cd //
bhuñjīta pātre sauvarṇe padminyādidalādike / 77.019ab /
ācāryaḥ sādhakaḥputra samayī maunamāsthitaḥ // 77.019cd //
vaṭāśvatthārkavātāvisarjabhallātakāṃstyajet / 77.020ab /
apośānaṃ purādāya prāṇādyaiḥ praṇavānvitaiḥ // 77.020cd //
svāhāntenāhutīḥ pañca datvādīpyodarānalaṃ / 77.021ab /
nāgaḥ kūrmo 'tha kṛkaro devadatto dhanañjayaḥ // 77.021cd //
etebhya upavāyubhyaḥ svāhāpoṣānavāriṇā / 77.022ab /
bhaktādikaṃ nivedyāya piveccheṣodakaṃ naraḥ // 77.022cd //
amṛtopastaraṇamasi prāṇāhutīstato dadet / 77.023ab /

udānāya ca vyānāya bhuktvā cullakamācaret / 77.024ab /

||ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye vāstupūjākathanaṃ nāma saptasaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ ||

pavitrārohaṇakathanaṃ
īśvara uvāca
pavitrārohaṇaṃ vakṣye kriyārcādiṣu pūraṇaṃ / 78.001ab /
nityaṃ tannityamuddiṣṭaṃ naimittikamathāparaṃ // 78.001cd //
āṣāḍhādicaturdaśyāmatha śrāvaṇabhādrayoḥ / 78.002ab /
sitāsitāsu kartavyaṃ caturdaśyaṣṭamīṣu tat // 78.002cd //
kuryādvā kārttikīṃ yāvattithau pratipādike / 78.003ab /
vahnibrahmāmbikebhāsyanāgaskandārkaśūlināṃ // 78.003cd //
durgāyamendragovindasmaraśambhusudhābhujāṃ / 78.004ab /
sauvarṇaṃ rājataṃ tāmraṃ kṛtādiṣu yathākramaṃ // 78.004cd //
kalau kārpāsajaṃ cāpi paṭṭapadmādisūtrakaṃ / 78.005ab /
praṇavaś candramā vahnirbrahmā nāgo guho hariḥ // 78.005cd //
sarveśaḥ sarvadevāḥ syuḥ krameṇa navatantuṣu / 78.006ab /
aṣṭottaraśatānyardhaṃ tadardhaṃ cottamādikaṃ // 78.006cd //
ekāśītyāthavā sūtraistriṃśatāppaṣṭayuktayā / 78.007ab /
||page:231
pañcāśatā vā kartavyaṃ tulyagranthyantarālakaṃ // 78.007cd //
dvādaśāṅgulamānāni vyāsādaṣṭāṅgulāni ca / 78.008ab /
liṅgavistāramānāni caturaṅgulakāni vā // 78.008cd //
tathaiva piṇḍikāsparśaṃ caturthaṃ sarvadaivataṃ / 78.009ab /
gaṅgāvatārakaṃ kāryaṃ sujātena sudhautakaṃ // 78.009cd //
granthiṃ kuryācca vāmena aghoraṇātha śodhayet / 78.010ab /

kastūrīrocanācandrair haridrāgair ikādibhiḥ / 78.011ab /

antaraṃ vā yathāśobhamekadvicaturaṅgulaṃ / 78.012ab /
prakṛtiḥ pauruṣī vīrā caturthī tvaparājitā // 78.012cd //
jayānyā vijayā ṣaṣṭhī ajitā ca sadāśivā / 78.013ab /
manonmanī sarvamukhī granthayo 'bhyadhikāḥ śubhāḥ // 78.013cd //
kāryā vā candravahnyarkapavitraṃ śivavaddhṛdi / 78.014ab /
ekaikaṃ nijamūrtau vā puptake guruke gaṇe // 78.014cd //
syādekaikaṃ tathā dvāradikpālakalaśādiṣu / 78.015ab /
hastādinavahastāntaṃ liṅgānāṃ syātpavitrakaṃ // 78.015cd //
aṣṭāviṃśatito yuddhaṃ daśabhirdaśabhiḥ kramāt / 78.016ab /
dvyaṅgulābhyantarāstatra kramādekāṅgulāntarāḥ // 78.016cd //

saptamyāṃ vā trayodaśyāṃ kṛtanityakriyaḥ śuciḥ // 78.017cd //
bhūṣayet puṣpavastrādyaiḥ sāyāhne yāgamandiraṃ / 78.018ab /
||page:232
kṛtvā naimittikīṃ sandhyāṃ viśeṣeṇa ca tarpaṇaṃ // 78.018cd //
parigṛhīte bhūbhāge pavitre sūryamarcayet / 78.019ab /
ācamya sakalīkṛtya praṇavārghyakaro guruḥ // 78.019cd //
dvārāṇyastreṇa samprokṣya pūrvādikramato 'rcayet / 78.020ab /
hāṃ śāntikalādvārāya tathā vidyākalātmane // 78.020cd //
nivṛttikalādvārāya pratiṣṭhākhyakalātmane / 78.021ab /
tacchākhayoḥ pratidvāraṃ dvau dvau dvārādhipau yajet // 78.021cd //
nandine mahākālāya bhṛṅgiṇe 'tha gaṇāya ca / 78.022ab /
vṛṣabhāya ca skandāya devyai caṇḍāya ca kramāt // 78.022cd //
nityaṃ ca dvārapālādīn praviśya dvārapaścime / 78.023ab /
iṣṭvā vāstuṃ bhūtaśuddhiṃ viśeṣārghyakaraḥ śivaḥ // 78.023cd //
prokṣaṇādyaṃ vidhāyātha yajñasambhārakṛnnaraḥ / 78.024ab /
mantrayeddarbhadūrvādyaiḥ puṣpādyaiś ca hṛdādibhiḥ // 78.024cd //
śivahastaṃ vidhāyetthaṃ svaśirasyadhiropayet / 78.025ab /
śivo 'hamādiḥ sarvajño mama yajñapradhānatā // 78.025cd //
atyarthaṃ bhāvayeddevaṃ jñānakhadgakaro guruḥ / 78.026ab /
nairṛtīṃ diśamāsādya prakṣipedudagānanaḥ // 78.026cd //
arghyāmbu pañcagavyañca samastān makhamaṇḍape / 78.027ab /

vikṣipya vikirāṃstatra kuśakūrcopasaṃharet / 78.028ab /
||page:233
tānīśadiśi vardhanyāmāsanāyopakalpayet // 78.028cd //
nairṛte vāstugīrvāṇā dvāre lakṣmīṃ prapūjayet / 78.029ab /
paścimābhimukhaṃ kumbhaṃ sarvadhānyopari sthitaṃ // 78.029cd //

snāpayet pūrvavat prārcya kuṇḍe ca śivapāvakaṃ / 78.037ab /

īśvara uvāca

nirvāṇadīkṣākathanaṃ

dagdhaniḥśeṣapāpasya brahmannasya paśostvayā // 84.054cd //
bandhāya na punaḥ stheyaṃ śivājñāṃ śrāvayediti / 84.055ab /
tato visṛjya dhātāraṃ nāḍyā dakṣiṇayā śanaiḥ // 84.055cd //
saṃhāramudrayātmānaṃ kumbhakena nijātmanā / 84.056ab /
rāhuyuktaikadeśena candravimbena sannibhaṃ // 84.056cd //
ādāya yojayet sūtre recakenodbhavākhyayā / 84.057ab /
pūjayitvārghyapātrasthatoyavindusudhopamaṃ // 84.057cd //
visṛjya pitarau dadyādvauṣaḍantaśivāṇunā / 84.058ab /
pūraṇāya vidhiḥ pūrṇā nivṛttiriti śodhitā // 84.058cd //
||ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye nirvāṇadīkṣāyāṃ nivṛttikalāśodhanaṃ nāma caturaśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ ||
||page:268
||atha pañcāśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
pratiṣṭhākalāśodhanoktiḥ
īśvara uvāca
tattvayoratha sandhānaṃ kuryācchuddhaviśuddhayoḥ / 85.001ab /
hrasvadīrghaprayogeṇa nādanādāntasaṅginā // 85.001cd //
oṃ hāṃ hrūṃ hāṃaptejo vāyurākāśaṃ tanmātrendriyabuddhayaḥ / 85.002ab /
guṇatrayamahaṅkāraś caturviṃśaḥ pumāniti // 85.002cd //
pratiṣṭhāyāṃ niviṣṭhāni tattvānyetāni bhāvayet / 85.003ab /
pañcaviṃśatisaṅkhyāni khādiyāntākṣarāṇi ca // 85.003cd //
pañcāśadadhikā ṣaṣṭirbhuvanaistulyasañjñitāḥ / 85.004ab /
tāvanta eva rudrāś ca vijñeyāstatra tadyathā // 85.004cd //
amareśaḥ prabhāvaś ca nemiṣaḥ puṣkaro 'pi ca / 85.005ab /
tathā pādiś ca daṇḍiś ca bhāvabhūtirathāṣṭamaḥ // 85.005cd //
nakulīśo hariś candraḥ śrīśailo daśamaḥ smṛtaḥ / 85.006ab /
anvīśo 'srātikeśaś ca mahākālo 'tha madhyamaḥ // 85.006cd //
kedāro bhairavaś caiva dvitīyāṣṭakamīritaṃ / 85.007ab /
tato gayākurukṣetrakhalānādikanādike // 85.007cd //
vimalaścāṭṭahāsaś ca mahendro bhāma eva ca / 85.008ab /
vasvāpadaṃ rudrakoṭiraviyukto mahāvantaḥ // 85.008cd //
gokarṇo bhadrakarṇaś ca svarṇākṣaḥ sthāṇureva ca / 85.009ab /
ajeśaś caiva sarvajño bhāsvaraḥ sūdanāntaraḥ // 85.009cd //
subāhurmattarūpī ca viśālo jaṭilas tathā / 85.010ab /
||page:269
raudro 'tha piṅgalākṣaś ca kāladaṃṣṭrī bhavettataḥ // 85.010cd //
viduraś caiva ghoraś ca prājāpatyo hutāśanaḥ / 85.011ab /
kāmarūpī tathā kālaḥ karṇo 'pyatha bhayānakaḥ // 85.011cd //
mataṅgaḥ piṅgalaś caiva haro vai dhātṛsajñakaḥ / 85.012ab /
śaṅkukarṇo vidhānaś ca śrīkaṇṭhaś candraśekharaḥ // 85.012cd //
sahaitena ca paryantāḥ kathyante 'tha padānyapi / 85.013ab /
vyāpin oṃ arūpa oṃ pramatha oṃ tejaḥ oṃ jyotiḥ oṃ puruṣa oṃ agne oṃ adhūma oṃ abhasma oṃ anādi oṃ nānā oṃ dhūdhū oṃ bhūḥ oṃ bhuvaḥ oṃ svaḥ anidhana nidhanodbhava śiva śarva paramātman maheśvara mahādeva sadbhāveśvara mahātejaḥ yogādhipataye muñca prathama sarva sarvesarveti dvātriṃśat padāni vījabhāve trayo mantrā vāmadevaḥ śivaḥ śikhā // 85.013cd //
gāndhārī ca suṣumṇā ca nāḍyau dvau mārutau tathā / 85.014ab /
samānodānanāmānau rasanāpāyurindriye // 85.014cd //
rasastu viṣayo rūpaśabdasparśarasā guṇāḥ / 85.015ab /
maṇḍalaṃ vartulaṃ tacca puṇḍarīkāṅkitaṃ sitaṃ // 85.015cd //
svapnāvasthāpratiṣṭhāyāṃ kāraṇaṃ garuḍadhvajaṃ / 85.016ab /
pratiṣṭhāntakṛtaṃ sarvaṃ sañcintya bhuvanādikaṃ // 85.016cd //
sūtraṃ dehe svamantreṇa praviśyaināṃ viyojayet / 85.017ab /
oṃ hāṃ khīṃ hāṃ pratiṣṭhākalāpāśāya oṃ phaṭ svāhāntenānainaiva pūrakeṇāṅkuśamudrayā samākarṣet tataḥ oṃ hāṃ hrūṃ hrāṃ hrūṃ pratiṣṭhā kalāpāśāya hrūṃ phaḍityanena saṃhāramudrayā kumbhakena hṛdayādadho nāḍī-[!!!]
||page:270
sūtrādādāya oṃ hāṃ hrūṃ hrāṃ hāṃ pratiṣṭhākalāpāśāya nama ity anenodbhavamudrayā recakena kumbhe samāropayet oṃ hāṃ hrīṃ pratiṣṭhākalāpāśāya nama ity anenārcayitvā sampūjya svāhāntenāhutīnāṃ trayeṇa sannidhāya tataḥ oṃ hāṃ viṣṇave nama iti viṣṇumāvāhya sampūjya santarpya
viṣṇo tavādhikāre 'smin mumukṣuṃ dīkṣayāmyahaṃ // 85.017cd //
bhāvyaṃ tvayānukūlena viṣṇuṃ vijñāpayediti / 85.018ab /
tato vāgīśvarīṃ devīṃ vāgīśamapi pūrvavat // 85.018cd //
āvāhyābhyarcya santarpya śiṣyaṃ vakṣasi tāḍayet / 85.019ab /
oṃ hāṃ hāṃ haṃ phaṭpraviśedapyanenaiva caitanyaṃ vibhajettataḥ // 85.019cd //
śastreṇa pāśasaṃyuktaṃ jyeṣṭayāṅkuśamudrayā / 85.020ab /
oṃ hāṃ haṃ hoṃ hrūṃ phaṭ
svāhāntena hṛdākṛṣya tenaiva puṭitātmanā // 85.020cd //
gṛhītvā taṃ namontena nijātmani niyojayet / 85.021ab /
oṃ hāṃ haṃ hoṃ  ātmane namaḥ
pūrvavat pitṛsaṃyogaṃ bhāvayitvodbhavākhyayā // 85.021cd //
vāmayā tadanenaiva devīgarbhe vinikṣipet / 85.022ab /
oṃ hāṃ haṃ hāṃ ātmane namaḥ
dehotpattau hṛdā hy evaṃ śirasā janmanā tathā // 85.022cd //
||page:271
śikhayā vādhikārāya bhogāya kavacāṇunā / 85.023ab /
tattvaśuddhau hṛdā hy evaṃ garbhādhānāya pūrvavat // 85.023cd //
śirasā pāśaśaithilye niṣkṛtyaivaṃ śataṃ japet / 85.024ab /
evaṃ pāśaviyoge 'pi tataḥ śāstrajaptayā // 85.024cd //
chindyādastreṇa kartaryā kalāvījavatā yathā / 85.025ab /
oṃ hrīṃ pratiṣṭhākalāpāśāya haḥ phaṭ
visṛjya vartulīkṛtya pāśamantreṇa pūrvavat // 85.025cd //
ghṛtapūrṇe śrave datvā kalāstreṇaiva homayet / 85.026ab /
astreṇa juhuyāt pañca pāśāṅkuranivṛttaye // 85.026cd //
prāyaścittaniṣedhārthaṃ dadyādaṣṭāhutīstataḥ / 85.027ab /
oṃ haḥ astrāya hrūṃ phaṭhṛdāvāhya hṛṣīkeśaṃ kṛtvā pūjatarpaṇe // 85.027cd //
pūrvoktavidhinā kuryādadhikārasamarpaṇaṃ / 85.028ab /
oṃ hāṃ rasaśulkaṃ gṛhāṇa svāhā
niḥśeṣadagdhapāśasya paśorasya hare tvayā // 85.028cd //
na stheyaṃ bandhakatvena śivājñāṃ śrāvayediti / 85.029ab /
tato visṛjya govindaṃ vidyātmānaṃ niyojya ca // 85.029cd //
bāhumuktārdhadṛśyena candravimbena sannibhaṃ / 85.030ab /
saṃhāramudrayā svasthaṃ vidhāyodbhavamudrayā // 85.030cd //
sūtre saṃyojya vinyasya toyavinduṃ yathā purā / 85.031ab /
visṛjya pitarau vahneḥ pūjitau kusumādibhiḥ / 85.031cd /
||page:272
dadyāt pūrṇāṃ vidhānena pratiṣṭhāpi viśodhitā // 85.031ef //
||ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye nirvāṇadīkṣāyāṃ pratiṣṭhākalāśodhanaṃ nāma pañcāśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ ||
||atha ṣaḍaśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
vidyāviśodhanavidhānaṃ
īśvara uvāca
sandhānamatha vidyāyāḥ prācīnakalayā saha / 86.001ab /
kurvīta pūrvavat kṛtvā tattvaṃ varṇaya tadyathā // 86.001cd //
oṃ hoṃ kṣīmiti sandhānaṃ
rāgś ca śuddhavidyā ca niyatiḥ kalayā saha / 86.002ab /
kālo mayā tathāvidyā tattvānāmiti saptakaṃ // 86.002cd //
ralavāḥ śaṣasāḥ varṇāḥ ṣaḍ vidyāyāṃ prakīrtitāḥ / 86.003ab /
padāni praṇavādīni ekaviṃśatisaṅkhyayā // 86.003cd //
oṃ namaḥ śivāya sarvaprabhave haṃ śivāya īśānamūrdhāya tatpuruṣavaktrāya aghorahṛdayāya vāmadevaguhyāya sadyojātamūrtaye oṃ namo namo guhyātiguhyāya goptre anidhāya sarvādhipāya jyotirūpāya prameśvārāya bhavena oṃ vyoma
||page:273
oṃ rudrāṇāṃ bhuvanānāñca svarūpamatha kaśyape / 86.004ab /
prathamo vāmadevaḥ syāttataḥ sarvabhavodbhavaḥ // 86.004cd //
vajradehaḥ prabhurdhātā kravikramasuprabhāḥ / 86.005ab /
vaṭuḥ praśāntanāmā ca paramākṣarasañjñakaḥ // 86.005cd //
śivaś ca saśivo babhrurakṣayaḥ śambhureva ca / 86.006ab /
adṛṣṭarūpanāmānau tathānyo rūpavardhanaḥ // 86.006cd //
manonmano mahāvīryaścitrāṅgastadanantaraṃ / 86.007ab /
kalyāṇa iti vijñeyāḥ pañcaviṃśatisaṅkhyayā // 86.007cd //
mantro ghorāmarau vīje nāḍyau dve tatra te yathā / 86.008ab /
pūṣā ca hastijihvā ca vyānanāgau prabhañjanau // 86.008cd //
viṣayo rūpamevaikamindriye pādacakṣuṣī / 86.009ab /
śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpañca traya ete guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ // 86.009cd //
avasthātra ṣuptiś ca rudro devastu kāraṇaṃ / 86.010ab /
vidyāmadhyagataṃ sarvaṃ bhāvayedbhavanādikaṃ // 86.010cd //
tāḍanaṃ chedanaṃ tatra praveśañcāpi yojanaṃ / 86.011ab /
ākṛṣya grahaṇaṃ kuryādvidyayā hṛtpradeśataḥ // 86.011cd //
ātmanyāropya saṅgṛhya kalāṃ kuṇḍe niveśayet / 86.012ab /
rudraṃ kāraṇamāvāhya vijñāpya ca śiśuṃ prati // 86.012cd //
pitrorāvahanaṃ kṛtvā hṛdaye tāḍayecchiśuṃ / 86.013ab /
praviśya pūrvamantreṇa tadātmani niyojayet // 86.013cd //
ākṛṣyādāya pūrvoktavidhinātmani yojayet / 86.014ab /
vāmayā yojayet yonau gṛhītvā dvādaśāntataḥ // 86.014cd //
||page:274
kurvīta dehasampattiṃ janmādhikārameva ca / 86.015ab /
bhogaṃ layantathā śrotaḥśuddhitattvaviśodhanaṃ // 86.015cd //
niḥśeṣamalakarmādipāśabandhanivṛttaye / 86.016ab /
niṣkṛtyaiva vidhānena yajeta śatamāhutīḥ // 86.016cd //
astreṇa pāśaśaithilyaṃ malaśaktiṃ tirohitāṃ / 86.017ab /
chedanaṃ mardanaṃ teṣāṃ vartulīkaraṇaṃ tathā // 86.017cd //
dāhaṃ tadakṣarābhāvaṃ prāyaścittamathoditaṃ / 86.018ab /
rudrāṇyāvāhanaṃ pūjā rūpagandhasamarpaṇaṃ // 86.018cd //
oṃ hrīṃ rūpagandhau śulkaṃ rudra gṛhāṇa svāhā
saṃśrāvya śāmbhavīmājñāṃ rudraṃ visṛjya kāraṇaṃ / 86.019ab /
vidhāyātmani caitanyaṃ pāśasūtre niveśayet // 86.019cd //
vinduṃ śirasi vinyasya visṛjet pitarau tataḥ / 86.020ab /
dadyāt pūrṇāṃ vidhānena samastavidhipūraṇīṃ // 86.020cd //
pūrvoktavidhinā kāryaṃ vidyāyāṃ tāḍanādikaṃ / 86.021ab /
svavījantu viśeṣaḥ syāditi vidyā viśodhitā // 86.021cd //
||ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye nirvāṇadīkṣāyāṃ vidyāviśodhanaṃ nāma ṣaḍaśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ ||
||atha saptāśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
śāntiśodhanakathanaṃ
īśvara uvāca
sandadhyādadhunā vidyāṃ śāntyā sārdhaṃ yathāvidhi / 87.001ab /
śāntau tattvadvayaṃ līnaṃ bhāveśvarasadāśivau // 87.001cd //
||page:275
hakāraś ca kṣakāraś ca dvau varṇau parikīrtitau / 87.002ab /
rudrāḥ samānanāmāno bhuvanaiḥ saha tadyathā // 87.002cd //
prabhavaḥ samayaḥ kṣudro vimalaḥ śiva ity api / 87.003ab /
ghanau nirañjanākārau svaśivau dīptikāraṇau // 87.003cd //
tridaśeśvaranāmā ca tridaśaḥ kālasajjñakaḥ / 87.004ab /
sūkṣmāmbujeśvaraśceti rudrāḥ śāntau pratiṣṭhitāḥ // 87.004cd //
vyomavyāpine vyomavyāpyarūpāya sarvavyāpine śivāya anantāya anāthāya anāśritāya dhruvāya śāśvatāya yogapīṭhasaṃsthitāya nityayogine dhyānāhārāyeti dvādaśapādāni
puruṣaḥ kavacau mantrau vīje vindūpakārakau / 87.005ab /
alambuṣāyasānāḍyau vāyū kṛkarakarmakau // 87.005cd //
indriye tvakkarāvasyā sparśastu viṣayo mataḥ / 87.006ab /
guṇau sparśaninādau dvāvekaḥ kāraṇamīśvaraḥ // 87.006cd //
turmyāvastheti śāntisthaṃ sambhāvya bhuvanādikaṃ / 87.007ab /
vidadhyāttāḍanaṃ bhedaṃ praveśañca viyojanaṃ // 87.007cd //
ākṛṣya grahaṇaṃ kuryācchāntervadanasūtrataḥ / 87.008ab /
ātmanyāropya saṅgṛhya kalāṃ kuṇḍe niveśayet // 87.008cd //
īśaṃ tavādhikāre 'smin mumukṣuṃ dīkṣayāmyahaṃ / 87.009ab /
bhavyaṃ tvayānukūlena kuryāt vijñāpanāmiti // 87.009cd //
āvāhanādikaṃ pitroḥ śiṣyasya tāḍanādikaṃ / 87.010ab /
||page:276
vidhāyādāya caitanyaṃ vidhinātmani yojayet // 87.010cd //
pūrvavat pitṛsaṃyogaṃ bhāvayitvodbhavākhyayā / 87.011ab /
hṛtsampuṭātmavījena devīgarbhe niyojayet // 87.011cd //
dehotpattau hṛdā pañca śirasā janmahetave / 87.012ab /
śikhayā vādhikārāya bhogāya kavacāṇunā // 87.012cd //
layāya śastramantreṇa śrotaḥśuddhau śivena ca / 87.013ab /
tattvaśuddhau hṛdā hy evaṃ garbhādhānādi pūrvavat // 87.013cd //
varmaṇā pāśaśaithilyaṃ niṣkṛtyaivaṃ śataṃ japet / 87.014ab /
malaśaktitirodhane śastreṇāhutipañcakaṃ // 87.014cd //
evaṃ pāśaviyoge 'pi tataḥ saptāstrajaptayā / 87.015ab /
chindyādastreṇa kartaryā pāśānvījavatā yathā // 87.015cd //
oṃ hauṃ śāntikalāpāśāya haḥ hūṃ phaṭ
visṛjya vartulīkṛtya pāśamantreṇa pūrvavat / 87.016ab /
ghṛtapūrṇe śruve datvā kalāstreṇaiva homayet // 87.016cd //
astreṇa juhuyāt pañca pāśāṅkuśanivṛttaye / 87.017ab /
prāyaścittaniṣedhāya dadyādaṣṭāhutīratha // 87.017cd //
oṃ haḥ astrāya hūṃ phaṭ
hṛdeśvaraṃ samāvāhya kṛtvā pūjanatarpaṇe / 87.018ab /
vidadhīta vidhānena tasmai śulkasamarpaṇaṃ // 87.018cd //
oṃ hāṃ īśvara buddhyahaṅkārau śulkaṃ gṛhāṇa svāhā
niḥśeṣadagdhapāśasya paśorasyeśvara tvayā / 87.019ab /
na stheyaṃ bandhakatvena śivājñāṃ śrāvayediti // 87.019cd //
||page:277
visṛjedīśvarandevaṃ raudrātmānaṃ niyojayet / 87.020ab /
īṣaccandramivātmānaṃ vidhinātmani yojayet // 87.020cd //
sūtre saṃyojayedenaṃ śuddhayodbhavamudrayā / 87.021ab /
dadyāt mūlena śiṣyasya śirasyamṛtavindukaṃ // 87.021cd //
visṛjya pitarau vahneḥ pūjitau kusumādibhiḥ / 87.022ab /
dadyāt pūrṇāṃ vidhānajño niḥśeṣavidhipūraṇīṃ // 87.022cd //
asyāmapi vidhātavyaṃ pūrvavattāḍanādiakaṃ / 87.023ab /
svavījantu viśeṣaḥ syācchuddhiḥ śānterapīḍitā // 87.023cd //
||ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye nirvāṇadīkṣāyāṃ śāntiśodhanaṃ nāma saptaśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ ||
||athāṣṭāśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
nirvāṇadīkṣākathanaṃ
īśvara uvāca
sandhānaṃ śāntyatītāyāḥ śāntyā sārdhaṃ viśuddhayā / 88.001ab /
kurvīta pūrvavattatra tattvavarṇādi tad yathā // 88.001cd //
oṃ hīṃ kṣauṃ hauṃ hāṃ iti sandhānāni
ubhau śaktiśivau tattve bhuvanāṣṭakasiddhikaṃ / 88.002ab /
dīpakaṃ rocikañcaiva mocakaṃ cordhvagāmi ca // 88.002cd //
vyomarūpamanāthañca syādanāśritanaṣṭamaṃ / 88.003ab /
oṅkārapadamīśāne mantro varṇāś ca ṣoḍaśa // 88.003cd //
akārādivisargāntā vījena dehakārakau / 88.004ab /
kuhūś ca śaṅkhinī nāḍyau devadattadhanañjayau // 88.004cd //
marutau sparśanaṃ śrotraṃ indriye viṣayo nabhaḥ / 88.005ab /
||page:278
śabdo guṇo 'syāvasthā tu turyātītā tu pañcamī // 88.005cd //
hetuḥ sadāśivo deva iti tattvādisañcayaṃ / 88.006ab /
sañcintya śāntyatītākhyaṃ vidadhyāttāḍanādikaṃ // 88.006cd //
kalāpāśaṃ samātāḍya phaḍantena vibhidya ca / 88.007ab /
praviśyāntar namo 'ntena phaḍantena viyojayet // 88.007cd //
śikhāhṛtsampuṭībhūtaṃ svāhāntaṃ sṛṇimudrayā / 88.008ab /
pūrakeṇa samākṛṣya pāśaṃ mastakasūtrataḥ // 88.008cd //
kumbhakena samādāya recakenodbhavākhyayā / 88.009ab /
hṛtsampuṭanamo 'ntena vahniṃ kuṇḍe niveśayet // 88.009cd //
asyāḥ pūjādikaṃ sarvaṃ nivṛtteriva sādhayet / 88.010ab /
sadāśivaṃ samāvāhya pūjayitvā pratarpya ca // 88.010cd //
sadā khyāte 'dhikāre 'smin mumukṣuṃ dīkṣayāmyahaṃ / 88.011ab /
bhāvyaṃ tvayānukūlena bhaktyā vijñāpayediti // 88.011cd //
pitrorāvāhanaṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā tarpaṇasannidhī / 88.012ab /
hṛtsampuṭātmavījena śiṣyaṃ vakṣasi tāḍayet // 88.012cd //
oṃ hāṃ hūṃ haṃ phaṭ
praviśya cāpyanenaiva caitanyaṃ vibhajettataḥ / 88.013ab /
śastreṇa pāśasaṃyuktaṃ jyeṣṭhayāṅkuśamudrayā // 88.013cd //
oṃ hāṃ hūṃ haṃ phaṭ
svāhāntena tadākṛṣya tenaiva puṭitātmanā / 88.014ab /
gṛhītvā tannamo 'ntena nijātmani niyojayet // 88.014cd //
oṃ hāṃ haṃ hīṃ ātmane namaḥ

kheditau śiṣyadīkṣāyai yanmayā pitarau yuvāṃ / 88.026ab /

||page:281
hṛdayādikramoccāravisṛṣṭaṃ mantrasañjñakaṃ / 88.035ab /

pūrakaṃ kumbhakaṃ kṛtvā vyādāya vadanaṃ manāk / 88.039ab /

||page:282
datvā pūrṇāṃ vidhānena guṇāpadānamacaret / 88.047ab /

paritṛpto bhava svāhā / oṃ hrūṃ ātmane anādibodho bhava svāhā/ oṃ hauṃ ātmane svatantro bhava svāhā / oṃ hauṃ ātmanaluptaśaktirbhava svāhā / oṃ haḥ ātmane anantaśaktirbhavasvāhāitthaṃ ṣaḍguṇamātmānaṃ gṛhītvā paramākṣarāt // 88.047cd //

tvayaivānugṛhīto 'yaṃ mūrtimāsthāya māmakīṃ // 88.050cd //

śreyastavāstviti brūyādāśiṣaṃ śiṣyamādarāt / 88.052ab /

||atha navatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
abhiṣekādikathanaṃ
īśvara uvāca
śivamabhyarcyābhiṣekaṃ kuryācchiṣyādike śriye / 90.001ab /
kumbhānīśādikāṣṭhāsu kramaśo nava vinyaset // 90.001cd //
teṣu kṣārodaṃ kṣīrodaṃ dadhyudaṃ ghṛtasāgaraṃ / 90.002ab /
ikṣukādambarīsvādumastūdānaṣṭasāgarān // 90.002cd //
niveśayed yathāsaṅkhyamaṣṭau vidyeśvarānatha / 90.003ab /
ekaṃ śikhaṇḍinaṃ rudraṃ śrīkaṇṭhantu dvitīyakaṃ // 90.003cd //

saptamaṃ sūkṣmanāmānamanantaṃ rudramaṣṭamaṃ // 90.004cd //

yāgālayān digīśasya racite snānamaṇḍape // 90.005cd //

kṣārodānukrameṇātha hṛdā vidyeśaśambaraiḥ // 90.008cd //

pūrvoditāsane śiṣyaṃ punaḥ pūrvavadarcayet / 90.010ab /

||page:285
dīkṣāvyākhyāpratiṣṭhādyaṃ jñātvādyaprabhṛti tvayā // 90.011cd //
suparīkṣya vidhātavyamājñāṃ saṃśrāvayediti / 90.012ab /

vighnajvālāpanodārthaṃ kuryādvijñāpanāṃ yathā / 90.013ab /

saṃhitāpāragaḥ so 'yamabhiṣikto mayā śiva / 90.014ab /
tṛptaye mantracakrasya pañcapañcāhutīryajet // 90.014cd //

śiṣyadakṣiṇapāṇisthā aṅguṣṭhādyaṅgulīḥ kramāt // 90.015cd //
lāñchayedupabaddhāya dagdhadarbhāgraśambaraiḥ / 90.016ab /
kusumāni kare datvā praṇāmaṃ kārayedamuṃ // 90.016cd //
kumbhe 'nale śive svasmisaṃstataskṛtyamāviśet / 90.017ab /

āṃ śrāṃ śrauṃ paśuṃ hūṃ phaḍiti astrarājābhiṣekataḥ // 90.018cd //

vividhamantrādikathanaṃ
īśvara uvāca

||page:286
yo devāndevalokaṃ sa yāti svakulamuddharan / 91.002ab /

||page:287

pratiṣṭhāvidhikathanaṃ
īśvara uvāca
pratiṣṭhāṃ sampravakṣyāmi kramāt saṅkṣepato guha / 92.001ab /
pīṭhaṃ śaktiṃ śivo liṅgaṃ tadyogaḥ sā śivāṇubhiḥ // 92.001cd //
pratiṣṭhāyāḥ pañca bhedāsteṣāṃ rūpaṃ vadāmi te / 92.002ab /
yatra brahmaśilāyogaḥ sā pratiṣṭhā viśeṣataḥ // 92.002cd //
sthāpanantu yathāyogaṃ pīṭha eva niveśanaṃ / 92.003ab /
pratiṣṭhābhinnapīṭhasya sthitasthāpanamucyate // 92.003cd //
utthāpanañca sā proktā liṅgoddhārapuraḥsarā / 92.004ab /
yasyāṃ tu liṅgamāropya saṃskāraḥ kriyate budhaiḥ // 92.004cd //
||page:288
āthāpanaṃ taduddiṣṭaṃ dvidhā viṣṇvādikasya ca / 92.005ab /
āsu sarvāsu caitanyaṃ niyuñjīta paraṃ śivam // 92.005cd //
yadādhārādibhedena prāsādeṣvapi pañcadhā / 92.006ab /
parīkṣamatha medinyāḥ kuryātprāsādakāmyayā // 92.006cd //
śuklājyagandhā raktā ca raktagandhā sugandhinī / 92.007ab /
pītā kṛṣṇā surāgandhā viprādīnāṃ mahī kramāt // 92.007cd //
pūrveśottarasarvatra pūrvā caiṣāṃ viśiṣyate / 92.008ab /
ākhāte hāstike yasyāḥ pūrṇe mṛdadhikā bhavet // 92.008cd //
uttamāntāṃ mahīṃ vidyāttoyādyair vā samukṣitāṃ / 92.009ab /
asthyaṅgārādibhirduṣṭāmatyantaṃ śodhayed guruḥ // 92.009cd //
nagaragrāmadurgārthaṃ gṛhaprāsādakāraṇaṃ / 92.010ab /
khananair gokulāvāsaiḥ karṣaṇair vā muhurmuhuḥ // 92.010cd //
maṇḍape dvārapūjādi mantratṛptyavasānakaṃ / 92.011ab /
karma nirvartyāghorāstraṃ sahasraṃ vidhinā yajet // 92.011cd //
samīkṛtyopaliptāyāṃ bhūmau saṃśodhayeddiśaḥ / 92.012ab /
svarṇadadhyakṣatai rekhāḥ prakurvīta pradakṣiṇaṃ // 92.012cd //
madhyādīśānakoṣṭasthe pūrṇakumbhe śivaṃ yajet / 92.013ab /
vāstumabhyarcya tattoyaiḥ siñcet kuddālakādikaṃ // 92.013cd //
||page:289
bāhye rakṣogaṇāniṣṭvā vidhinā digbalaṃ kṣipet / 92.014ab /
bhūmiṃ saṃsicya saṃsnāpya kuddālādyaṃ prapūjayet // 92.014cd //
anyaṃ vastrayugacchajñaṃ kumbhaṃ skandhe dvijanmanaḥ / 92.015ab /
nidhāya gītavādyādibrahmagoṣasamākulaṃ // 92.015cd //
pūjāṃ kumbhe samāhṛtya prāpte lagne 'gnikoṣṭhake / 92.016ab /
kuddālenābhiṣiktena madhvaktena tu khānayet // 92.016cd //
nairṛtyāṃ kṣepayenmṛtsnāṃ khāte kumbhajalaṃ kṣipet / 92.017ab /
purasya pūrvasīmantaṃ nayed yāvadabhīpsitaṃ // 92.017cd //
atha tatra kṣaṇaṃ sthitvā bhrāmayet paritaḥ puraṃ / 92.018ab /
siñcan sīmantacihnāni yāvadīśānagocaraṃ // 92.018cd //
arghyadānamidaṃ proktaṃ tatra kumbhaparibramāt / 92.019ab /
itthaṃ parigrahaṃ bhūmeḥ kurvīta tadanantaraṃ // 92.019cd //
karkarāntaṃ jalāntaṃ vā śalyadoṣajighāṃsayā / 92.020ab /
khānayed bhūḥ kumārīṃ ced vidhinā śalyamuddharet // 92.020cd //
akacaṭatapayaśahān mānavaścet praśnākṣarāṇi tu / 92.021ab /
agnerdhvajādipātitāḥ svasthāne śalyamākhyānti // 92.021cd //
kartuścāṅgavikāreṇa jānīyāttatpramāṇataḥ / 92.022ab /
paśvādīnāṃ praveśena kīrtanair virutair diśaḥ // 92.022cd //
mātṛkāmaṣṭavargāḍhyāṃ phalake bhuvi vā likhet / 92.023ab /
śalyajñānaṃ vargavaśāt pūrvādīśāntataḥ kramāt // 92.023cd //

gaurīmantraṃ layaṃ nītvā sṛṣṭyā piṇḍīñca vinyaset / 97.035ab /
sampūrya pārśvasaṃsiddhiṃ vālukāvajralepanaṃ // 97.035cd //
tato mūrtidharaiḥ sārdhaṃ guruḥ śāntiṃ ghaṭordhvataḥ / 97.036ab /
saṃsthāpya kalaśair anyaistadvat pañcāmṛtādibhiḥ // 97.036cd //
vilipya candanādyaiś ca sampūjya jagadīśvaraṃ / 97.037ab /
umāmaheśamantrābhyāṃ tau spṛśelliṅgamudrayā // 97.037cd //
tatastritattvavinyāsaṃ ṣaḍarcādipuraḥsaraṃ / 97.038ab /

jñānī liṅge kriyāpīṭhe vināsya snāpayettataḥ / 97.039ab /
gandhair vilipya sandhūpya vyāpitve śive nyaset // 97.039cd //
sragdhūpadīpanaivedyair hṛdayena phalāni ca / 97.040ab /
||page:332
vinivedya yathāśakti samācamya maheśvaraṃ // 97.040cd //

svecchayaiva tvayā nātha sthātavyamiha mandire / 97.042ab /
praṇamyeva vahirgatvā hṛdā vā praṇavena vā // 97.042cd //
saṃsthāpya vṛṣabhaṃ paścāt pūrvavadvalimācaret / 97.043ab /

ambikeśāya tad bhaktyā śaktyā sarvaṃ nivedayet // 97.045cd //

trisandhyaṃ tridinaṃ mantrī homayen mūrtipaiḥ saha // 97.046cd //
caturthehani pūrṇāñca carukaṃ bahurūpiṇā / 97.047ab /

||page:333

nityotha sarvagaś caivāvināśī dṛṣṭa eva ca / 97.052ab /
ete guṇā maheśasya sannidhānāya kīrtitāḥ // 97.052cd //
oṃ namaḥ śivāya sthiro bhavetyāhutīnāṃ kramaḥ / 97.053ab /
evametañca sampādya vidhāya śivakumbhavat // 97.053cd //
kumbhadvayañca tanmadhyādekakumbhāmbhasā bhavaṃ / 97.054ab /
saṃsnāpya tad dvitīyantu kartṛsnānāya dhārayet // 97.054cd //
datvā baliṃ samācamya vahirgacchet śivājñayā / 97.055ab /

||page:334
evaṃ sadyojātāya oṃ hrūṃ phaṭ namaḥ / oṃ viṃ vāmadevāya hrūṃ phaṭ namaḥ / oṃ buṃ aghorāya hrūṃ phaṭ namaḥ / oṃ tatpuruṣāya vaumīśānāya ca hrūṃ phaṭ ||
japaṃ vivedya santarpya vijñāpya natipūrvakaṃ / 97.058ab /
devaḥ sannihito yāvattāvattvaṃ sannidho bhava // 97.058cd //
nyūnādhikañca yatkiñcit kṛtamajñānato mayā / 97.059ab /
tavatprasādena caṇḍeśa tat sarvaṃ paripūraya // 97.059cd //
vāṇaliṅge vāṇarohe siddhaliṅge svayambhuvi / 97.060ab /
pratimāsu ca sarvāsu na caṇḍo 'dhikṛto bhavet // 97.060cd //
advaitabhāvanāyukte sthaṇḍileśavidhāvapi / 97.061ab /
abhyarcya caṇḍaṃ sasutaṃ yajamānaṃ hi bhāryayā // 97.061cd //
pūrvasthāpitakumbhe na snāpayet snāpakaḥ svayaṃ / 97.062ab /
sthāpakaṃ yajamānopi sampūjya ca maheśavat // 97.062cd //
vittaśāṭhyaṃ vinā dadyād bhūhiraṇyādi dakṣiṇāṃ / 97.063ab /
||page:335
mūrtimān vidhivat paścāt jāpakān brāhmaṇāṃs tathā // 97.063cd //
devajñaṃ śilpinaṃ prārcya dīnānāthādi bhojayet / 97.064ab /

pratiṣṭhāpuṇyasadbhāvaṃ sphurattārakasaprabhaṃ / 97.066ab /

anye devādayaḥ sthāpyā mantrair āgamasambhavaiḥ // 97.069cd //

||page:336
snānaṃ sarasvatīlakṣmīnadīnāmambhasi kvacit // 97.071cd //
