dānabhedaiś camūmukhyān yodhān janapadadikān / 240.062ab /
sāmāntāṭavikān bhedadaṇḍābhyāmaparāddhakān // 240.062cd //
devatāpratimānantu pūjayāntargatair naraiḥ / 240.063ab /
pumān strīvastrasaṃvīto niśi cādbhutadarśanaḥ // 240.063cd //
||page:375
vetālolkāpiśācānāṃ śivānāṃ ca svarūpakī / 240.064ab /
kāmato rūpadhāritvaṃ śastrāgnyaśmāmbuvarṣaṇaṃ // 240.064cd //
tamo 'nilo 'nalo megha iti māyā hy amānuṣī / 240.065ab /

||ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe sāmādirnāma catvāriṃśadadhkadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ ||
||atha ekacatvāriṃśadadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
rājanītiḥ
rāma uvāca
ṣaḍvidhantu balaṃ vyūhya devān prārcya ripuṃ vrajet / 241.001ab /
maulaṃ bhūtaṃ śroṇisuhṛddviṣadāṭavikaṃ balaṃ // 241.001cd //
pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ garīyastu balānāṃ vyasanaṃ tathā / 241.002ab /
ṣaḍaṅgaṃ mantrakoṣābhyāṃ padātyaśvarathadvipaiḥ // 241.002cd //
nadyadravanadurgeṣu yatra yatra bhayaṃ bhavet / 241.003ab /
||page:376
senāpatistatra tatra gacchedvyūhīkṛtair balaiḥ // 241.003cd //
nāyakaḥ purato yāyāt pravīrapuruṣāvṛtaḥ / 241.004ab /
madhye kalatraṃ svāmī ca koṣaḥ phalgu ca yadbalaṃ // 241.004cd //
pārśvayorubhayoraśvā vājināṃ pārśvayo rathāḥ / 241.005ab /
rathānāṃ pārśvayornāgā nāgānāṃ cāṭavībalaṃ // 241.005cd //
paścāt senāpatiḥ sarvaṃ puraskṛtya kṛtī svayaṃ / 241.006ab /
yāyātsannaddhasainyaughaḥ khinnānāśvāsayañcchanaiḥ // 241.006cd //
yāyādvyūhena mahatā makareṇa purobhaye / 241.007ab /
śyenenoddhṛtapakṣeṇa sūcyā vā vīravaktrayā // 241.007cd //
paścādbhaye tu śakaṭaṃ pārśvayorvajrasañjñitaṃ / 241.008ab /
sarvataḥ sarvatobhadraṃ bhaye vyūhaṃ prakalpayet // 241.008cd //
kandare śailagahane nimnagāvanasaṅkaṭe / 241.009ab /
dīrghādhvani pariśrāntaṃ kṣutpipāsāhitaklamaṃ // 241.009cd //
vyādhidurbhikṣamarakapīḍitaṃ dasyuvidrutaṃ / 241.010ab /
paṅkāṃśujalaskandhaṃ vyastaṃ puñjīkṛtaṃ pathi // 241.010cd //
prasuptaṃ bhojanavyagramabhūmiṣṭhamasusthitaṃ / 241.011ab /
caurāgnibhayavitrastaṃ vṛṣṭivātasamāhataṃ // 241.011cd //
ityādau svacamūṃ rakṣet prasainyaṃ ca ghatayet / 241.012ab /
viśiṣṭo deśakālābhyāṃ bhinnaviprakṛtirbalī // 241.012cd //
kuryāt prakāśayuddhaṃ hi kūṭayuddhaṃ viparyaye / 241.013ab /
teṣvavaskandakāleṣu paraṃ hanyātsamākulaṃ // 241.013cd //
||page:377
abhūmiṣṭhaṃ svabhūmiṣṭhaṃ svabhūmau copajāyataḥ / 241.014ab /
prakṛtipragrahākṛṣṭaṃ pāśair vanacarādibhiḥ // 241.014cd //
hanyāt pravīrapuruṣair bhaṅgadānāpakarṣaṇaiḥ / 241.015ab /
purastāddarśanaṃ datvā tallakṣakṛtaniś cayāt // 241.015cd //
hanyātpaścāt pravīreṇa balenopetya veginā / 241.016ab /
paścādvā saṅkulīkṛtya hanyācchūreṇa pūrvataḥ // 241.016cd //
ābhyāṃ pārśvābhighātau tu vyākhyātau kūṭayodhane / 241.017ab /
purastādviṣame deśe paścāddhanyāttu vegavān // 241.017cd //
puraḥ paścāttu viṣame evameva tu pārśvayoḥ / 241.018ab /
prathamaṃ yodhayitvā tu dūṣyāmitrāṭavībalau // 241.018cd //
śrāntaṃ mandannirākrandaṃ hanyādaśrāntavāhanaṃ / 241.019ab /
dūṣyāmitrabalair vāpi bhaṅgandatvā prayatnavān // 241.019cd //
jitamityeva viśvastaṃ hanyānmantravyapāśrayaḥ / 241.020ab /
skandhāvārapuragrāmaśasyasvāmiprajādiṣu // 241.020cd //
viśrabhyantaṃ parānīkamapramatto vināśayet / 241.021ab /
athavā gograhākṛṣṭaṃ tallakṣyaṃ mārgabandhanāt // 241.021cd //
avaskandabhayādrātripūjāgarakṛtaśramaḥ / 241.022ab /
divāsuptaṃ samāhanyānnidrāvyākulasainikaṃ // 241.022cd //
niśi viśrabdhasaṃsuptaṃ nāgair vā khaḍgapāṇibhiḥ / 241.023ab /
prayāne pūrvayāyitvaṃ vanadurgapraveśanaṃ // 241.023cd //
abhinnānāmanīkānāṃ bhedanaṃ bhinnasaṅgrahaḥ / 241.024ab /
vibhīṣakādvāraghātaṃ koṣarakṣebhakarma ca // 241.024cd //
abhinnabhedanaṃ mitrasandhānaṃ rathakarma ca / 241.025ab /
||page:378
vanadiṅmārgavicaye vīvadhāsāralakṣaṇaṃ // 241.025cd //
anuyānāpasaraṇe śīghrakāryopapādanaṃ / 241.026ab /
dīnānusaraṇaṃ ghātaḥ koṭīnāṃ jaghanasya ca // 241.026cd //
aśvakarmātha patteś ca sarvadā śastradhāraṇaṃ / 241.027ab /
śivirasya ca mārgādeḥ śodhanaṃ vastikarma ca // 241.027cd //
saṃsthūlasthāṇuvalmīkavṛkṣagulmāpakaṇṭakaṃ / 241.028ab /
sāpasārā padātīnāṃ bhūrnātiviṣamā matā // 241.028cd //
svalpavṛkṣopalā kṣipralaṅghanīyanagā sthirā / 241.029ab /
niḥśarkarā vipaṅkā ca sāpasārā ca vājibhūḥ // 241.029cd //
nisthāṇuvṛkṣakedārā rathabhūmirakardamā / 241.030ab /
mardanīyatarucchedyavratatīpaṅkavarjitā // 241.030cd //
nirjharāgamyaśailā ca viṣamā gajamedinī / 241.031ab /
urasyādīni bhinnāni pratigṛhṇan balāni hi // 241.031cd //
pratigraha iti khyāto rājakāryāntarakṣamaḥ / 241.032ab /
tena śūnyastu yo vyūhaḥ sa bhinna iva lakṣyate // 241.032cd //
jayārthī na ca yuddhyeta matimānapratigrahaḥ / 241.033ab /
yatra rājā tatra koṣaḥ koṣādhīnā hi rājatā // 241.033cd //
yodhebhyastu tato dadyāt kiñciddātuṃ na yujyate / 241.034ab /
dravyalakṣaṃ rājaghāte tadardhaṃ tatsutārdane // 241.034cd //
senāpatibadhe tadvaddadyāddhastyādimardane / 241.035ab /
athavā khalu yudhyeran pratyaśvarathadantinaḥ // 241.035cd //
||page:379
yathā bhavedasaṃbādho vyāyāmavinivartane / 241.036ab /
asaṅkareṇa yuddheran saṅkaraḥ saṅkulāvahaḥ // 241.036cd //
mahāsaṅkulayuddheṣu saṃśrayeranmataṅgajaṃ / 241.037ab /
aśvasya pratiyoddhāro bhaveyuḥ puruṣāstrayaḥ // 241.037cd //
iti kalpyāstrayaścāśvā vidheyāḥ kuñjarasya tu / 241.038ab /
pādagopā bhaveyuś ca puruṣā daśa pañca ca // 241.038cd //
vidhānamiti nāgasya vihitaṃ syandanasya ca / 241.039ab /
anīkamiti vijñeyamiti kalpyā nava dvipāḥ // 241.039cd //
tathānīkasya randhrantu pañcadhā ca pracakṣate / 241.040ab /
ityanīkavibhagena sthāpayed vyūhasampadaḥ // 241.040cd //
urasyakakṣapakṣāṃstu kalpyānetān pracakṣate / 241.041ab /
uraḥkakṣau ca pakṣau ca madhyaṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ pratigrahaḥ // 241.041cd //
koṭī ca vyūhaśāstrajñaiḥ saptāṅgo vyūha ucyate / 241.042ab /
urasyakakṣapakṣāstu vyūho 'yaṃ sapratigrahaḥ // 241.042cd //
guroreṣa ca śukrasya kakṣābhyāṃ parivarjitaḥ / 241.043ab /
tiṣṭheyuḥ senāpatayaḥ pravīraiḥ puruṣair vṛtāḥ // 241.043cd //
abhedena ca yudhyeran rakṣeyuś ca parasparaṃ / 241.044ab /
madhyavyūhe phalgu sainyaṃ yuddhavastu jaghanyataḥ // 241.044cd //
yuddhaṃ hi nāyakaprāṇaṃ hanyate tadanāyakaṃ / 241.045ab /
urasi sthāpayennāgān pracaṇḍān kakṣayo rathān // 241.045cd //
hayāṃś ca pakṣayorvyūho madhyabhedī prakīrtitaḥ / 241.046ab /
madhyadeśe hayānīkaṃ rathānīkañca kakṣayoḥ // 241.046cd //
pakṣayoś ca gajānīkaṃ vyūhontarbhedyayaṃ smṛtaḥ / 241.047ab /
||page:380
rathasthāne hayān dadyāt padātīṃś ca hayaśrāye // 241.047cd //
rathābhāve tu dviradān vyūhe sarvatra dāpayet / 241.048ab /
yadi syāddaṇḍabāhulyamābādhaḥ samprakīrtitaḥ // 241.048cd //
maṇḍalāṃsaṃhato bhogo daṇḍāste bahudhā śṛṇu / 241.049ab /
tiryagvṛttistu daṇḍaḥ syād bhogo 'nyāvṛttireva ca // 241.049cd //
maṇḍalaḥ sarvatovṛttiḥ pṛthagvṛttirasaṃhataḥ / 241.050ab /
pradaro dṛḍhako 'sahyaḥ cāpo vai kukṣireva ca // 241.050cd //
pratiṣṭhaḥ supratiṣṭhaś ca śyeno vijayasañjayau / 241.051ab /
viśālo vijayaḥ śūcī sthūṇākarṇacamūmukhau // 241.051cd //
sarpāsyo valayaś caiva daṇḍa daṇḍabhedāś ca durjayāḥ / 241.052ab /
atikrāntaḥ pratikrāntaḥ kakṣābhyāñcaikakṣapakṣataḥ // 241.052cd //
atikrāntastu pakṣābhyāṃ trayo 'nye tadviparyaye / 241.053ab /
pakṣorasyair atikrāntaḥ pratiṣṭho 'nyo viparyayaḥ // 241.053cd //
sthūṇāpakṣo dhanuḥpakṣo dvisthūṇo daṇḍa ūrdhvagaḥ / 241.054ab /
dviguṇontastvatikrāntapakṣo 'nyasya viparyayaḥ // 241.054cd //
dvicaturdaṇḍa ity ete jñeyā lakṣaṇataḥ kramāt / 241.055ab /
gomūtrikāhisañcārīśakaṭo makaras tathā // 241.055cd //
bhogabhedāḥ samākhyātās tathā pariplavaṅgakaḥ / 241.056ab /
daṇḍapakṣau yugārasyaḥ śakaṭastadviparyaye // 241.056cd //
makaro vyatikīrṇaś ca śeṣaḥ kuñjararājibhiḥ / 241.057ab /
maṇḍalavyūhabhedau tu sarvatobhadradurjayau // 241.057cd //
aṣṭānīko dvitīyastu prathamaḥ sarvatomukhaḥ / 241.058ab /
ardhacandraka ūrdhvāṅgo vajrabhedāstu saṃhateḥ // 241.058cd //
||page:381
tathā karkaṭaśṛṅgī ca kākapādau ca godhikā / 241.059ab /
tricatuḥsainyānāṃ jñeyā ākārabhedataḥ // 241.059cd //
daṇḍasya syuḥ saptadaśa vyūhā dvau maṇḍalasya ca / 241.060ab /
asaṅghātasya ṣaṭ pañca bhogasyaiva tu saṅgare // 241.060cd //
pakṣādīnāmathaikena hatvā śeṣaiḥ parikṣipet / 241.061ab /
urasā vā samāhatya koṭibhyāṃ pariveṣṭayet // 241.061cd //
pare koṭī samākramya pakṣābhyāmapratigrahāt / 241.062ab /
koṭibhyāñjaghanaṃ hanyādurasā ca prapīḍayet // 241.062cd //
yataḥ phalgu yato bhinnaṃ yataścānyair adhiṣṭhitaṃ / 241.063ab /
tataścāribalaṃ hanyādātmanaścopavṛṃhayet // 241.063cd //
sāraṃ dviguṇasāreṇa phalgusāreṇa pīḍayet / 241.064ab /
saṃhatañca gajānīkaiḥ pracaṇḍair dārayedbalaṃ // 241.064cd //
syāt kakṣapakṣorasyaś ca vartamānastu daṇḍakaḥ / 241.065ab /
tatra prayogo ḍaṇḍasya sthānanturyeṇa darśayet // 241.065cd //
syāddaṇḍasamapakṣābhyāmatikrānto dṛḍhaḥ smṛtaḥ / 241.066ab /
bhavetsa pakṣakakṣābhyāmatikrāntaḥ pradārakaḥ // 241.066cd //
kakṣābhyāñca pratikrāntavyūho 'sahyaḥ smṛto yathā / 241.067ab /
kakṣapakṣāvadhaḥ sthapyorasyaiḥ kāntaś ca khātakaḥ // 241.067cd //
dvau daṇḍau balayaḥ prokto kāntaś ca khātakaḥ / 241.068ab /
durjayaś caturvalayaḥ śatrorbalavimardanaḥ // 241.068cd //
kakṣapakṣaurasyair bhogo viṣayaṃ parivartayan / 241.069ab /
||page:382
sarpacārī gomūtrikā śarkaṭaḥ śakaṭākṛtiḥ // 241.069cd //
viparyayo 'maraḥ proktaḥ sarvaśatruvimardakaḥ / 241.070ab /
syāt kakṣapakṣorasyānāmekībhāvastu maṇḍalaḥ // 241.070cd //
cakrapadmādayo bhedā maṇḍalasya prabhedakāḥ / 241.071ab /
evañca sarvatobhadro vajrākṣavarakākavat // 241.071cd //
ardhacandraś ca śṛṅgāṭo hy acalo nāmarūpataḥ / 241.072ab /
vyūhā yathāsukhaṃ karyāḥ śatrūṇāṃ balavāraṇāḥ // 241.072cd //
agnir uvācarāmastu rāvaṇaṃ hatvā ayodhyāṃ prāptavān dvija / 241.073ab /

||ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe rāmoktarājanītirnāma ekacatvāriṃśadadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ ||

||atha dvicatvāriṃśadadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
puruṣalakṣaṇaṃ
agnir uvāca
rāmoktoktā mayā nītiḥ strīṇāṃ rājan nṛṇāṃ vade / 242.001ab /
lakṣaṇaṃ yadsamudreṇa gargāyoktaṃ yathā purā // 242.001cd //
samudra uvāca
puṃsāñca lakṣaṇaṃ vakṣye strīṇāñcaiva śubhāśubhaṃ / 242.002ab /
ekādhiko dviśukraś ca triganbhīrastathaiva ca // 242.002cd //
tritrikastripralambaś ca tribhirvyāpnoti yas tathā / 242.003ab /
tribalīmāṃstrivinatastrikālajñaś ca suvrata // 242.003cd //
puruṣaḥ syātsulakṣaṇyo vipulaś ca tathā triṣu / 242.004ab /
caturlekhas tathā yaś ca tathaiva ca catuḥsamaḥ // 242.004cd //
catuṣkiṣkuś caturdaṃṣṭraḥ śuklakṛṣṇastathaiva ca / 242.005ab /
caturgandhaś caturhrasvaḥ sūkṣmadīrghaś ca pañcasu // 242.005cd //
ṣaḍunnato 'ṣṭavaṃśaś ca saptasneho navāmalaḥ / 242.006ab /
daśapadmo daśavyūho nyagrodhaparimaṇḍalaḥ // 242.006cd //
caturdaśasamadvandvaḥ ṣoḍaśākṣayaś ca śasyate / 242.007ab /
dharmārthakāmasaṃyukto dharmo hy ekādhiko mataḥ // 242.007cd //
tārakābhyāṃ vinā netre śukradanto dviśuklakaḥ / 242.008ab /
gambhīrastriśravo nābhiḥ sattvañcaikaṃ trikaṃ smṛtaṃ // 242.008cd //
anasūyā dayā kṣāntirmaṅgalācārayuktatā / 242.009ab /
śaucaṃ spṛhā tvakārpaṇyamanāyāsaś ca śauryatā // 242.009cd //
||page:384
citrikastripralambaḥ syādvṛṣaṇe bhujayornaraḥ / 242.010ab /
digdeśajātivargāṃś ca tejasā yaśasā śriyā // 242.010cd //
vyāpnoti yastrikavyāpī tribalīmānnarastvasau / 242.011ab /
udare balayastisro narantrivinataṃ śṛṇu // 242.011cd //
devatānāṃ dvijānāñca gurūṇāṃ praṇatastu yaḥ / 242.012ab /
dharmārthakāmakālajñastrikālajño 'bhidhīyate // 242.012cd //
uro lalāṭaṃ vaktrañca trivistīrṇo vilekhavān / 242.013ab /
dvau pāṇī dvau tathā pādau dhvajacchatrādibhiryutau // 242.013cd //
aṅgulyo hṛdayaṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ kaṭiḥ śastaṃ catuḥsamaṃ / 242.014ab /
ṣaṇṇavatyaṅgulotsedhaś catuṣkiṣkupramāṇataḥ // 242.014cd //
draṃṣṭrāś catasraś candrābhāś catuḥkṛṣṇaṃ vadāmi te / 242.015ab /
netratārau bhruvau śmaśruḥ kṛṣṇāḥ keśāstathaiva ca // 242.015cd //
nāsāyāṃ vadane svede kakṣayorviḍagandhakaḥ / 242.016ab /
hrasvaṃ liṅgaṃ tathā grīvā jaṅghe syādvedahrasvakaṃ // 242.016cd //
sūkṣmāṇyaṅguliparvāṇi nakhakeśadvijatvacaḥ / 242.017ab /
hanū netre lalāṭe ca nāsā dīrghā stanāntaraṃ // 242.017cd //
vakṣaḥ kakṣau nakhā nāsonnataṃ vaktraṃ kṛkāṭikā / 242.018ab /
snigdhāstvakkeśadantāś ca loma dṛṣṭirnakhāś ca vāk // 242.018cd //
jānvorurvoś ca pṛṣṭhastha vaṃśau dvau karanāsayoḥ / 242.019ab /
netre nāsāpuṭau karṇau meḍhraṃ pāyumukhe 'malaṃ // 242.019cd //
jihvoṣṭhe tālunetre tu hastapādau nakhās tathā / 242.020ab /
śiśnāgravaktraṃ śasyante padmābhā daśa dehināṃ // 242.020cd //
pāṇipādaṃ mukhaṃ grīvā śravaṇe hṛdayaṃ śiraḥ / 242.021ab /
||page:385
lalāṭamudaraṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ vṛhantaḥ pūjitā daśa // 242.021cd //
prasāritabhujasyeha madhyamāgradvayāntaraṃ / 242.022ab /
ucchrāyeṇa samaṃ yasya nyagrodhaparimaṇḍalaḥ // 242.022cd //
pādau gulphau sphicau pārśvau vaṅkṣaṇau vṛṣaṇau kucau / 242.023ab /
karṇauṣṭhe sakthinī jaṅghe hastau bāhū tathākṣiṇī // 242.023cd //
caturdaśasamadvandva etatsāmānyato naraḥ / 242.024ab /
vidyāś caturdaśa dvyakṣaiḥ paśyedyaḥ ṣoḍaśākṣakaḥ // 242.024cd //
rūkṣaṃ śirātataṃ gātramaśubhaṃ māṃsavarjitaṃ / 242.025ab /
durgandhiviparītaṃ yacchastandṛṣṭyā prasannayā // 242.025cd //
dhanyasya madhurā vāṇī gatirmattebhasannibhā / 242.026ab /
ekakūpabhavaṃ roma bhaye rakṣā sakṛt sakṛt // 242.026cd //

||page:387
caturasyaṃ brāhmaṇasya vṛttaṃ rājñaś ca śuklakaṃ // 244.002cd //
tricatuḥpañcaṣaṭsaptāṣṭaparvaś ca daṇḍakaḥ / 244.003ab /
bhadrāsanaṃ kṣīravṛkṣaiḥ pañcāśadaṅgulocchrayaiḥ // 244.003cd //
vistāreṇa trihastaṃ syāt suvarṇādyaiś ca citritaṃ / 244.004ab /
dhanurdravyatrayaṃ lohaṃ śṛṅgaṃ dāru dvijottama // 244.004cd //
jyādravyatritayañcaiva vaṃśabhaṅgatvacas tathā / 244.005ab /

muṣṭigrāhanimittāni madhye dravyāṇi kārayet // 244.006cd //

||page:388
rukmapuṅkhāḥ supaṅkāste tailadhautāḥ suvarṇakāḥ / 244.013ab /

tasmātsa nandakaḥ kaḍgo devokto hariragrahīt // 244.016cd //

pūjayāmāsa yajñena vakṣye 'tho khaḍgalakṣaṇaṃ / 244.021ab /
khaṭīkhaṭṭarajātā ye daśanīyāstute smṛtāḥ // 244.021cd //

tīkṣṇāśchedasahā vaṅgāstīkṣṇāḥsyuścāṅgadeśajāḥ // 244.022cd //

||page:389
tadardhaṃ madhyamaṃ jñeyaṃ tato hīnaṃ na dhārayet // 244.023cd //
dīrghaṃ sumadhuraṃ śabdaṃ yusya khaḍgasya sattama / 244.024ab /

ratnānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vakṣye ratnaṃ dhāryamidaṃ nṛpaiḥ / 245.001ab /

||page:390
karketanaṃ puṣparāgaṃ tathā jyotīrasaṃ dvija / 245.003ab /
spaṭikaṃ rājapaṭṭañca tathā rājamayaṃ śubhaṃ // 245.003cd //
saugandhikaṃ tathā gañjaṃ śaṅkhabrahmamayaṃ tathā / 245.004ab /
gomedaṃ rudhirākṣañca tathā bhallātakaṃ dvija // 245.004cd //
dhūlīṃ marakatañcaiva tuthakaṃ sīsameva ca / 245.005ab /
pīluṃ pravālakañcaiva girivajraṃ dvijottama // 245.005cd //
bhujaṅgamamaṇiñcaiva tathā vajramaṇiṃ śubhaṃ / 245.006ab /
ṭiṭṭibhañca tathā piṇḍaṃ bhrāmarañca tathotpalaṃ // 245.006cd //
suvarṇapratibaddhāni ratnāni śrījayādike / 245.007ab /
antaḥprabhatvaṃ vaimalyaṃ susaṃsthānatvameva ca // 245.007cd //
sudhāryā naiva dhāryāstu niṣprabhā malinās tathā / 245.008ab /

putro 'nanyāśritadravyaḥ putrahīnasya ṛkthinaḥ // 253.005cd //
avibhuktaiḥ kuṭumbārthaṃ yadṛṇantu kṛtambhavet / 253.006ab /
dadyustadṛkthinaḥ prete proṣite vā kuṭumbini // 253.006cd //
na yoṣit patiputrābhyāṃ na putreṇa kṛtaṃ pitā / 253.007ab /
dadyādṛte kuṭumbārthānna patiḥ strīkṛtaṃ tathā // 253.007cd //
gopaśauṇḍikaśainūṣarajakavyādhayoṣitāṃ / 253.008ab /
ṛṇaṃ dadyātpatistvāsāṃ yasmādvṛttistadāśrayā // 253.008cd //
pratipannaṃ striyā deyaṃ patyā vā saha yat kṛtaṃ / 253.009ab /
svayaṃ kṛtaṃ vā yadṛṇaṃ nānyastrī dātumarhati // 253.009cd //
pitari proṣite prete vyasābhiplute 'tha vā / 253.010ab /
putrapautrair ṛṇandeyaṃ nihnave sākṣibhāvitam // 253.010cd //
surākāmadyūtakṛtandaṇḍaśulkāvaśiṣṭakam / 253.011ab /
vṛthā dānaṃ tathaiveha putro dadyānna paitṛkam // 253.011cd //
bhrātṝṇāmatha dampatyoḥ pituḥ putrasya caiva hi / 253.012ab /
||page:414
pratibhāvyamṛṇaṃ grāhyamavibhaktena ca smṛtam // 253.012cd //
darśane pratyaye dāne pratibhāvyaṃ vidhīyate / 253.013ab /
ādhau tu vitathe dāpyā vitathasya sutā api // 253.013cd //
darśanapratibhūryatra mṛtaḥ prātyayiko 'pi vā / 253.014ab /
na tatputrā dhanaṃ dadyurdadyurdānāya ye sthitāḥ // 253.014cd //
bahavaḥ syuryadi svāṃśair dadyuḥ pratibhuvo dhanam / 253.015ab /
ekacchāyāśriteṣveṣu dhanikasya yathā ruci // 253.015cd //
pratibhūrdāpito yatra prakāśaṃ dhanine dhanam / 253.016ab /
dviguṇaṃ pratidātavyamṛṇikaistasya tadbhavet // 253.016cd //
svasantatistrīpaśavyaṃ dhānyaṃ dviguṇameva ca / 253.017ab /
vastraṃ caturguṇaṃ proktaṃ rasaścāṣṭaguṇas tathā // 253.017cd //
ādhiḥ praṇaśyet dviguṇe dhane yadi na mokṣyate / 253.018ab /
kāle kālakṛtaṃ naśyet phalabhogyo na naśyati // 253.018cd //
gopyādhibhogyo nāvṛddhiḥ sopakāre 'tha bhāvite / 253.019ab /
naṣṭo deyo vinaṣṭaś ca daivarājakṛtādṛte // 253.019cd //
ādheḥ svīkaraṇātsiddhaurakṣamāṇopyasāratām / 253.020ab /
yātaścedanya ādheyo dhanabhāg vā dhanī bhavet // 253.020cd //
caritraṃ bandhakakṛtaṃ savṛddhaṃ dāpayedvanaṃ / 253.021ab /
satyaṅkārakṛtaṃ dravyaṃ dviguṇaṃ pratidāpayet // 253.021cd //
upasthitasya moktavya ādhirdaṇḍo 'nyathā bhavet / 253.022ab /
prayojake sati dhanaṃ kulenyasyādhimāpnuyāt // 253.022cd //
tatkālakṛtamūlyo vā tatra tiṣṭhedavṛddhikaḥ / 253.023ab /
||page:415
vinā dhāraṇakādvāpi vikrīṇīte sasākṣikam // 253.023cd //
yadā tu dviguṇībhūtamṛṇamādhau tadā khalu / 253.024ab /
mocyaścādhistadutpādya praviṣṭe dviguṇe dhane // 253.024cd //
vyasanasthamanākhyāya haste 'nyasya yadarpayet / 253.025ab /
dravyaṃ tadaupanidhikaṃ pratideyaṃ tathaiva tat // 253.025cd //
na dāpyo 'pahṛtaṃ tattu rājadaivakataskaraiḥ / 253.026ab /
preṣaścenmārgite datte dāpyo daṇḍaś ca tatsamam // 253.026cd //
ājīvan svecchayā daṇḍyo dāpyastaccāpi sodayaṃ / 253.027ab /
yācitāvāhitanyāse nikṣepeṣvapyayaṃ vidhiḥ // 253.027cd //
||ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe vyavahāro nāma tripañcāśadadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ ||
||atha catuḥpañcāśadadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
divyapramāṇakathanaṃ
agnir uvāca
tapasvino dānaśīlāḥ kulīnāḥ satyavādinaḥ / 254.001ab /
dharmapradhānā ṛjavaḥ putravanto dhanānvitāḥ // 254.001cd //
pañcayajñakriyāyuktāḥ sākṣiṇaḥ pañca vā trayaḥ / 254.002ab /
yathājāti yathāvarṇa sarve sarveṣu vā smṛtāḥ // 254.002cd //
strīvṛddhabālakitavamattonmattābhiśastakāḥ / 254.003ab /
||page:416
raṅgāvatāripāṣaṇḍikūṭakṛdvikalendriyāḥ // 254.003cd //
patitāptānnasambandhisahāyariputaskarāḥ / 254.004ab /

rājñā sarvaṃ pradāpyaḥ syāt ṣaṭcatvāriṃśake 'hnani / 254.006ab /

sa kūṭasākṣiṇāṃ pāpaistulyo daṇḍena caiva hi / 254.007ab /
sākṣiṇaḥ śrāvayedvādiprativādisamīpagān // 254.007cd //

agnidānāñca ye lokā ye ca strībālaghātināṃ // 254.008cd //
tān sarvān samavāpnoti yaḥ sākṣyamanṛtaṃ vadet / 254.009ab /
sukṛtaṃ yattvayā kiñcijjanmāntaraśataiḥ kṛtam // 254.009cd //
tatsarvaṃ tasya jānīhi yaṃ parājayase mṛṣā / 254.010ab /
dvaidhe bahūnāṃ vacanaṃ sameṣu guṇināntathā // 254.010cd //
guṇidvaidhe tu vacanaṃ grāhyaṃ ye guṇavattarāḥ / 254.011ab /
yasyocuḥ sākṣiṇaḥ satyāṃ pratijñāṃ sa jayī bhavet // 254.011cd //
anyathā vādino yasya dhrūvastasya parājayaḥ / 254.012ab /
ukte 'pi sākṣibhiḥ sākṣye yadyanye guṇavattarāḥ // 254.012cd //
dviguṇā vānyathā brūyuḥ kūṭāḥ syuḥpūrvasākṣiṇaḥ / 254.013ab /
pṛthak pṛthagdaṇḍanīyāḥ kūṭakṛtsākṣiṇas tathā // 254.013cd //
vivādāddviguṇaṃ daṇḍaṃ vivāsyo brāhmaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ / 254.014ab /
yaḥ sākṣyaṃ śrāvito 'nyebhyo nihnute tattamovṛtaḥ // 254.014cd //
||page:417
sa dāpyo 'ṣṭaguṇam daṇḍaṃ brāhmaṇantu vivāsayet / 254.015ab /
varṇināṃ hi badho yatra tatra sākṣya.anṛtaṃ vadet // 254.015cd //
yaḥ kaścidartho 'bhimataḥ svarucyā tu parasparaṃ / 254.016ab /
lekhyaṃ tu sākṣimat kāryaṃ tasmin dhanikapūrvakam // 254.016cd //
samāmāsatadarhāhar nāmajātisvagotrajaiḥ / 254.017ab /
sabrahmacārikātmīyapitṛnāmādicihnitam // 254.017cd //

alipijña ṛṇī yaḥ syālekayet svamatantu saḥ / 254.020ab /

ubhayābhyarthitenaitanmayā hy amukasūnunā / 254.021ab /
likhitaṃ hy amukeneti lekhako 'thāntato likhet // 254.021cd //
vināpi sākṣibhir lekhyaṃ svahastalikhitañca yat / 254.022ab /
tat pramāṇaṃ smṛtaṃ sarvaṃ balopadhikṛtādṛte // 254.022cd //
ṛṇaṃ lekhyakṛtaṃ deyaṃ puruṣaistribhireva tu / 254.023ab /
ādhistu bhujyate tāvadyāvattanna pradīyate // 254.023cd //
deśāntarasthe durlekhye naṣṭonmṛṣṭe hṛte tathā / 254.024ab /
bhinne cchinne tathā dagdhe lekhyamanyattu kārayet // 254.024cd //
sandigdhārthaviśuddhyarthaṃ svahastalikhitantu yat / 254.025ab /
yuktiprāptikriyācihnasambandhāgamahetubhiḥ // 254.025cd //

||page:418
dhanī copagataṃ dadyāt svahastaparicihnitam // 254.026cd //
datvarṇaṃ pāṭayellekhyaṃ śuddhyai cānyattu kārayet / 254.027ab /

tulāgnyāpo viṣaṃ koṣo divyānīha viśuddhaye / 254.028ab /
mahābhiyogeṣvetāni śīrṣakasthe 'bhiyoktari // 254.028cd //
rucyā vānyataraḥ kuryāditaro vartayecchiraḥ / 254.029ab /

nāsahasrāddharet phālaṃ na tulānna viṣantathā / 254.030ab /
nṛpārtheṣvabhiyogeṣu vaheyuḥ śucayaḥ sadā // 254.030cd //

kārayetdarvadivyāni nṛpabrāhmaṇasannidhau // 254.032cd //
tulā strībālavṛddhāndhapaṅgubrāhmaṇarogiṇāṃ / 254.033ab /
agnirjvalaṃ vā śūdrasya yavāḥ sapta viṣasya vā // 254.033cd //
tulādhāraṇavidvadbhirabhiyuktastulāśritaḥ / 254.034ab /
pratimānasamībhūto rekhāṃ kṛtvāvatāritaḥ // 254.034cd //
ādityacandrāvanilo 'nalaś ca dyaurbhūmirāpohṛdayaṃ yamaś ca / 254.035ab /
ahaś ca rātriś ca ubhe ca sandhye dharmaś ca jānāti narasya vṛttam // 254.035cd //
tvaṃ tule satyadhāmāsi purā devair vinirmitā / 254.036ab /
satyaṃ vadasva kalyāṇi saṃśayānmāṃ vimocaya // 254.036cd //
||page:419
yadyasmi pāpakṛnmātastato māṃ tvamadho naya / 254.037ab /
śuddhaścedgamayordhvammāṃ tulāmityabhimantrayet // 254.037cd //
karau vimṛditavrīherlakṣayitvā tato nyaset / 254.038ab /
saptāśvaptyasya patrāṇi tāvat sūtreṇa veṣṭayet // 254.038cd //
tvameva sarvabhūtānāmantaś carasi pāvaka / 254.039ab /
sākṣivat puṇyapāpebhyo brūhi satyaṅgare mama // 254.039cd //
tasyetyuktavato lauhaṃ pañcāśatpalikaṃ samam / 254.040ab /
agnirvarṇaṃ nyaset piṇḍaṃ hastayorubhayorapi // 254.040cd //
sa tamādāya saptaiva maṇḍalāni śatair vrajet / 254.041ab /
ṣoḍaśāṅgulakaṃ jñeyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ tāvadantaram // 254.041cd //
muktvāgniṃ mṛditavrīhiradagdhaḥ śuddhimāpnuyāt / 254.042ab /
antarā patite piṇḍe sandehe vā punarharet // 254.042cd //
pavitrāṇāṃ pavitra tvaṃ śodhyaṃ śodhaya pāvana / 254.043ab /
satyena mābhirakṣasva varuṇetyabhiśastakam // 254.043cd //
nābhidaghnodakasthasya gṛhītvorū jalaṃ viśet / 254.044ab /
samakālamiṣuṃ muktamānīyānyo javo naraḥ // 254.044cd //
yadi tasminnimagnāṅgaṃ paśyecca śuddhimāpnuyāt / 254.045ab /
tvaṃ viṣa brahmaṇaḥ putra satyadharme vyavasthita // 254.045cd //
trāyasvāsmādabhīśāpāt satyena bhava me 'mṛtam / 254.046ab /
evamuktvā viṣaṃ sārṅgaṃ bhakṣayeddhimaśailajaṃ // 254.046cd //

||page:420
ācaturdaśamādahno yasya no rājadaivikam // 254.048cd //

||ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe divyāni pramāṇāni nāma catuḥpañcāśadadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ ||
||atha pañcapañcāśadadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
 dāyavibhāgakathanam
agnir uvāca
vibhāgañcet pitā kuryādicchayā vibhajet sutān / 255.001ab /
jyeṣṭhaṃ vā śreṣṭhabhāgena sarve vā syuḥ samāṃśinaḥ // 255.001cd //
yadi dadyāt samānaṃśān kāryāḥ patnyaḥ samāṃśikāḥ / 255.002ab /
na dattaṃ strīdhanaṃ yāsāṃ bhartrā vā śvaśurena vā // 255.002cd //
śaktasthānīhamānasya kiñciddatvā pṛthak kriyā / 255.003ab /
nyūnādhikavibhaktānāṃ dharmyaś ca pitṛnā kṛtaḥ // 255.003cd //
vibhajeyuḥ sutāḥ pitrorūrdhvamṛkthamṛṇaṃ samam / 255.004ab /
māturduhitaraḥ śeṣamṛṇāttābhya ṛte 'nnayaḥ // 255.004cd //
pitṛdravyāvināśena yadanyat svayamarjayet / 255.005ab /

||page:421
anekapitṛkāṇāntu pitṛto bhāgakalpanā // 255.006cd //
bhūryāpitā mahopāttā nibandho dravyameva vā / 255.007ab /
tatra syāt sadṛśaṃ svāmyaṃ pituḥ putrasya cobhayoḥ // 255.007cd //
vibhakteṣu suto jātaḥ savarṇāyāṃ vibhāgabhāk / 255.008ab /
dṛśyādvā tadvibhāgaḥ syādāyavyayaviśodhitāt // 255.008cd //
kramādabhyāgataṃ dravyaṃ hṛtamabhyuddharecca yaḥ / 255.009ab /
dāyādebhyo na taddadyādvidyayā labdhameva ca // 255.009cd //
pitṛbhyāṃ yasya yaddattaṃ tattasyaiva dhanaṃ bhavet / 255.010ab /
piturūrdhvaṃ vibhajatāṃ mātāpyaṃśaṃ samaṃ haret // 255.010cd //
asaṃskṛtāstu saṃskāryā bhrātṛbhiḥ pūrvasaṃskṛtaiḥ / 255.011ab /
bhāginyaś ca nijādaṃśāddatvāṃśantu turīyakaṃ // 255.011cd //
catuḥstridvyekabhāgāḥ syurvarṇaśo brāhmaṇātmajāḥ / 255.012ab /
kṣatrajāstridvyekabhāgā viḍjāstu dvyekabhāginaḥ // 255.012cd //
anyonyāpahṛtaṃ dravyaṃ vibhakte yattu dṛśyate / 255.013ab /
tat punaste samair aṃśair vibhajeranniti sthitiḥ // 255.013cd //
aputreṇa parakṣetre niyogotpāditaḥ sutaḥ / 255.014ab /
ubhayorapyasāvṛkthī piṇḍadātā ca dharmataḥ // 255.014cd //
auraso dharmapatnījastatsamaḥ putrikāsutaḥ / 255.015ab /
kṣetrajaḥ kṣetrajātastu sagotreṇetareṇa vā // 255.015cd //
gṛhe pracchanna utpanno gūḍhajastu sutaḥ smṛtaḥ / 255.016ab /
kānīnaḥ kanyakājāto mātāmahasuto mataḥ // 255.016cd //
kṣatāyāmakṣatāyāṃ vā jātaḥ paunarbhavaḥ sutaḥ / 255.017ab /
dadyānmātā pitā vā yaṃ sa putrī dattako bhavet // 255.017cd //
||page:422
krītaś ca tābhyāṃ vikrītaḥ kṛtrimaḥ syāt svyaṃ kṛtaḥ / 255.018ab /
dattātmā tu svayaṃ datto garbhe vittaḥ sahoḍhajaḥ // 255.018cd //
utsṛṣṭo gṛhyate yastu sopaviddho bhavet sutaḥ / 255.019ab /
piṇḍado 'ṃśaharaś caiṣāṃ pūrvābhāve paraḥ paraḥ // 255.019cd //
sajātīyeṣvayaṃ proktastanayeṣu mayā vidhiḥ / 255.020ab /
jāto 'pi dāsyāṃ śūdrasya kāmato 'ṃśaharo bhavet // 255.020cd //
mṛte pitari kuryustaṃ bhrātarastvardhabhāgikaṃ / 255.021ab /
abhrātṛko haret sarvaṃ duhitṝṇāṃ sutādṛte // 255.021cd //
patnī duhitaraś caiva pitaro bhrātaras tathā / 255.022ab /
tatsuto gotrajo bandhuḥ śiṣyaḥ sabrahmacāriṇaḥ // 255.022cd //
eṣāmabhāve pūvasya dhanabhāguttarottaraḥ / 255.023ab /
svaryātsya hy aputrasya sarvavarṇeṣvayaṃ vidhiḥ // 255.023cd //
vānaprasthayatibrahmacāriṇāmṛkthabhāginaḥ / 255.024ab /
krameṇācāryasacchiṣyadharmabhrātrekatīrthinaḥ // 255.024cd //
saṃsṛṣṭinastu saṃsṛṣṭī sodarasya tu sodaraḥ / 255.025ab /
dadyāccāpahereccāṃśaṃ jātasya ca mṛtasya ca // 255.025cd //
anyodaryastu saṃsṛṣṭī nānyodaryadhanaṃ haret / 255.026ab /
asaṃsṛṣtyapi cādadyātsodaryo nānyamānṛjaḥ // 255.026cd //
patitastatsutaḥ klīvaḥ paṅgurunmattako jaḍaḥ / 255.027ab /
andho 'cikitsyarogādyā bhartavyāstu niraṃśakāḥ // 255.027cd //
aurasāḥ kṣetrajāstveṣāṃ nirdoṣā bhāgahāriṇaḥ / 255.028ab /
sutāś caiṣāṃ prabhartavyā yāvadvai bhartṛsātkṛtāḥ // 255.028cd //
aputrā yoṣitaś caiṣāṃ bhartavyāḥ sādhuvṛttayaḥ / 255.029ab /
||page:423
nirvāsyā vyabhicāriṇyaḥ pratikūlāstathaiva ca // 255.029cd //
pitṛmātṛpatibhrātṛdattamadhyagnyupāgataṃ / 255.030ab /
ādhivedanikuñcaiva strīdhanaṃ parikīrtitaṃ // 255.030cd //
bandhudattaṃ tathā śulkamanvādheyakameva ca / 255.031ab /
aprajāyāmatītāyāṃ bāndhavāstadavāpnuyuḥ // 255.031cd //
aprajāstrīdhanaṃ bhratturbrāhmyādiṣu caturṣvapi / 255.032ab /
duhitṛṇāṃ prasūtā cecchreṣe tu pitṛgāmi tat // 255.032cd //
datvā kanyāṃ haran daṇḍyo vyayaṃ dadyācca sodayam / 255.033ab /

durbhikṣe dharmakārye ca vyādhau saṃpratirodhake / 255.034ab /
gṛhītaṃ strīdhanaṃ bhartā na striye dātumarhati // 255.034cd //
adhivittastriyai dadyādadhivedanikaṃ samam / 255.035ab /
na dattaṃ srīdhanaṃ yasyai datte tvardhaṃ prakīrtitam // 255.035cd //
vibhāganihnave jñātibandhusākṣyabhilekhitaiḥ / 255.036ab /
vibhāgabhāvanā jñeyā gṛhakṣetraiś ca yautikaiḥ // 255.036cd //
||ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe dāyavibhāgo nāma pañcapañcāśadadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ ||

||atha ṣaṭpañcāśadadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
sīmāvivādādinirṇayaḥ
agnir uvāca
sīmno vivāde kṣetrasya sāmantāḥ sthavirā gaṇāḥ / 256.001ab /
gopāḥ sīmākṛṣāṇā ye sarve ca vanagocarāḥ // 256.001cd //
nayeyurete sīmānaṃ sthalāṅgāratuṣadrumaiḥ / 256.002ab /
setuvalmīkanimnāsthicaityādyair upalakṣitām // 256.002cd //
sāmantā vā samaṃgrāmāś catvāro 'ṣṭau daśāpi vā / 256.003ab /
raktasragvasanāḥ sīmānnayeyuḥ kṣitidhāriṇaḥ // 256.003cd //
anṛte tu pṛthagdaṇḍyā rājñā madhyamasāhasam / 256.004ab /
abhāve jñātṛcihnānāṃ rājā sīmnaḥ pravattakaḥ // 256.004cd //
ārāmāyatanagrāmanipānodyānaveśmasu / 256.005ab /
eṣa eva vidhirjñeyo varṣāmvupravaheṣu ca // 256.005cd //
maryādāyāḥ prabhedeṣu kṣetrasya haraṇe tathā / 256.006ab /
maryādāyāś ca daṇḍyāḥ syuradhamottamamadhyamāḥ // 256.006cd //
na niṣedhyo 'lpabādhastu setuḥ kalyāṇakārakaḥ / 256.007ab /
parabhūmiṃ haran kūpaḥ svalpakṣetro bahūdakaḥ // 256.007cd //
svāmine yo 'nivedyaiva kṣetre setuṃ prakalpayet / 256.008ab /
utpanne svāmino bhogastadabhāve mahīpateḥ // 256.008cd //
phālāhatamapi kṣetraṃ yo na kuryānna kārayet / 256.009ab /
||page:425
sa pradāpyo 'kṛṣṭaphalaṃ kṣetramanyena kārayet // 256.009cd //
māsānaṣṭau tu mahiṣī satyaghātasya kāriṇī / 256.010ab /
daṇḍanīyā tadardhantu gaustadardhamajāvikaṃ // 256.010cd //
bhakṣayitvopaviṣṭānāṃ yathoktād dviguṇo damaḥ / 256.011ab /
samameṣāṃ vivītepi svarāṣṭraṃ mahiṣīsamam // 256.011cd //
yāvat satyaṃ vinaṣṭantu tāvat kṣetrī phalaṃ labhet / 256.012ab /
pālastāḍyo 'tha gosvāmī pūrvoktaṃ daṇḍamarhati // 256.012cd //
pathi grāmavivītānte kṣetre doṣo na vidyate / 256.013ab /
akāmataḥ kāmacāre cauravaddaṇḍamarhati // 256.013cd //
mahotkṣotsṛṣṭapaśavaḥ sūtikāgantukā ca gauḥ / 256.014ab /
pālo yeṣāntu mocyā daivarājapariplutāḥ // 256.014cd //
yathārpitān paśūn gopoḥ sāyaṃ pratyarpayettathā / 256.015ab /
pramādamṛtanaṣṭāṃś ca pradāpyaḥ kṛtavetanaḥ // 256.015cd //
pāladoṣavināśe tu pāle daṇḍo vidhīyate / 256.016ab /
ardhatrayodaśapaṇaḥ svāmino dravyameva ca // 256.016cd //
grāmecchayā gopracāro bhūmirājavaśena vā / 256.017ab /
dvijastṛṇaidhaḥpuṣpāṇi sarvataḥ svavadāharet // 256.017cd //
dhanuḥśataṃ parīṇāho grāmakṣetrāntaraṃ bhavet / 256.018ab /
dve śate kharvaṭasya syānnagarasya catuḥśatam // 256.018cd //
svaṃ labhetānyavikrītaṃ kreturdoṣo 'prakāśite / 256.019ab /
hīnādraho hīnamūlye velāhīne ca taskaraḥ // 256.019cd //
naṣṭāpahṛtamāsādya hartāraṃ grāhayennaram / 256.020ab /
deśakālātipattau vā gṛhītvā svayamarpayet // 256.020cd //
||page:426
vikreturdarśanācchuddhiḥ svāmī dravyaṃ nṛpo damam / 256.021ab /
kretā mūlyaṃ samāpnoti tasmādyastatra vikrayī // 256.021cd //
āgamenopabhogena naṣṭaṃ bhāvyamato 'nyathā / 256.022ab /
pañcabandho damastasya rājñe tenāpyabhāvite // 256.022cd //
hṛtaṃ pranaṣṭaṃ yo dravyaṃ parahastādavāpnuyāt / 256.023ab /
anivedya nṛpe daṇḍyaḥ sa tu ṣannayatiṃ paṇān // 256.023cd //
śaulkikaiḥ sthānapālair vā naṣṭāpahṛtamāhṛtaṃ / 256.024ab /
arvāk saṃvatsarāt svāmī labhate parato nṛpaḥ // 256.024cd //
paṇānekaśaphe dadyāccaturaḥ pañca mānuṣe / 256.025ab /
mahiṣoṣṭragavāṃ dvau dvau pādaṃ pādamajāvike // 256.025cd //
svakuṭumbāvirodhena deyaṃ dārasutādṛte / 256.026ab /
nānvaye sati sarvasvaṃ deyaṃ yaccānyasaṃśrutam // 256.026cd //
pratigrahaḥ prakāśaḥ syāt sthāvarasya viśeṣataḥ / 256.027ab /
deyaṃ pratiśrutañcaiva datvā nāpaharet punaḥ // 256.027cd //
daśaikapañcasaptāhamāsatryahārdhamāsikaṃ / 256.028ab /
vījāyovāhyaratnastrīdohyapuṃsāṃ pratīkṣaṇam // 256.028cd //
agnau suvarṇamakṣīṇaṃ dvipalaṃ rajate śate / 256.029ab /
aṣṭau trapuṇi sīse ca tāmre pañcadaśāyasi // 256.029cd //
śate daśapalāvṛddhiraurṇe kārpāsike tathā / 256.030ab /
madhye pañcapalā jñeyā sūkṣme tu tripalā matā // 256.030cd //
kārmike romabaddhe ca triṃśadbhāgaḥ kṣayo mataḥ / 256.031ab /
na kṣayo na ca vṛddhistu kauśeye valkaleṣu ca // 256.031cd //
deśaṃ kālañca bhogañca jñātvā naṣṭe balābalam / 256.032ab /
||page:427
dravyāṇāṃ kuśalā brūyuryattaddāpyamasaṃśayam // 256.032cd //
balāddāsīkṛtaś caurair vikrītaścāpi mucyate / 256.033ab /
svāmiprāṇaprado bhaktatyāgāttanniṣkrayādapi // 256.033cd //
pravrajyāvasito rājño dāsa āmaraṇāntikaḥ / 256.034ab /
varṇānāmānulomyena dāsyaṃ na pratilomataḥ // 256.034cd //
kṛtaśilpopi nivaset kṛtakālaṃ gurorgṛhe / 256.035ab /
antevāsī guruprāptabhojanastratphalaptadaḥ // 256.035cd //
rājā kṛtvā pure sthānaṃ brāhmaṇānnyasya tatra tu / 256.036ab /
traividyaṃ vṛttimadbrūyāt svadharmaḥ pālyatāmiti // 256.036cd //
nijadharmāvirodhena yastu sāmayiko bhavet / 256.037ab /
so 'pi yatnena saṃrakṣyo dharmo rājakṛtaś ca yaḥ // 256.037cd //
gaṇadravyaṃ haredyastu saṃvidaṃ laṅghayecca yaḥ / 256.038ab /
sarvasvaharaṇaṃ kṛtvā taṃ rāṣṭrādvipravāsayet // 256.038cd //
kartavyaṃ vacanaṃ sarvaiḥ samūhahitavādibhiḥ / 256.039ab /
yastatra viparītaḥ syātsa dāpyaḥ prathamaṃ damam // 256.039cd //
samūhakāryaprahito yallabhettattadarpayet / 256.040ab /
ekādaśaguṇaṃ dāpyo yadyasau nārpayet svayam // 256.040cd //
vedajñāḥ śucayo 'lubdhā bhaveyuḥ kāryacintakāḥ / 256.041ab /
kartavyaṃ vacanaṃ teṣāṃ samūhahitavādināṃ // 256.041cd //
śreṇinaigamapākhaṇḍigaṇānāmapyayaṃ vidhiḥ / 256.042ab /
bhedañcaiṣāṃ nṛpo rakṣet pūrvavṛttiñca pālayet // 256.042cd //
gṛhītavetanaḥ karma tyajan dviguṇamāvahet / 256.043ab /
agṛhīte samaṃ dāpyo bhṛtyai rakṣya upaskaraḥ // 256.043cd //
||page:428
dāpyastu daśamaṃ bhāgaṃ bāṇijyapaśusasyataḥ / 256.044ab /
aniścitya bhṛtiṃ yastu kārayetsa mahīkṣitā // 256.044cd //
deśaṃ kālañca yo 'tīyāt karma kuryācca yo 'nyathā / 256.045ab /
tatra tu svāminaśchando 'dhikaṃ deyaṃ kṛte 'dhike // 256.045cd //
yo yāvat kurute karma tāvattasya tu vetanam / 256.046ab /
ubhayorapyasādhyañcet sādhye kuryādyathāśrutam // 256.046cd //
arājadaivikannaṣṭaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ dāpyastu vāhakaḥ / 256.047ab /
prasthānavighnakṛccaiva pradāpyo dviguṇāṃ bhṛtim // 256.047cd //
prakrānte saptamaṃ bhāgaṃ caturthaṃ pathi saṃtyajan / 256.048ab /
bhṛtimardhapathe sarvāṃ pradāpyastyājakoapi ca // 256.048cd //
glahe śatikavṛddhestu sabhikaḥ pañcakaṃ gataṃ / 256.049ab /
gṛhṇīyāddhūrtakitavāditarāddaśakaṃ śataṃ // 256.049cd //
sa samyakpālito dadyādrājñe bhāgaṃ yathākṛtaṃ / 256.050ab /
jitamudgrāhayejjetre dadyātsatyaṃ vacaḥ kṣamī // 256.050cd //
prāpte nṛpatinā bhāge prasiddhe dhūrtamaṇḍale / 256.051ab /
jitaṃ saśabhike sthāne dāpayedanyathā na tu // 256.051cd //
draṣṭāro vyavahārāṇāṃ sākṣiṇaś ca ta eva hi / 256.052ab /
rājñā sacihnā nirvāsyāḥ kūṭākṣopadhidevinaḥ // 256.052cd //
dyūtamekamukhaṃ kāryaṃ taskarajñānakāraṇāt / 256.053ab /
eṣa eva vidhirjñeyaḥ prāṇidyūte samāhvaye // 256.053cd //
||ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe sīmāvivādādinirṇayo nāma ṣaṭpañcāśadadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ ||
||page:429
||atha saptapañcāśadadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
vākpāruṣyādiprakaraṇam
agnir uvāca
satyāsatyānyathā stotrair nyūnāṅgendriyarogiṇāṃ / 257.001ab /
kṣepaṃ karoti ceddaṇḍyaḥ paṇānardhatrayodaśa // 257.001cd //
abhigantāsmi bhaginīmmātaraṃ vā taveti ca / 257.002ab /
śapantaṃ dāpayedrājā pañcaviṃśatikaṃ damaṃ // 257.002cd //
ardho 'dhameṣu dviguṇaḥ parastrīṣūttameṣu ca / 257.003ab /
daṇḍapraṇayanaṃ kāryaṃ varṇajātyuttarādharaiḥ // 257.003cd //
prātilomyāpavādeṣu dviguṇatriguṇā damāḥ / 257.004ab /
varṇānāmānulomyena tasmādevārdhahānitaḥ // 257.004cd //
vāhugrīvānetrasakthivināśe vācike damaḥ / 257.005ab /
śatyastato 'rdhikaḥ pādanāsākarṇikarādiṣu // 257.005cd //
aśaktastu vadannevandaṇḍanīyaḥ paṇān daśa / 257.006ab /
tathā śaktaḥ pratibhuvaṃ dadyāt kṣemāya tasya tu // 257.006cd //
patanīyakṛte kṣepe daṇḍī madhyamasāhasaḥ / 257.007ab /
upapātakayukte tu dāpyaḥ prathamasāhasaṃ // 257.007cd //
traividyanṛpadevānāṃ kṣepa uttamasāhasaḥ / 257.008ab /
||page:430
madhyamo jñātipūgānāṃ prathamo grāmadeśayoḥ // 257.008cd //
asākṣikahate cihnair yuktibhinnāgamena ca / 257.009ab /
draṣṭavyo vyavahārastu kūṭacihnakṛtādbhayāt // 257.009cd //
bhasmapaṅkarajaḥsparśe daṇḍo daśapaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ / 257.010ab /
amedhyapārṣṇiniṣṭhyūtasparśane dviguṇaḥ smṛtaḥ // 257.010cd //
sameṣvevaṃ parastrīṣu dviguṇastūttameṣu ca / 257.011ab /
hīneṣvardhaṃ damo mohamadādibhiradaṇḍanam // 257.011cd //
viprapīḍākaraṃ cchedyamaṅgamabrāhmaṇasya tu / 257.012ab /
udgūrṇe prathamo daṇḍaḥ saṃsparśe tu tadardhikaḥ // 257.012cd //
udgūrṇe hastapāde tu daśaviṃśatikau damau / 257.013ab /
parasparantu sarveṣāṃ śāstre madhyamasāhasaḥ // 257.013cd //
pādakeśāṃśukakarolluñcaneṣu paṇān daśa / 257.014ab /
pīḍākarṣāṃ śukāveṣṭapādādhyāse śatandamaḥ // 257.014cd //
śoṇitena vinā duḥsvaṅkurvan kāṣṭhādibhirnaraḥ / 257.015ab /
dvātriṃśataṃ paṇān dāpyo dviguṇaṃ darśane 'sṛjaḥ // 257.015cd //
karapādadato bhaṅge cchedane karṇanāsayoḥ / 257.016ab /
madhyo daṇḍo vraṇodbhede mṛtakalpahate tathā // 257.016cd //
ceṣṭābhojanavāgrodhe netrādipratibhedane / 257.017ab /
kandharābāhusakthyāñca bhaṅge madhyamasāhasaḥ // 257.017cd //
ekaṃ ghnatāṃ bahūnāñca yathoktāddviguṇā damāḥ / 257.018ab /
kalahāpahṛtaṃ deyaṃ daṇḍastu dviguṇaḥ smṛtaḥ // 257.018cd //
duḥkhamutpādayedyastu sa samutthānajaṃ vyayam / 257.019ab /
||page:431
dāpyo daṇḍañca yo yasmin kalahe samudāhṛtaḥ // 257.019cd //
tarikaḥ sthalajaṃ śulkaṃ gṛhnan daṇḍyaḥ paṇāndaśa / 257.020ab /
brāhmaṇaprātiveśyānāmetadevānimantraṇe // 257.020cd //
abhighāte tathā bhede cchede buddhyāvapātane / 257.021ab /
paṇāndāpyaḥ pañcadaśaviṃśatiṃ tattrayantathā // 257.021cd //
duḥsvotpādigṛhe dravyaṃ kṣipan prāṇaharaṃ tathā / 257.022ab /
ṣāḍaśādyaṃ paṇāt dāpyo dvitīyo madhyamandamam // 257.022cd //
duḥkhe ca śoṇitotpāde śākhāṅgacchedane tathā / 257.023ab /
daṇḍaḥ kṣudrapaśūnāṃ syāddvipaṇaprabhṛtiḥ kramāt // 257.023cd //
liṅgasya cchedane mṛttau madhyamo mūlyameva ca / 257.024ab /
mahāpaśūnāmeteṣu sthāneṣu dviguṇā damāḥ // 257.024cd //
prarohiśākhināṃ śākhāskandhasarvavidāraṇe / 257.025ab /
upajīvyadrumāṇāntu viṃśaterdviguṇā damāḥ // 257.025cd //
yaḥ sāhasaṅkārayati sa dāpyo dviguṇandamam / 257.026ab /
yastvevamuktvāhaṃ dātā kārayet sa caturguṇam // 257.026cd //
āryākrośātikramakṛdbhrātṛjāyāprahāradaḥ / 257.027ab /
sandiṣṭasyāpradātā ca samudragṛhabhedakaḥ // 257.027cd //
sāmantakulikādīnāmapakārasya kārakaḥ / 257.028ab /
pañcāśatpaṇiko daṇḍa eṣāmiti viniś cayaḥ // 257.028cd //
svacchandavidhavāgāmī vikruṣṭe nābhidhāvakaḥ / 257.029ab /
akāraṇe ca vikroṣṭā caṇḍālaścottamān spṛśan // 257.029cd //
śūdraḥ pravrajitānāñca daive paitrye ca bhojakaḥ / 257.030ab /
||page:432
ayuktaṃ śapathaṃ kurvannayogyo yogyakarmakṛt // 257.030cd //
vṛṣakṣudrapaśūnāñca pūṃstvasya pratighātakṛt / 257.031ab /
sādhāraṇasyāpalopī dāsīgarbhavināśakṛt // 257.031cd //
pitāputrasvasṛbhrātṛdampatyācāryaśiṣyakāḥ / 257.032ab /
eṣāmapatitānyonyatyāgī ca śatadaṇḍabhāk // 257.032cd //
vasānastrīn paṇān daṇḍyo nejakastu parāṃśukam / 257.033ab /
vikrayāvakrayādhānayāciteṣu paṇān daśa // 257.033cd //
tulāśāsanamānānāṃ kūṭakṛnnāṇakasya ca / 257.034ab /
ebhiś ca vyavahartā yaḥ sa dāpyo daṇḍamuttamam // 257.034cd //
akūṭaṃ kūṭakaṃ brūte kūṭaṃ yaścāpyakūṭakam / 257.035ab /
sa nāṇakaparīkṣī tu dāpyaḥ prathamasāhasam // 257.035cd //
bhiṣaṅmithyācaran dāpyastiryakṣu prathamaṃ damam / 257.036ab /
mānuṣe madhyamaṃ rājamānuṣeṣūttamantathā // 257.036cd //
abadhyaṃ yaś ca badhnāti badhyaṃ yaś ca pramuñcati / 257.037ab /
aprāptavyavahārañca sa dāpyo damamuttamam // 257.037cd //
mānena tulayā vāpi yo 'ṃśamaṣṭamakaṃ haret / 257.038ab /
dvāviṃśatipaṇān dāpyo vṛddhau hānau ca kalpitam // 257.038cd //
bheṣajasnehalavaṇagandhānyaguḍādiṣu / 257.039ab /
paṇyeṣu prakṣipan hīnaṃ paṇāndāpyastu ṣoḍaśa // 257.039cd //
sambhūya kurvatāmarghaṃ sabādhaṃ kāruśilpināṃ / 257.040ab /
arthasya hrāsaḥ vṛddhiṃ vā sahasro daṇḍa ucyate // 257.040cd //
rājāni sthāpyate yo 'rthaḥ pratyahaṃ tena vikrayaḥ / 257.041ab /
krayo vā nisravastasmādbaṇijāṃ lābhakṛt smṛtaḥ // 257.041cd //
||page:433
svadeśapaṇye tu śataṃ baṇij gṛhṇīta pañcakaṃ / 257.042ab /
daśakaṃ pāradeśye tu yaḥ sadyaḥ krayavikrayau // 257.042cd //
paṇyasyopari saṃsthāpya vyayaṃ paṇyasamudbhavaṃ / 257.043ab /
artho 'nugrahakṛt kāryaḥ kreturvikretureva ca // 257.043cd //
gṛhītamūlyaṃ yaḥ paṇyaṃ kreturnaiva prayacchati / 257.044ab /
sodayantasya dāpyo 'sau diglābhaṃ vā digāgate // 257.044cd //
vikrītamapi vikreyaṃ pūrve kretaryagṛhṇati / 257.045ab /
hāniścet kretṛdoṣeṇa kretureva hi sā bhavet // 257.045cd //
rājadaivopaghātena paṇye doṣamupāgate / 257.046ab /
hānirvikreturevāsau yācitasyāprayacchataḥ // 257.046cd //
anyahaste ca vikrītaṃ duṣṭaṃ vā duṣṭavadyadi / 257.047ab /
vikrīnīte damastatra tanmūlyādadviguṇo bhavet // 257.047cd //
kṣayaṃ vṛddhiñca baṇijā paṇyānāmavijānatā / 257.048ab /
krītvā nānuśayaḥ kāryaḥ kurvan ṣaḍ bhāgadaṇḍabhāk // 257.048cd //
samavāyena baṇijāṃ lābhārthaṃ karma kurvatāṃ / 257.049ab /
labhālābhau yathā dravyaṃ yathā vā saṃvidā kṛtau // 257.049cd //
pratiṣiddhamanādiṣṭaṃ pramādādyacca nāśitaṃ / 257.050ab /
sa taddayādvipravācca rakṣitāddaśamāṃśabhāk // 257.050cd //
arthaprekṣapaṇādviṃśaṃ bhāgaṃ śulkaṃ nṛpā haret / 257.051ab /
vyāsiddhaṃ rājayogyañca vikrītaṃ rājagāmi tat // 257.051cd //
mithyā vadan parīmāṇaṃ śulkasthānādapakraman / 257.052ab /
dāpyastvaṣṭaguṇaṃ yaś ca savyājakrayavikrayau // 257.052cd //
deśantaragate prete dravyaṃ dāyādabāndhavāḥ / 257.053ab /
||page:434
jñātayo vā hareyustadāgatāstair vinā nṛpaḥ // 257.053cd //
jihmaṃ tyajeyurnirlobhamaśakto 'nyena kārayet / 257.054ab /
anena vidhirākhyāta ṛtvikkarṣakarmiṇāṃ // 257.054cd //
grāhakair gṛhyate cauro loptreṇātha padena vā / 257.055ab /
pūrvakarmāparādhī vā tathaivāśuddhavāsakaḥ // 257.055cd //
anye 'pi śaṅkayā grāhyā jātināmādinihnavaiḥ / 257.056ab /
dyūtastrīpānaśaktāś ca śuṣkabhinnamukhasvarāḥ // 257.056cd //
paradravyagṛhāṇāñca pṛcchakā gūḍhacāriṇaḥ / 257.057ab /
nirāyā vyayavantaś ca vinaṣṭa dravyavikrayāḥ // 257.057cd //
gṛhītaḥ śaṅkayā cauryenātmānañcedviśodhayet / 257.058ab /
dāpayitvā hṛtaṃ dravyaṃ cauradaṇḍena daṇḍayet // 257.058cd //
cauraṃ pradāpyāpahṛtaṃ ghātayedvividhair budhaiḥ / 257.059ab /
sacihnaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ kṛtvā svarāṣṭrādvipravāsayet // 257.059cd //
ghātite 'pahṛte doṣo grāmabharturanirgate / 257.060ab /
svasīmni dadyādgrāmastu padaṃ vā yatra gacchati // 257.060cd //
pañcagrāmī vahiḥ krośāddaśagrāmya.atha vā punaḥ / 257.061ab /
vandigrāhāṃs tathā vājikuñjarāṇāñca hāriṇaḥ // 257.061cd //
prasahya ghātinaś caiva śūlamāropayennarān / 257.062ab /
utkṣepakagranthibhedau karasandaṃśahīnakau // 257.062cd //
kāryau dvitīyāparādhe karapādaikahīnakau / 257.063ab /
bhaktāvakāśāgnyudakamantrāpakaraṇavyayān // 257.063cd //
dattvā caurasya hanturvā jānato dama uttamaḥ / 257.064ab /
śastrāvapāte garbhasya pātane cottamo damaḥ // 257.064cd //
||page:435
uttamo vādhamo vāpi puruṣastrīpramāpaṇe / 257.065ab /
śilāṃ baddhvā kṣipedapsu naraghnīṃ viṣadāṃ striyaṃ // 257.065cd //
viṣāgnidāṃ nijagurunijāpatyapramāpaṇīṃ / 257.066ab /
vikarṇakaranāsauṣṭhīṃ kṛtvā gobhiḥ pramāpayet // 257.066cd //
kṣetraveśmavanagrāmavivītakhaladāhakāḥ / 257.067ab /
rājapatny abhigāmī ca dagdhavyāstu kaṭāgninā // 257.067cd //
pumān saṃgrahaṇe grāhyaḥ keśākeśiparastriyāḥ / 257.068ab /
svajātāvuttamo daṇḍa ānulomye tu madhyamaḥ // 257.068cd //
prātilomye badhaḥ puṃsāṃ nāryāḥ karṇāvakartanam / 257.069ab /
nīvīstanaprāvaraṇanābhikeśāvamardanam // 257.069cd //
adeśakālasambhāṣaṃ sahāvasthānameva ca / 257.070ab /
strī niṣedhe śataṃ dadyād dviśatantu damaṃ pumān // 257.070cd //
pratiṣedhe tayordaṇḍo yathā saṃgrahaṇe tathā / 257.071ab /
paśūn gacchaṃśchataṃ dāpyo hīnāṃ strīṃ gāś ca madhyamam // 257.071cd //
avaruddhāsu dāsīṣu bhujiṣyāsu tathaiva ca / 257.072ab /
gamyāsvapi pumāndāpyaḥ pañcāśat paṇikandamam // 257.072cd //
prasahya dāsyabhigame daṇḍo daśapaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ / 257.073ab /
kubandhenāṅkya gamayedantyāpravrajitāgame // 257.073cd //
nyūnaṃ vāpyadhikaṃ vāpi likhedyo rājaśāsanam / 257.074ab /
pāradārikacauraṃ vā muñcato daṇḍa uttamaḥ // 257.074cd //
abhakṣair dūṣayan vipraṃ daṇḍa uttamasāhasam / 257.075ab /
kūṭasvarṇavyavahārī vimāṃsasya ca vikrayī // 257.075cd //
aṅgahīnaś ca kartavyo dāpyaścottamasāhasaṃ / 257.076ab /
||page:436
śakto hy amokṣayan svāmī daṃṣṭriṇaḥ śṛṅgiṇas tathā // 257.076cd //
prathamaṃ sāhasaṃ dadyādvikruṣṭe dviguṇaṃ tathā / 257.077ab /
acaurañcaure 'bhivadan dāpyaḥ pañcaśataṃ damaṃ // 257.077cd //
rājño 'niṣṭapravaktāraṃ tasyaivākrośakaṃ tathā / 257.078ab /
mṛtāṅgalagnavikreturgurostāḍayitus tathā // 257.078cd //
tanmantrasya ca bhettāraṃ chittvā jihvāṃ pravāsayet / 257.079ab /
rājayānāsanāroḍhurdaṇḍo madhyamasāhasaḥ // 257.079cd //
dvinetrabhedino rājadviṣṭādeśakṛtas tathā / 257.080ab /
vipratvena ca śūdrasya jīvato 'ṣṭaśato damaḥ // 257.080cd //
yo manyetājito 'smīti nyāyenābhiparājitaḥ / 257.081ab /
tamāyāntaṃ punarjitvā daṇḍayeddviguṇaṃ damaṃ // 257.081cd //
rājñānyāyena yo daṇḍo gṛhīto varuṇāyataṃ / 257.082ab /
vivedya dadyādviprebhyaḥ svayaṃ triṃśadguṇīkṛtaṃ // 257.082cd //
dharmaścārthaś ca kīrtiñca lokapaṅktirupagrahaḥ / 257.083ab /
prajābhyo bahumānañca svargasthānañca śāśvatam // 257.083cd //
paśyato vyavahārāṃś ca guṇāḥ syuḥ sapta bhūpateḥ // 257.084ab //
||ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe vākpāruṣyādiprakaraṇaṃ nāma saptapañcāśadadhikadviśatatmo 'dhyāyaḥ ||
||page:437
||athāṣṭapañcāśadadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
ṛgvidhānaṃ
agnir uvāca
ṛgyajuḥsāmātharvavidhānaṃ puṣkaroditam / 258.001ab /
bhuktimuktikaraṃ japyāddhomādrāmāya tadvade // 258.001cd //
puṣkara uvāca
prativedantu karmāṇi kāryāṇi pravadāmi te / 258.002ab /
prathamaṃ ṛgvidhānaṃ vai śṛṇu tvaṃ bhuktimuktidam // 258.002cd //
antarjale tathā home japatī manasepsitam / 258.003ab /
kāmaṃ karoti gāyatrī prāṇāyāmādviśeṣataḥ // 258.003cd //
gāyatryā daśasāhasro japo naktāśano dvija / 258.004ab /
bahusnātasya tatraiva sarvakalmaṣanāśanaḥ // 258.004cd //
daśāyutāni japtvātha haviṣyāśī sa muktibhāk / 258.005ab /
praṇavo hi paraṃ brahma tajjapaḥ sarvapāpahā // 258.005cd //
oṃkāraśatajaptantu nābhimātrodake sthitaḥ / 258.006ab /
jalaṃ pivet sa sarvaistu pāpair vai vipramucyate // 258.006cd //
mātrātrayaṃ trayo vedāstrayo devāstrayo 'gnayaḥ / 258.007ab /
mahāvyāhṛtayaḥ sapta lokā homo 'khilāghahā // 258.007cd //
gāyatrī paramā jāpyā mahāvyāhṛtayas tathā / 258.008ab /
antarjale tathā rāma proktaś caivāghamarṣaṇaḥ // 258.008cd //
agnimīle purohitaṃ sūtko 'yaṃ vahnidaivataḥ / 258.009ab /
||page:438
śirasā dhārayan vahniṃ yo japetparivatsaram // 258.009cd //
homaṃ triṣavaṇaṃ bhaikṣyamanagnijvalanañcaret / 258.010ab /
ataḥ paramṛcaḥ sapta vāyvādyā yāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // 258.010cd //
tā japan prayato nityamiṣṭān kāmān samaśnute / 258.011ab /
medhākāmo japennityaṃ sadasanyamiti tyacam // 258.011cd //
anvayo yannimāḥ proktāḥ navarco mṛtyunāśanāḥ / 258.012ab /
śunaḥśephamṛṣiṃ baddhaḥ sanniruddho 'tha vā japet // 258.012cd //
mucyate sarvapāpebhyo gadī vāpyagado bhavet / 258.013ab /
ya icchecchāśvataṃ kāmaṃ mitraṃ prājñaṃ purandaraṃ // 258.013cd //
ṛgbhiḥ ṣoḍśabhiḥ kuryādindriyasyeti dine dine / 258.014ab /
hiraṇyastūpamityetajjapan śatrūn prabādhate // 258.014cd //
kṣemī bhavati cādhvāno ye te panthā japan naraḥ / 258.015ab /
raudrībhiḥṣaḍbhirīśānaṃ stūyādyo vai dine dine // 258.015cd //
caruṃ vā kalpayedraudraṃ tasya śāntiḥ parā bhavet / 258.016ab /
udityudantamādityamupatiṣṭhan dine dine // 258.016cd //
kṣipejjalāñjalīn sapta manoduḥkhavināśanaṃ / 258.017ab /
dviṣantamityathārdharcaṃ yadviprāntaṃ japan smaret // 258.017cd //
āgaskṛt saptarātreṇa vidveṣamadhigacchati / 258.018ab /
ārogyakāmī rogī vā praskannasyottamaṃ japet // 258.018cd //
uttamastasya cārdharco japedvai vividhāsane / 258.019ab /
udayatyāyurakṣyayyaṃ tejo madhyandine japet // 258.019cd //
||page:439
astaṃ pratigate sūrye dviṣantaṃ pratibādhate / 258.020ab /
na vayaśceti sūktāni japan śatrūnniyacchati // 258.020cd //
ekādaśa suparṇasya sarvakāmānvinirdiśet / 258.021ab /
ādhyātmikīḥ ka ity etā japanmokṣamavāpnuyāt // 258.021cd //
ā no bhadrā ity anena dīrghamāyuravāpnuyāt / 258.022ab /
tvaṃ someti ca sūktena navaṃ paśyenniśākaraṃ // 258.022cd //
upatiṣṭhet samitpāṇirvāsāṃsyāpnotyasaṃśayaṃ / 258.023ab /
āyurīpsannimamiti kautsa sūktaṃ sadā japet // 258.023cd //
āpanaḥ śośucaditi stutvā madhye divākaraṃ / 258.024ab /
yathā muñcati ceṣokāṃ tathā pāpaṃ pramuñcati // 258.024cd //
jātavedasa ity etajjapet svastyayanaṃ pathi / 258.025ab /
bhayair vimucyate sarvaiḥ svastimānāpnuyāt gṛhān // 258.025cd //
vyuṣṭāyāñca tathā rātryāmetadduḥsvapnanāśanaṃ / 258.026ab /
pramandineti sūyantyā japedgarbhavimocanaṃ // 258.026cd //
japannindramiti snāto vaiśyadevantu saptakaṃ / 258.027ab /
muñcatyājyaṃ tathā juhvat sakalaṃ kilviṣaṃ naraḥ // 258.027cd //
imāmiti japan śaśvat kāmānāpnotyabhīpsitān / 258.028ab /
mānastoka iti dvābhyāṃ trirātropoṣitaḥ śuciḥ // 258.028cd //
auḍumbarīś ca juhuyātsamidhaścājyasaṃskṛtāḥ / 258.029ab /
chittvā sarvānmṛtyupāśān jīvedrogavivarjitaḥ // 258.029cd //
ūrdhvabāhuranenaiva stutvā sambhuṃ tathaiva ca / 258.030ab /
mānastoketi ca ṛcā śikhābandhe kṛte naraḥ // 258.030cd //
aghṛṣyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ jāyate saṃśayaṃ vinā / 258.031ab /
||page:440
citramityupatiṣṭheta trisandhyaṃ bhāskaraṃ tathā // 258.031cd //
samitpāṇirnaro nityamīpsitaṃ dhanamāpnuyāt / 258.032ab /
atha svapneti ca japan prātarmadhyandine dine // 258.032cd //
duḥsvapnañcārhate kṛtsnaṃ bhojanañcāpnuyācchubham / 258.033ab /
ubhe pumāniti tathā rakṣoghnaḥ parikīrtitaḥ // 258.033cd //
ubhe vāsā iti ṛco japan kāmānavāpnuyāt / 258.034ab /
na sāganniti ca japan mucyate cātatāyinaḥ // 258.034cd //
kayā śubheti ca japan jātiśraiṣṭhamavāpnuyāt / 258.035ab /
imannṛsomamityetat sarvān kāmānavāpnuyāt // 258.035cd //
pitarityupatiṣṭheta nityamarthamupasthitaṃ / 258.036ab /
agne nayeti sūktena ghṛtahomaś ca mārgagaḥ // 258.036cd //
vīrānnayamavāpnoti suślokaṃ yo japet sadā / 258.037ab /
kaṅkato neti sūktena viṣān sarvān vyapohati // 258.037cd //
yo jāta iti sūktena sarvān kāmānavāpnuyāt / 258.038ab /
gaṇānāmiti sūktena śnigdhamāpnotyanuttamaṃ // 258.038cd //
yo me rājannitīmāntu duḥsvapnaśamanīmṛcaṃ / 258.039ab /
adhvani prasthito yastu paśyecchatrūṃ samutthitaṃ // 258.039cd //
apraśastaṃ praśastaṃ vā kuvidaṅga imaṃ japet / 258.040ab /
dvāviṃśakaṃ japan sūktamādhyātmikamanuttamaṃ // 258.040cd //
parvasu prayato nityamiṣṭān kāmān samaśnute / 258.041ab /
kṛṇuṣveti japan sūktaṃ juhvadājyaṃ samāhitaḥ // 258.041cd //
||page:441
ārātīnāṃ haret prāṇān rakṣāṃsyapi vināśayet / 258.042ab /
upatiṣṭhet svayaṃ vahniṃ parityṛcā dine dine // 258.042cd //
taṃ rakṣati svayaṃ vahnirviśvato viśvatomukhaḥ / 258.043ab /
haṃsaḥ śuciḥ sadityetacchucirīkṣeddivākaraṃ // 258.043cd //
kṛṣiṃ prapadyamānastu sthālīpākaṃ yathāvidhi / 258.044ab /
juhuyāt kṣetramadhye tu svanīsvāhāstu pañcabhiḥ // 258.044cd //
indrāya ca marudbhyastu parjanyāya bhagāya ca / 258.045ab /
yathāliṅgantu viharellāṅgalantu kṛṣībalaḥ // 258.045cd //
yukto dhānyāya sītāyai sunāsīramathottaraṃ / 258.046ab /
gandhamālyair namaskārair yajedetāś ca devatāḥ // 258.046cd //
pravāpane pralavane khalasītāpahārayoḥ / 258.047ab /
amoghaṅkarma bhavati vardhate sarvadā kṛṣiḥ // 258.047cd //
samudrāditi sūktena kāmānāpnoti pāvakāt / 258.048ab /
viśvānara iti dvābhyāṃ ya ṛgbhyāṃ vahnimarhati // 258.048cd //
sa taratyāpadaḥ sarvā yaśaḥ prāpnoti cākṣayaṃ / 258.049ab /
vipulāṃ śriyamāpnoti jayaṃ prāpnotyanuttamaṃ // 258.049cd //
agne tvamiti ca stutvā dhanamāpnoti vāñchitaṃ / 258.050ab /
prajākāmo japennityaṃ varuṇadaivatatrayaṃ // 258.050cd //
svastyā trayaṃ japet prātaḥ sadā svastyayanaṃ mahat / 258.051ab /
svasti panthā iti procya svastimān vrajate 'dhvani // 258.051cd //
vijigīṣurvanaspate śatrūṇāṃ vyādhitaṃ bhavet / 258.052ab /
striyā garbhapramūḍhāyā garbhamokṣaṇamuttamaṃ // 258.052cd //
||page:442
acchāvadeti sūktañca vṛṣṭikāmaḥ prayiojayet / 258.053ab /
nirāhāraḥ klinnavāsā na cireṇa pravarṣati // 258.053cd //
manasaḥ kāma ity etāṃ paśukāmo naro japet / 258.054ab /
kardamena iti snāyātprajākāmaḥ śucivrataḥ // 258.054cd //
aśvapūrvā iti snāyādrājyakāmastu mānavaḥ / 258.055ab /
rāhite carmaṇi snāyāt brāhmaṇastu yathāvidhi // 258.055cd //
rājā carmaṇi vaiyāghre chāge vaiśyastathaiva ca / 258.056ab /
daśasāhasriko homaḥ pratyekaṃ parikīrtitaḥ // 258.056cd //
āgāra iti sūktena goṣṭhe gāṃ lokamātaraṃ / 258.057ab /
upatiṣṭhedvrajeccaiva yadicchettāḥ sadākṣayāḥ // 258.057cd //
upetitisṛbhīrājño dundubhimabhimantrayet / 258.058ab /
tejo bakañca prāpnoti śatruñcaiva niyacchati // 258.058cd //
tṛṇapāṇirjapetsūktuṃ rakṣoghnaṃ dasyunbhirvṛtaḥ / 258.059ab /
ye ke ca umetyṛcaṃ japtvā dīrghamāyurāpnuyāt // 258.059cd //
jīmūtasūktena tathā senāṅgānyabhimantrayet / 258.060ab /
yadhā liṅgaṃ tato rājā vinihanti raṇe ripūn // 258.060cd //
āgneyeti tribhiḥsūktair dhanamāpnoti cākṣayaṃ / 258.061ab /
amīvaheti sūktena bhūtāni sthāpayenniśi // 258.061cd //
sabādhe viṣame durge bandhā vā nirgataḥ kvacit / 258.062ab /
palāyan vā gṛhīto vā sūktametattathā japet // 258.062cd //
trirātraṃ niyatopoṣya śrāpayet pāyasañcaruṃ / 258.063ab /
tenāhutiśataṃ pūrṇaṃ juhuyāt tryambaketyṛcā // 258.063cd //
||page:443
samuddiśya mahādevaṃ jīvedabdaśataṃ sukhaṃ / 258.064ab /
taccakṣurityṛcā snāta upatiṣṭheddivākaraṃ // 258.064cd //
udyantaṃ madhyagañcaiva dīrghamāyurjijīviṣuḥ / 258.065ab /
indrā someti sūktantu kathitaṃ śatrunāśanaṃ // 258.065cd //
yasya luptaṃ vrataṃ mohādvrātyair vā saṃsṛjetsaha / 258.066ab /
upoṣyājyaṃ sa juhuyāttvamagne vratapā iti // 258.066cd //
ādityetyṛk ca samrājaṃ japtvā vāde jayī bhavet / 258.067ab /
mahīti ca catuṣkeṇa mucyate mahato bhayāt // 258.067cd //
ṛcaṃ mahīti japtvā yadi hy etat sarvakāmānavāpnuyāt / 258.068ab /
dvācatvāriṃśatiṃ caindraṃ japtvā nāśayate ripūn // 258.068cd //
vācaṃ mahīti japtvā ca prāpnotyārogyameva ca / 258.069ab /
śanno bhaveti dvābhyāntu bhuktvānnaṃ prayataḥ śuciḥ // 258.069cd //
hṛdayaṃ pāṇinā spṛṣṭvā vyādhibhir nābhibhūyate / 258.070ab /
uttamedamiti snāto huttvā śatruṃ pramāpayet // 258.070cd //
śannogna iti sūktena hutenānnamavāpnuyāt / 258.071ab /
kanyā vārarṣisūktena digdoṣādvipramucyate // 258.071cd //
yadatya kavyetyudite japte 'vaśyaṃ jagadbhavet / 258.072ab /
yadvāgiti ca japtena vāṇī bhavati saṃskṛtā // 258.072cd //
vāco viditamiti tvetāṃ japan vācaṃ samaśnute / 258.073ab /
pavitrāṇāṃ pavitrantu pāvamānyetyṛco matāḥ // 258.073cd //
vaikhānasā ṛcastriṃśatpavitrāḥ paramā matāḥ / 258.074ab /
||page:444
ṛco dviṣaṣṭiḥ proktāś ca parasvetyṛṣisattama // 258.074cd //
sarvakalmaṣanāśāya pāvanāya śivāya ca / 258.075ab /
svādiṣṭayetisūktānāṃ saptaṣaṣṭirudāhṛtā // 258.075cd //
daśottarāṇyṛcāñcaitāḥ pāvamānyaḥ śatāni ṣaṭ / 258.076ab /
etajjapaṃś ca juhvacca ghoraṃ mṛtyubhayaṃ jayet // 258.076cd //
āpohiṣṭeti vāristho japetpāpabhayārdane / 258.077ab /
pradevanneti niyato japecca marudhanvasu // 258.077cd //
prāṇāntike bhaye prāpte kṣipramāyustu vindati / 258.078ab /
prāveyāmityṛcamekāṃ japecca manasā niśi // 258.078cd //
vyuṣṭāyāmudite sūrye dyūte jayamavāpnuyāt / 258.079ab /
mā pragāmeti mūḍhaś ca panthānaṃ pathi vindati // 258.079cd //
kṣīṇāyuriti manyeta yaṅkañcit suhṛdaṃ priyaṃ / 258.080ab /
yatteyamiti tu snātastasya mūrdhānamālabhet // 258.080cd //
sahasrakṛtvaḥ pañcāhaṃ tenāyurvindate mahat / 258.081ab /
idaṃ medhyeti juhuyāt ghṛtaṃ prājñaḥ sahasraśaḥ // 258.081cd //
paśukāmo gavāṃ goṣṭhe arthakāmaś catuṣpathe / 258.082ab /
vayaḥ suparṇa ity etāṃ japan vai vindate śriyaṃ // 258.082cd //
haviṣyantīyamabhyasya sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate / 258.083ab /
tasya rogā vinaśyanti kāyāgnirvardhate tathā // 258.083cd //
yā oṣadhayaḥ svastyayanaṃ sarvavyādhivināśanaṃ / 258.084ab /
vṛhaspate atītyetadvṛṣṭikāmaḥ prayojayet // 258.084cd //
sarvatreti parā śāntirjñeyā pratirathas tathā / 258.085ab /
sūta sāṃkāśyapannityaṃ prajākāmasya kīrtitaṃ // 258.085cd //
||page:445
ahaṃ rudreti etadvāgmī bhavati mānavaḥ / 258.086ab /
na yonau jāyate vidvān japanrātrīti rātriṣu // 258.086cd //
rātrisūktaṃ japannrātrī rātriṃ kṣemī jayennaraḥ / 258.087ab /
kalpayantīti ca japannityaṃ kṛttvārināśanaṃ // 258.087cd //
āyuṣyañcaiva varcasyaṃ sūktaṃ dākṣāyaṇaṃ mahat / 258.088ab /
uta devā iti japedāmayaghnaṃ dhṛtavrataḥ // 258.088cd //
ayamagne janityetajjapedagnibhaye sati / 258.089ab /
araṇyānītyaraṇyeṣu japettadbhayanāśanaṃ // 258.089cd //
brāhmnīmāsādya sūkte dve ṛcaṃ brāhmīṃ śatāvarīṃ / 258.090ab /
pṛthagadbhirghṛtair vātha medhāṃ lakṣmīñca vindati // 258.090cd //
māsa ity asapatnaghnaṃ saṃgrāmaṃ vijigīṣataḥ / 258.091ab /
brahmaṇo 'gniḥ saṃvidānaṃ garbhamṛtyunivāraṇaṃ // 258.091cd //
apahīti japetsūktaṃ śucirdusvapnanāśanaṃ / 258.092ab /
yenedamiti vaijaptvā samādhiṃ vindate paraṃ // 258.092cd //
mayo bhūrvāta ity etat gavāṃ svastyayanaṃ paraṃ / 258.093ab /
śāmbarīmindrajālaṃ vā māyāmetena vārayet // 258.093cd //
mahītrīṇāmavarostviti pathi svastyayanaṃ japet / 258.094ab /
agnaye vidviṣannevaṃ japecca ripunāśanaṃ // 258.094cd //
vāstoṣpatena mantreṇa yajeta gṛhadevatāḥ / 258.095ab /
japasyaiṣa vidhiḥ prokto hute jñeyo viśeṣataḥ // 258.095cd //
homānte dakṣiṇā deyā pāpaśāntirhutena tu / 258.096ab /
hutaṃ śāmyati cānnena annahemapradānataḥ // 258.096cd //
viprāśiṣastvamoghāḥ syurbahiḥsnānantu sarvataḥ / 258.097ab /
||page:446
siddhārthakā yavā dhānyaṃ payo ghṛtaṃ tathā // 258.097cd //
kṣīravṛkṣāstathedhmantu homā vai sarvakāmadāḥ / 258.098ab /
samidhaḥ kaṇṭhakinyaś ca rājikā rudhiraṃ viṣaṃ // 258.098cd //
abhicāre tathā śailaṃ aśanaṃ śaktavaḥ payaḥ / 258.099ab /
dadhi bhaikṣyaṃ phalaṃ mūlamṛgvidhānamudāhṛtaṃ // 258.099cd //
||ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe ṛgvidhānaṃ nāmāṣṭapañcāśadadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ ||

puṣkara uvāca
yajurvidhānaṃ vakṣyāmi bhuktimuktipradaṃ śṛṇu / 259.001ab /

ājyāhutisahasreṇa devānārādhayedbudhaḥ // 259.002cd //

||page:447
kanyākāmo ghṛtāktāni yugmaśo grathitāni tu / 259.006ab /

sarvavrīhimayīṃ kṛtvā rājñaḥ pratikṛtiṃ dvija // 259.008cd //

tanūnapāgne saditi dūrvāṃ hutvārtivarjitaḥ // 259.015cd //
bheṣajamasīti dadhyājyair homaḥ paśūpasarganut / 259.016ab /
||page:448
tryamvakaṃ yajāmahe homaḥ saubhāgyavardhanaḥ // 259.016cd //
kanyānāma gṛhītvā tu kanyalābhakaraḥ paraḥ / 259.017ab /
bhayeṣu tu japannityaṃ bhayebhyo vipramucyate // 259.017cd //
dhustūrapuṣpaṃ saghṛtaṃ hutvā syāt sarvakāmabhāk / 259.018ab /

ayatno agnirityetat saṃgrāme vijayapradaṃ // 259.020cd //

tilair yavaiś ca dharmajña tathāpāmārgataṇḍulaiḥ // 259.023cd //

||page:449
upadrutānāṃ dharmajña vyādhitānāṃ tathaiva ca // 259.027cd //
marake samanuprāpte ripuje ca tathā bhaye / 259.028ab /

iha gāvaḥ prajyāyadhvamiti puṣṭivivardhanam // 259.032cd //
ghṛtāhutisahasreṇa tathā lakṣmīvināśanaṃ / 259.033ab /
śruveṇa devasya tveti hutvāpāmārgataṇḍulaṃ // 259.033cd //
mucyate vikṛtācchīghramabhicārānna saṃśayaḥ / 259.034ab /

śivo bhavetyagnyutpāte vrīhibhirjuhuyānnaraḥ / 259.035ab /
yāḥ senā iti caitacca taskarebhyo bhayāpaham // 259.035cd //
yo asmabhyamavātīyāddhutvā kṛṣṇatilānnaraḥ / 259.036ab /
sahasraśo 'bhicārācca mucyate vikṛtāddvija // 259.036cd //
annenānnapatetyevaṃ hutvā cānnamavāpnuyāt / 259.037ab /

||page:450
vasanteti ca hutvājyaṃ ādityādvaramāpnuyāt / 259.039ab /

kṛṇudhavaṃ rāja ity etadabhicāravināśanaṃ // 259.046cd //

grāme janapade vāpi marakantu śamannayet // 259.047cd //
rogārto mucyate rogāt tathā duḥkhāttu duḥkhitaḥ / 259.048ab /
||page:451
auḍumbarīś ca samidho madhumānno vanaspatiḥ // 259.048cd //
hutvā sahasraśo rāma dhanamāpnoti mānavaḥ / 259.049ab /

annamakṣayamāpnoti dīrghamāyuś ca vindati / 259.055ab /

||page:452
dūrvāhomena cānyena sarvavyādhivivarjitaḥ // 259.059cd //

saṃgrāme kathitaṃ rāma sarvaśatrunivarhaṇaṃ // 259.060cd //

apāṃ pheneti lājābhirhutvā jayamavāpnuyāt / 259.063ab /

||page:453
viṣṇoḥ krameti mantraś ca rathārohaṇikaḥ paraḥ / 259.070ab /
ājaṅghetīti cāśvānāṃ tāḍanīyamudāhṛtaṃ // 259.070cd //

dundubhya iti cāpyetaddundubhītāḍnaṃ bhavet // 259.071cd //

rathamutpādayecchīghraṃ saṃgrāme vijayapradam / 259.073ab /
ā kṛṣṇeti tathaitasya karmavyāhṛtivadbhavet // 259.073cd //
śivasaṃkalpajāpena samādhiṃ manaso labhet / 259.074ab /
pañcanadyaḥ pañcalakṣaṃ hutvā lakṣmīmavāpnuyāt // 259.074cd //
yadā badhūndakṣāyaṇāṃ mantreṇānena mantritam / 259.075ab /
sahasrakṛtvaḥ kanakaṃ dhārayedripuvāraṇaṃ // 259.075cd //
imaṃ jīvebhya drati ca śilāṃ loṣṭrañcaturdiśaṃ / 259.076ab /
kṣipedgṛhe tadā tasya na syāccaurabhayaṃ niśi // 259.076cd //
parimegāmaneneti vaśīkaraṇamuttamaṃ / 259.077ab /
hantumabhyāgatastatra vaśībhavati mānavaḥ // 259.077cd //
bhakṣyatāmvūlapuṣpādyaṃ mantritantu prayacchati / 259.078ab /

śanno mitra itītyetat sadā sarvatra śāntidaṃ / 259.079ab /
gaṇānāṃ tvā gaṇapatiṃ kṛtvā homañcatuṣpathe // 259.079cd //
vaśīkuryājjagatsarvam sarvadhānyair asaṃśayam / 259.080ab /
||page:454
hiraṇyavarṇāḥ śucayo mantroyamabhiṣecane // 259.080cd //
śanno devīrabhiṣṭaye tathā śāntikaraḥ paraḥ / 259.081ab /
ekacakreti mantreṇa hutenājyena bhāgaśaḥ // 259.081cd //
grahebhyaḥ śāntimāpnoti prasādaṃ na ca saṃśayaḥ / 259.082ab /
gāvo bhaga iti dvābhyāṃ hutvājyaṅgā avāpnuyāt // 259.082cd //

sāmavidhānaṃ
puṣkara uvāca
yujurvidhānaṅkathitaṃ vakṣye sāmnāṃ vidhānakaṃ / 260.001ab /
saṃhitāṃ vaiṣṇavīñjaptvā hutvā syāt sarvakāmabhāk // 260.001cd //
saṃhitāñchāndasīṃ sādhu japtvā prīṇāti śaṅkaraṃ / 260.002ab /
skandīṃ paitryāṃ saṃhitāñca japtvā syāttu prasādavān // 260.002cd //
||page:455
yata indra bhajāmahe hiṃsādoṣavināśanaṃ / 260.003ab /
avakīrṇī mucyate ca agnistigmeti vai japan // 260.003cd //
sarvapāpaharaṃ jñeyaṃ paritoyañca tāsu ca / 260.004ab /
avikreyañca vikrīya japedghṛtavatīti ca // 260.004cd //
ayāno deva saviturjñeyanduḥsvapnanāśanaṃ / 260.005ab /
abodhyagniritimantreṇa ghṛtaṃ rāma yathāvidhi // 260.005cd //
abhyukṣya ghṛtaśeṣeṇa mekhalābandha iṣyate / 260.006ab /
strīṇāṃ yāsāntu garbhāṇi patanti bhṛgusattama // 260.006cd //

somaṃ rājānametena vyādhibhirvipramucyate // 260.007cd //
sarpasāma prayuñjīno nāpnuyāt sarpajambhayaṃ / 260.008ab /
mādya tvā vādyatetyetaddhutvā vipraḥ sahasraśaḥ // 260.008cd //
śatāvarimaṇibaddhvā nāpnuyācchastrato bhayaṃ / 260.009ab /
dīrghatamasorka iti huttvānnaṃ prāpnuyādbahu // 260.009cd //
svamadhyāyantīti japanna mriyeta pipāsayā / 260.010ab /
tvamimā oṣadhī hy etajjaptvā vyādhiṃ na vāpnuyāt // 260.010cd //
pathi devavratañjaptvā bhayebhyo vipramucyate / 260.011ab /
yadindro munaye tveti hutaṃ saubhāgyavardhanaṃ // 260.011cd //
bhago na citra ity evaṃ netrayo rañjanaṃ hitaṃ / 260.012ab /
saubhāgyavardhanaṃ rāma nātra kārya vicāraṇā // 260.012cd //
japendreti vargañca tathā saunbhāgyavardhanaṃ / 260.013ab /
||page:456
pari priyā hi vaḥ kāriḥ kāmyāṃ saṃśrāvayet striyaṃ // 260.013cd //
sā taṅkāmayate rāma nātra kāryā vicāraṇā / 260.014ab /
rathantaraṃ vāmadevyaṃ brahmavarcasavardhanaṃ // 260.014cd //
prāśayedbālakaṃ nityaṃ vacācūrṇaṃ ghṛtaplutaṃ / 260.015ab /
indramidgāthinaṃ japtvā bhavecchrutidharastvasau // 260.015cd //
hutvā rathantarañjaptvā putramāpnotyasaṃśayaṃ / 260.016ab /
mayi śrīriti mantroyaṃ japtavyaḥ śrīvivardhanaḥ // 260.016cd //
vairūpyasyāṣṭakaṃ nityaṃ prayuñjānaḥ śriyaṃ labhet / 260.017ab /
saptāṣṭakaṃ prayuñjānaḥ sarvān kāmānavāpnuyāt // 260.017cd //
gavyeṣuṇeti yo nityaṃ sāyaṃ prātaratantritaḥ / 260.018ab /
upasthānaṃ gavāṃ kuryāttasya syustāḥ sadā gṛhe // 260.018cd //
ghṛtāktantu yavadroṇaṃ vāta āvātu bheṣajaṃ / 260.019ab /
anena vidhivat sarvāṃ māyāṃ vyapohati // 260.019cd //
pradevo dāsena tilān hutvā kārmaṇakṛntanaṃ / 260.020ab /
abhi tvā pūrvapītaye vaṣaṭkārasamanvitaṃ // 260.020cd //
vāsakedhmasahasrantu hutaṃ yuddhe jayapradaṃ / 260.021ab /
hastyaśvapuruṣān kuryādbudhaḥ piṣṭamayān śubhān // 260.021cd //
parakīyānathoddeśya pradhānapuruṣāṃs tathā / 260.022ab /
susvinnān piṣṭakavarān kṣureṇot kṛtya bhāgaśaḥ // 260.022cd //
abhi tvā śūra ṇonumo mantreṇānena mantravit / 260.023ab /
kṛtvā sarṣapatailāktān krodhena juhuyāttataḥ // 260.023cd //
||page:457
etat kṛtvā budhaḥ karma saṃgrāme jayamāpnuyāt / 260.024ab /
gāruḍaṃ vāmadevyañca rathantaravṛhadrathau // 260.024cd //
sarvapāpapraśamanāḥ kathitāḥ saṃśayaṃ vinā //25//ap_260.025ab/
||ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe sāmavidhānaṃ nāma ṣaṣṭyadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ ||
||athaikaṣaṣṭhyadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
atharvavidhānaṃ
puṣkara uvāca
sāmnāṃ vidhānaṃ kathitaṃ vakṣye cātharvaṇāmatha / 261.001ab /
śāntātīyaṃ gaṇaṃ hutvā śāntimāpnoti mānavaḥ // 260.001cd //
bhaiṣajyañca gaṇaṃ hutvā sarvānrogān vyāpohati / 260.002ab /
trisaptīyaṃ gaṇaṃ hutvā sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate // 260.002cd //
kvacinnāpnoti ca bhayaṃ hutvā caivābhayaṅgaṇaṃ / 260.003ab /
na kvacijjāyate rāma gaṇaṃ hutvā parājitaṃ // 260.003cd //
āyuṣyañca gaṇaṃ hutvā apamṛtyuṃ vyapohati / 260.004ab /
