samastāni ca śilpāni kalāḥ sarvāś ca vindati // 375.009cd //
surendrakanyā ity ādyā guṇāś ca pratibhādayaḥ / 375.010ab /
tṛṇavattāntyajed yastu tasya viṣṇuḥ prasīdati // 375.010cd //
aṇimādiguṇaiśvaryaḥ śiṣye jñānaṃ prakāśya ca / 375.011ab /
bhuktvā bhogān yathecchātastanuntyaktvālayāttataḥ // 375.011cd //
tiṣṭhet svātmani vijñāna ānande brahmaṇīśvare/ap_375.012ab/malino hi yathādarśa ātmajñānāya na kṣamaḥ // 375.012cd //
sarvāśrayannije dehe dehī vindati vedanāṃ / 375.013ab /
yogayuktastu sarveṣāṃ yogānnāpnoti vedanāṃ // 375.013cd //
ākāśamekaṃ hi yathā ghaṭādiṣu pṛthag bhavet / 375.014ab /
tathātmaiko hy anekeṣu jalādhāreṣvivāṃśumān // 375.014cd //
brahmakhānilatejāṃsi jalabhūkṣitidhātavaḥ / 375.015ab /
ime lokā eṣa cātmā tasmācca sacarācaraṃ // 375.015cd //
||page:327
gṛddaṇdacakrasaṃyogāt kumbhakāro yathā ghaṭaṃ / 375.016ab /
karoti tṛṇamṛtkāṣṭhair gṛhaṃ vā gṛhakārakaḥ // 375.016cd //
karaṇānyevamādāya tāsu tāsviha yoniṣu / 375.017ab /
mṛjatyātmānamātmaivaṃ sambhūya karaṇāni ca // 375.017cd //
karmaṇā doṣamohābhyāmicchayaiva sa badhyate / 375.018ab /
jñānādvimucyate jīvo dharmād yogī na rogabhāk // 375.018cd //
vartyādhārasnehayogād yathā dīpasya saṃsthitiḥ / 375.019ab /
vikriyāpi ca dṛṣṭvaivamakāle prāṇasaṃkṣayaḥ // 375.019cd //
anantā raśmayastasya dīpavad yaḥ sthito hṛdi / 375.020ab /
sitāsitāḥ kadrunīlāḥ kapilāḥ pītalohitāḥ // 375.020cd //
ūrdhvamekaḥ sthitasteṣāṃ yo bhittvā sūryamaṇḍalaṃ / 375.021ab /
brahmalokamatikramya tena yāti parāṅgatiṃ // 375.021cd //
yadasyānyadraśmiśatamūrdhvameva vyavasthitaṃ / 375.022ab /
tena devanikāyāni dhāmāni pratipadyate // 375.022cd //
ye naikarūpāścādhastādraśmayo 'sya mṛduprabhāḥ / 375.023ab /
iha karmopabhogāya taiś ca sañcarate hi saḥ // 375.023cd //
buddhīndriyāṇi sarvāṇi manaḥ karmendriyāṇi ca / 375.024ab /
ahaṅkāraś ca buddhiś ca pṛthivyādīni caiva hi // 375.024cd //
avyakta ātmā kṣetrajñaḥ kṣetrastyāsya nigadyate / 375.025ab /
īśvaraḥ sarvabhūtasya sannasan sadasacca saḥ // 375.025cd //
buddherutpattiravyaktā tato 'haṅkārasambhavaḥ / 375.026ab /
tasmāt khādīni jāyante ekottaraguṇāni tu // 375.026cd //
||page:328
śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpañca raso gandhaś ca tadguṇāḥ / 375.027ab /
yo yasminnāśritaś caiṣāṃ sa tasminneva līyate // 375.027cd //
sattvaṃ rajastamaś caiva guṇāstasyaiva kīrtitāḥ / 375.028ab /
rajastamobhyāmāviṣṭaś cakravadbhrābhyate hi saḥ // 375.028cd //
anādirādimān yaś ca sa eva puruṣaḥ paraḥ / 375.029ab /
liṅgendriyair upagrāhyāḥ sa vikāra udāhṛtaḥ // 375.029cd //
yato devāḥ purāṇāni vidyopaniṣadas tathā / 375.030ab /
ślokāḥ sūtrāṇi bhāṣyāṇi yaccānyadmāṅbhayaṃ bhavet // 375.030cd //
pitṛyānopavīthyāś ca yadagastyasya cāntaraṃ / 375.031ab /
tenāgnihotriṇo yānti prajākāmā divaṃ prati // 375.031cd //
ye ca dānaparāḥ samyagaṣṭābhiś ca guṇair yutāḥ / 375.032ab /
aṣṭāśītisahasrāṇi munayo gṛhamedhinaḥ // 375.032cd //
punarāvartane vījabhūtā dharmapravartakāḥ / 375.033ab /
saptarṣināgvīthyāś ca devalokaṃ samāśritāḥ // 375.033cd //
tāvanta eva munayaḥ sarvārambhavivarjitāḥ / 375.034ab /
tapasā brahmacaryeṇa saṅgatyāgena medhayā // 375.034cd //
yatra yatrāvatiṣṭhante yāvadāhūtasaṃplavaṃ / 375.035ab /
vedānuvacanaṃ yajñā brahmacaryaṃ tapo damaḥ // 375.035cd //
śraddhopavāsaḥ satyatvamātmano jñānahetavaḥ / 375.036ab /
sa tvāśramair nididhyāsyaḥ samastair evameva tu // 375.036cd //
draṣṭavyastvatha mantavyaḥ śrotavyaś ca dvijātibhiḥ / 375.037ab /
ya evamenaṃ vindanti ye cāraṇyakamāśritāḥ // 375.037cd //
upāsate dvijāḥ satyaṃ śraddhayā parayā yutāḥ / 375.038ab /
||page:329
kramātte sambhavantyarcirahaḥ śuklaṃ tathottaraṃ // 375.038cd //
ayanandevalokañca savitāraṃ savidyutaṃ / 375.039ab /
tatastān puruṣo 'bhyetya mānaso brahmalaukikān // 375.039cd //

||ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe samādhirnāma pañcasaptatyadhikatriśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ

||atha ṣaṭsaptatyadhikatriśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
brahmajñānaṃ
agnir uvāca
brahmajñānaṃ pravakṣyāmi saṃsārājñānamuktaye / 376.001ab /
ayamātmā parṃ brahma ahamasmīti mucyate // 376.001cd //
deha ātmā na bhavati dṛsyatvācca ghaṭādivat / 376.002ab /
prasapte maraṇe dehādātmānyo jñāyate dhruvaṃ // 376.002cd //
dehaḥ sa cedavyavaharedvikāryādisannibhaḥ / 376.003ab /
cakṣurādīnīndriyāṇi nātmā vai karaṇaṃ tvataḥ // 376.003cd //
mano dhīrapi ātmā na dīpavat karaṇaṃ tvataḥ / 376.004ab /
prāṇo 'pyātmā na bhavati suṣupte citprabhāvataḥ // 376.004cd //
jāgratsvapne ca caitanyaṃ saṅkīrṇatvānna budhyate / 376.005ab /
vijñānarahitaḥ prāṇaḥ suṣupte jñāyate yataḥ // 376.005cd //
ato nātmendriyaṃ tasmādintriyādikamātmanaḥ / 376.006ab /
ahaṅkāro 'pi naivātmā dehavadvyabhicārataḥ // 376.006cd //
uktebhyo vyatirikto 'yamātmā sarvahṛdi sthitaḥ / 376.007ab /
sarvadraṣṭā ca bhoktā ca naktamujjvaladīpavat // 376.007cd //
samādhyārambhakāle ca evaṃ sañcintayenmuniḥ / 376.008ab /
yato brahmaṇa ākāśaṃ khādvāyurvāyuto 'nalaḥ // 376.008cd //

apañcīkṛtabhūtebhya āsan pañcīkṛtānyataḥ // 376.009cd //
||page:331
sthūlaṃ śarīraṃ dhyātvāsmāllayaṃ brahmaṇi cintayet / 376.010ab /

etat sthūlaṃ śarīraṃ hi ātmano jñānakalpitaṃ / 376.011ab /
indriyair atha vijñānaṃ dhīrā jāgaritaṃ viduḥ // 376.011cd //

saṃyuktaṃ saptadaśabhirhiraṇyagarbhasaṃjñitaṃ / 376.013ab /
śarīramātmanaḥ sūkṣmaṃ liṅgamityabhidhīyate // 376.013cd //
jāgratsaṃskārajaḥ svapnaḥ pratyayo viṣayātmakaḥ / 376.014ab /
ātmā tadupamānī styāttaijaso hy aprapañcataḥ // 376.014cd //
sthūlasūkṣmaśarīrākhyadvayasyaikaṃ hi kāraṇaṃ / 376.015ab /
ātmā jñānañca sābhāsaṃ tadadhyāhṛtamucyate // 376.015cd //
na sannāsanna sadasadetatsāvayavaṃ na tat / 376.016ab /
nirgatāvayavaṃ neti nābhinnaṃ bhinnameva ca // 376.016cd //
bhinnābhinnaṃ hy anirvācyaṃ bandhasaṃsārakārakaṃ / 376.017ab /
ekaṃ sa brahma vijñānāt prāptaṃ naiva ca karmabhiḥ // 376.017cd //
sarvātmanā hīndriyāṇāṃ saṃhāraḥ kāraṇātmanāṃ / 376.018ab /
buddheḥ sthānaṃ suṣuptaṃ syāttaddvayasyābhimānavān // 376.018cd //
prājña ātmā trayañcaitat makāraḥ praṇavaḥ smṛtaḥ / 376.019ab /
akāraś ca ukāro 'sau makāro hy ayameva ca // 376.019cd //
ahaṃ sākṣī ca cinmātro jāgratsvapnādikasya ca / 376.020ab /
nājñānañcaiva tatkāryaṃ saṃsārādikabandhanaṃ // 376.020cd //
nityaśuddhabandhamuktasatyamānandamadvayaṃ / 376.021ab /
||page:332
brahmāhamasmyahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotirvimukta oṃ // 376.021cd //
ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jñānaṃ samādhirbandhaghātakaḥ / 376.022ab /
ciramānandakaṃ brahma satyaṃ jñānamanantakaṃ // 376.022cd //
ayamātmā parambrahma tad brahma tvamasīti ca / 376.023ab /
guruṇā bodhito jīvo hy ahaṃ brahmāsmi vāhyataḥ // 376.023cd //
so 'sāvādityapuruṣaḥ so 'sāvahamakhaṇḍa oṃ / 376.024ab /
mucyate 'sārasaṃsārādbrahmajño brahma tadbhavet // 376.024cd //

śrībhagavānuvāca
gatāsuragatāsurvā na śocyo dehavānajaḥ / 380.002ab /
ātmājaro 'maro 'bhedyastasmācchokādikaṃ tyajet // 380.002cd //
||page:345
dhyāyato viṣayān puṃsaḥ saṅgasteṣūpajāyate / 380.003ab /
saṅgāt kāmastataḥ krodhaḥ krodhātsammoha eva ca // 380.003cd //
ammohāt smṛtivibhraṃśo buddhināśāt praṇaśyati / 380.004ab /
duḥsaṅgahāniḥ satsaṅgānmokṣakābhī ca kāmanut // 380.004cd //
kāmatyāgādātmaniṣṭhaḥ sthiraprajñastadocyate / 380.005ab /
yā niśā sarvabhūtānāṃ tasyāṃ jāgarti saṃyamī // 380.005cd //
yasyāṃ jāgrati bhūtāni sā niśā paśyato muneḥ / 380.006ab /
ātmanyeva ca santuṣṭastasya kāryaṃ na vidyate // 380.006cd //
naiva tasya kṛte nārtho nākṛte neha kaś canaḥ / 380.007ab /
tattvavittu mahāvaho guṇakarmavibhāgayoḥ // 380.007cd //
guṇā guneṣu vartante iti matvā na sajjate / 380.008ab /
sarvaṃ jñānaplavenaiva vṛjinaṃ santariṣyati // 380.008cd //
jñānāgniḥ sarvakarmāṇi bhasmasāt kurute 'rjuna / 380.009ab /
brahmaṇyādhāya karmāṇi saṅgantyaktvā karoti yaḥ // 380.009cd //
lipyate na sa pāpena padmapatramivāmbhasā / 380.010ab /
sarvabhūteṣu cātmānaṃ sarvabhūtāni cātmani // 380.010cd //
īkṣate yogayuktātmā sarvatra samadarśanaḥ / 380.011ab /
śucīnāṃ śrīmatāṃ gehe yogabhraṣṭo 'bhijāyate // 380.011cd //
na hi kalyāṇakṛt kaściddurgatiṃ tāta gacchati / 380.012ab /
devī hy eṣā guṇamayī mama māyā duratyayā // 380.012cd //
māmeva ye prapadyante māyāmetāntaranti te / 380.013ab /
ārto jijñāsurarthārtho jñānī ca bharatarṣabha // 380.013cd //
caturvidhā bhajante māṃ jñānī caikatvamāsthitaḥ / 380.014ab /
||page:346
akṣaraṃ brahma paramaṃ svabhāvo 'dhyātmamucyate // 380.014cd //
bhūtabhāvodbhavakaro visargaḥ karmasaṃjñitaḥ / 380.015ab /
adhibhūtaṃ kṣarobhāvaḥ puruṣaścādhidaivataṃ // 380.015cd //
adhiyajñohamevātra dehe dehabhṛtāṃ vara / 380.016ab /
antakāle smaranmāñca madbhāvaṃ yātyasaṃśayaḥ // 380.016cd //
yaṃ yaṃ bhāvaṃ smarannante tyajeddehantamāpnuyāt / 380.017ab /
prāṇaṃ nyasya bhruvormadhye ante prāpnoti matparam // 380.017cd //
omityekākṣaraṃ brahmavadan dehaṃ tyajantathā / 380.018ab /
brahmādistambhaparyantāḥ sarve mama vibhūtayaḥ // 380.018cd //
śrīmantaścorjitāḥ sarve mamāṃśāḥ prāṇinaḥsmṛtāḥ / 380.019ab /
ahameko viśvarūpa iti jñātvā vimucyate // 380.019cd //
kṣetraṃ śarīraṃ yo vetti kṣetrajñaḥ sa prakortitaḥ / 380.020ab /
kṣetrakṣetrajñayorjñānaṃ yattajjñānaṃ mataṃ mama // 380.020cd //
mahābhūtānyahaṅkāro buddhiravyaktameva ca / 380.021ab /
indrayāṇi deśaikañca pañca cendriyagocarāḥ // 380.021cd //
icchā dveṣaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṅghātaścetanā dhṛtiḥ / 380.022ab /
etatkṣetraṃ samāsena savikāramudāhṛtaṃ // 380.022cd //
amānitvamadambhitvamahiṃsā kṣāntirārjavam / 380.023ab /
ācāryopāsanaṃ śaucaṃ sthairyamātmavinigrahaḥ // 380.023cd //
indriyārtheṣu vairāgyamanahaṅkāra eva ca / 380.024ab /
janmamṛtyujarāvyādhiduḥkhadoṣānudarśanaṃ // 380.024cd //
āsaktiranabhiṣvaṅgaḥ putradāragṛhādiṣu / 380.025ab /
||page:347
nityañca samacittattvamiṣṭāniṣṭopapattiṣu // 380.025cd //
mayi cānanyayogena bhaktiravyabhicāriṇī / 380.026ab /
viviktadeśasevitvamaratirjanasaṃsadi // 380.026cd //
adhyātmajñānaniṣṭhatvantattvajñānānudarśanaṃ / 380.027ab /
etajjñānamiti proktamajñānaṃ yadato 'nyathā // 380.027cd //
jñeyaṃ yattat pravakṣyāmi yaṃ jñātvāmṛtamaśnute / 380.028ab /
anādi paramaṃ brahma sattvaṃ nāma taducyate // 380.028cd //
sarvataḥ pāṇipādāntaṃ sarvato 'kṣiśiromukham / 380.029ab /
sarvataḥ śrutimalloke sarvamāvṛtya tiṣṭhati // 380.029cd //
sarvendriyaguṇābhāsaṃ sarvendriyavivarjitam / 380.030ab /
asaktaṃ sarvabhṛccaiva nirguṇaṃ guṇabhoktṛ ca // 380.030cd //
vahirantaś ca bhūtānāmacarañcarameva ca / 380.031ab /
sūkṣmatvāttadavijñeyaṃ dūrasthañcāntike 'pi yat // 380.031cd //
avibhaktañca bhūteṣu vibhaktamiva ca sthitam / 380.032ab /
bhūtabhartṛ ca vijñeyaṃ grasiṣṇu prabhaviṣṇu ca // 380.032cd //
jyotiṣāmapi tajjyotistamasaḥ paramucyate / 380.033ab /
jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ jñānagamyaṃ hṛdi sarvasya dhiṣṭhitaṃ // 380.033cd //
dhyānenātmani paśyanti kecidātmānamātmanā / 380.034ab /
anye sāṅkhyena yogena karmayogena cāpare // 380.034cd //
anye tvevamajānanto śrutvānyebhya upāsate / 380.035ab /
tepi cāśu tarantyeva mṛtyuṃ śrutiparāyaṇāḥ // 380.035cd //
sattvātsañjāyate jñānaṃ rajaso lobha eva ca / 380.036ab /
pramādamohau tamaso bhavato jñānameva ca // 380.036cd //
||page:348
guṇā vartanta ity eva yo 'vatiṣṭhati neṅgate / 380.037ab /
mānāvamānamitrāritulyastyāgī sa nirguṇaḥ // 380.037cd //
ūrdhvamūlamadhaḥśākhamaśvatthaṃ prāhuravyayaṃ / 380.038ab /
chandāṃsi yasya parṇāni yastaṃ veda sa vedavit // 380.038cd //
dvau bhūtasargau loke 'smin daiva āsura eva ca / 380.039ab /
ahiṃsādiḥ kṣamā caiva daivīsampattito nṛṇāṃ // 380.039cd //
na śaucaṃ nāpi vācāro hy āsurīsampadoddhavaḥ / 380.040ab /
narakatvāt krodhalobhakāmastasmāttrayaṃ tyajet // 380.040cd //
yajñastapas tathā dānaṃ sattvādyaistrividhaṃ smṛtam / 380.041ab /
āyuḥ sattvaṃ balārogyasukhāyānnantu sāttvikaṃ // 380.041cd //
duḥkhaśokāmayāyānnaṃ tīkṣṇarūkṣantu rājasaṃ / 380.042ab /
amedhyocchiṣṭapūtyannaṃ tāmasaṃ nīrasādikaṃ // 380.042cd //
yaṣṭavyo vidhinā yajño niṣkāmāya sa sāttvikaḥ / 380.043ab /
yajñaḥ phalāya dambhātmī rājasastāmasaḥ kratuḥ // 380.043cd //
śraddhāmantrādividhyuktaṃ tapaḥ śārīramucyate / 380.044ab /
devādipūjāhiṃsādi vāṅmayaṃ tapa ucyate // 380.044cd //
anudvegakaraṃ vākyaṃ satyaṃ svādhyāyasajjapaḥ / 380.045ab /
mānasaṃ cittasaṃśuddhersaunamātsavinigrahaḥ // 380.045cd //
sāttvikañca tapo 'kāmaṃ phalādyarthantu rājasaṃ / 380.046ab /
tāmasaṃ parapīḍāyai sāttvikaṃ dānamucyate // 380.046cd //
deśādau caiva dātavyamupakārāya rājasaṃ / 380.047ab /
ādeśādāvavajñātaṃ tāmasaṃ dānamīritaṃ // 380.047cd //
||page:349
oṃtatsaditi nirdeśo brahmaṇastrividhaḥ smṛtaḥ / 380.048ab /
yajñadānādika karma buktimuktipradaṃ nṛṇāṃ // 380.048cd //
aniṣṭamiṣṭaṃ miśrañca trividhaṃ karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ / 380.049ab /
bhavatyatyāgināṃ pretya na tu sannyāsināṃ kvacit // 380.049cd //
tāmasaḥ karmasaṃyogāt mohātkleśabhayādikāt / 380.050ab /
rājasaḥ sāttviko 'kāmāt pañcaite karmahetavaḥ // 380.050cd //
adhiṣṭhānaṃ tathā kartā karaṇañca pṛthagvidham / 380.051ab /
trividhāś ca pṛthak ceṣṭā daivañcaivātra pañcamaṃ // 380.051cd //
ekaṃ jñānaṃ sāttvikaṃ syāt pṛthag jñānantu rājasaṃ / 380.052ab /
atattvārthantāmasaṃ syāt karmākāmāya sāttvikaṃ // 380.052cd //
kāmāya rājasaṃ karma mohāt karma tu tāmasaṃ / 380.053ab /
sīdhyasiddhyoḥ samaḥ kartā sāttviko rājaso 'tyapi // 380.053cd //
śaṭho 'lasastāmasaḥ syāt kāryādidhīś ca sāttvikī / 380.054ab /
kāryārthaṃ sā rājasī syādviparītā tu tāmasī // 380.054cd //
manodhṛtiḥ sāttvikī syāt prītikāmeti rājasī / 380.055ab /
tāmasī tu praśokādau mukhaṃ sattvāttadantagaṃ // 380.055cd //
sukhaṃ tadrājasañcāgre ante duḥkhantu tāmasaṃ / 380.056ab /
ataḥ pravṛttirbhūtānāṃ yena sarvamidantataṃ // 380.056cd //
svakarmaṇā tamabhyarcya viṣṇuṃ siddhiñca vindati / 380.057ab /
karmaṇā manasā vācā sarvāvasthāsu sarvadā // 380.057cd //
||page:350
brahmādistambhaparyantaṃ jagadviṣṇuñca vetti yaḥ / 380.058ab /
siddhimāpnoti bhagavadbhakto bhāgavato dhruvaṃ // 380.058cd //
||ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe gītāsāro nāmāśītyadhikatriśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ ||
||athaikāśītyadhikatriśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
yamagītā
agnir uvāca
yamagītāṃ pravakṣyāmi uktā yā nāciketase / 381.001ab /
paṭhatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ bhuktyai muktyai mokṣārthināṃ satāṃ // 381.001cd //
yama uvāca
āsanaṃ śayanaṃ yānaparidhānagṛhādikam / 381.002ab /
vāñchatyaho 'timohena susthiraṃ svayamasthiraḥ // 381.002cd //
bhogeṣu śaktiḥ satataṃ tathaivātmāvalokanaṃ / 381.003ab /
śreyaḥ paraṃ manuṣyānāṃ kapilodgītameva hi // 381.003cd //
sarvatra samadarśitvaṃ nirmasatvamasaṅgatā / 381.004ab /
śreyaḥ param manuṣyānāṃ gītaṃ pañcaśikhena hi // 381.004cd //
āgarbhajanmabālyādivayo 'vasthādivedanaṃ / 381.005ab /
śreyaḥ paraṃ manuṣyāṇām gaṅgāviṣṇupragītakaṃ // 381.005cd //
ādhyātmikādiduḥkhānāmādyantādipratikriyā / 381.006ab /
śreyaḥ paraṃ manṣyāṇāṃ janakodgītameva ca // 381.006cd //
abhinnayorbhedakaraḥ pratyayo yaḥ parātmanaḥ / 381.007ab /
tacchāntiparamaṃ śreyo brahmodgītamudāhṛtaṃ // 381.007cd //
||page:351
kartavyamiti yatkarma ṛgyajuḥsāmasaṃjñitaṃ / 381.008ab /
kurute śreyase saṅgān jaigīṣavyeṇa gīyate // 381.008cd //
hāniḥ sarvavidhitsānāmātmanaḥ sukhahaitukī / 381.009ab /
śreyaḥ paraṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ devalodgītamīritaṃ // 381.009cd //
kāmatyāgāttu vijñānaṃ sukhaṃ brahma paraṃ padaṃ / 381.010ab /
kāmināṃ na hi vijñānaṃ sanakodgītameva tat // 381.010cd //
pravṛttañca nivṛttañca kāryaṃ karmaparo 'bravīt / 381.011ab /
śreyasāṃ śreya etaddhi naiṣkarmyaṃ brahma taddhariḥ // 381.011cd //
pumāṃścādhigatajñāno bhedaṃ nāpnoti sattamaḥ / 381.012ab /
brahmaṇā viṣṇusaṃjñena parameṇāvyayena ca // 381.012cd //
jñānaṃ vijñānamāstikyaṃ saubhāgyaṃ rūpamuttamam / 381.013ab /
tapasā labhyate sarvaṃ manasā yadyadicchati // 381.013cd //
nāsti viṣṇusamandhyeyaṃ tapo nānaśanātparaṃ / 381.014ab /
nāstyārogyasamaṃ dhanyaṃ nāsti gaṅgāsamā sarit // 381.014cd //
na so 'sti bāndhavaḥ kaścidviṣṇuṃ muktvā jagadguruṃ / 381.015ab /
adhaścordhaṃ hariścāgre dehendriyamanomukhe // 381.015cd //
ityevaṃ saṃsmaran prāṇān yastyajetsa harirbhavet / 381.016ab /
yattad brahma yataḥ sarvaṃ yatsarvaṃ tasya saṃsthitam // 381.016cd //
agrāhyakamanirdeśyaṃ supratiṣṭhañca yatparaṃ / 381.017ab /
parāparasvarūpeṇa viṣṇuḥ sarvahṛdi sthitaḥ // 381.017cd //
yajñeśaṃ yajñapuruṣaṃ kecidicchanti tatparaṃ / 381.018ab /
kecidviṣṇuṃ haraṃ kecit kecid brahmāṇamīśvaraṃ // 381.018cd //
indrādināmabhiḥ kecit sūryaṃ somañca kālakam / 381.019ab /
||page:352
brahmādistambhaparyantaṃ jagadviṣṇuṃ vadanti ca // 381.019cd //
sa viṣṇuḥ paramaṃ brahma yato nāvartate punaḥ / 381.020ab /
suvarṇādimahādānapuṇyatīrthāvagāhanaiḥ // 381.020cd //
dhyānair vrataiḥ pūjayā ca dharmaśrutyā tadāpnuyāt / 381.021ab /
ātmānaṃ rathinaṃ viddhi śarīraṃ rathameva tu // 381.021cd //
buddhintu sārathiṃ viddhi manaḥ pragrahameva ca / 381.022ab /
indrayāṇi hayānāhurviṣayāṃśceṣugocarān // 381.022cd //
ātmendriyamanoyuktaṃ bhoktetyāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ / 381.023ab /
yastvavijñānavān bhavatyayuktena manasā sadā // 381.023cd //
na satpadamavāpnoti saṃsārañcādhigacchati / 381.024ab /
yastu vijñānavān bhavati yuktena manasā sadā // 381.024cd //
sa tatpadamavāpnoti yasmādbhūyo na jāyate / 381.025ab /
vijñānasārathiryastu manaḥpragrahavānnaraḥ // 381.025cd //
so 'dhvānaṃ paramāpnoti tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam / 381.026ab /
indriyebhyaḥ parā hy arthā arthebhyaś ca paraṃ manaḥ // 381.026cd //
manasastu parā buddhiḥ buddherātmā mahān paraḥ / 381.027ab /
mahataḥ paramavyaktamavyaktātpuruṣaḥ paraḥ // 381.027cd //
puruṣānna paraṃ kiñcit sā kāṣṭhā sā parā gatiḥ / 381.028ab /
eṣu sarveṣu bhūteṣu gūḍhātmā na prakāśate // 381.028cd //
dṛśyate tvagryayā budhyā sūkṣmayā sūkṣmadarśibhiḥ / 381.029ab /
yacchedvāṅmanasī prājñaḥ tadyacchejjñānamātmani // 381.029cd //
jñānamātmani mahati niyacchecchānta ātmani / 381.030ab /
jñātvā brahmātmanoryogaṃ yamādyair brahma sadbhavet // 381.030cd //
||page:353
ahiṃsā satyamasteyaṃ brahmacaryāparigrahau / 381.031ab /
yamāś ca niyamāḥ pañca śaucaṃ santoṣasattapaḥ // 381.031cd //
svādhyāyeśvarapūjā ca āsanaṃ padmakādikaṃ / 381.032ab /
prāṇāyāmo vāyujayaḥ pratyāhāraḥ svanigrahaḥ // 381.032cd //
śubhe hy ekatra viṣaye cetaso yat pradhāraṇaṃ / 381.033ab /
niś calatvāttu dhīmadbhirdhāraṇā dvija kathyate // 381.033cd //
paunaḥpunyena tatraiva viṣayeṣveva dhāraṇā / 381.034ab /
dhyānaṃ smṛtaṃ samādhistu ahaṃ brahmātmasaṃsthitiḥ // 381.034cd //
ghaṭadhvaṃsādyathākāśamabhinnaṃ nabhasā bhavet / 381.035ab /
mukto jīvo brahmaṇaivaṃ sadbrahma brahma vai bhavet // 381.035cd //
ātmānaṃ manyate brahma jīvo jñānena nānyathā / 381.036ab /
jīvo hy ajñānatatkāryamuktaḥ syādajarāmaraḥ // 381.036cd //
agnir uvāca
vaśiṣṭha yamagītoktā paṭhatāṃ bhuktimuktidā / 381.037ab /
ātyantiko layaḥ prokto vedāntabrahmadhīmayaḥ // 381.037cd //
||ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe yamagītā nāmaikāśītyadhikatriśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ ||
||page:354
||atha dvyaśītyadhikatriśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
āgneyapurāṇamāhātmyaṃ
agnir uvāca
āgneyaṃ brahmarūpante purāṇaṃ kathataṃ mayā / 382.001ab /
saprapañcaṃ niṣprapañcaṃ vidyādvayamayaṃ mahat // 382.001cd //
ṛgyajuḥsāmātharvākhyā vidyā viṣṇurjagajjaniḥ / 382.002ab /
chandaḥ śikṣā vyākaraṇaṃ nighaṇṭujyotirākhyakāḥ // 382.002cd //
niruktadharmaśāstrādi mīmāṃsānyāyavistarāḥ / 382.003ab /
āyurvedapurāṇākhyā dhanurgandharvavistarāḥ // 382.003cd //
vidyā saivārthaśāstrākhyā devāntānyā harirmahān / 382.004ab /
ityeṣā cāparā vidyā parividyākṣaraṃ paraṃ // 382.004cd //
yasya bhāvo 'khilaṃ viṣṇustasya no bādhate kaliḥ / 382.005ab /
aniṣṭvā tu mahāyajñānakṛtvāpi pitṛsvadhāṃ // 382.005cd //
kṛṣṇamabhyarcayanbhaktyā nainaso bhājanaṃ bhavet / 382.006ab /
sarvakāraṇamatyantaṃ viṣṇuṃ dhyāyanna sīdati // 382.006cd //
anyatantrādidoṣottho viṣayākṛṣṭamānasaḥ / 382.007ab /
kṛtvāpi pāpaṃ govindaṃ dhyāyanpāpaiḥ pramucyate // 382.007cd //
taddhyānaṃ yatra govindaḥ sa kathā yatra keśavaḥ / 382.008ab /
tat karma yattadarthīyaṃ kimanyair bahubhāṣitaiḥ // 382.008cd //
na tat pitā tu putrāya na śiṣyāya gururdvija / 382.009ab /
paramārthaṃ paraṃ brūyādyadetatte mayoditaṃ // 382.009cd //
saṃsāre bhramatā labhyaṃ putradāradhanaṃ vasu / 382.010ab /
||page:355
suhṛdaś ca tathaivānye nopadeśo dvijedṛśaḥ // 382.010cd //
kiṃ putradārair mitrair vā kiṃ mitrakṣetravāndhavaiḥ / 382.011ab /
upadeśaḥ paro vandhurīdṛśo yo vimuktaye // 382.011cd //
dvividho bhūtamārgīyaṃ daiva āsura eva ca / 382.012ab /
viṣṇubhaktiparo daivo viparītas tathāsuraḥ // 382.012cd //
etat pavitramārogyaṃ dhanyaṃ duḥsvapnanāśanaṃ / 382.013ab /
sukhaprītikaraṃ nṝṇāṃ mokṣakṛdyattaveritaṃ // 382.013cd //
yeṣāṃ gṛheṣu likhitamāgneyaṃ hi purāṇakaṃ / 382.014ab /
pustakaṃ sthāsyati sadā tatra neśurupadravāḥ // 382.014cd //
kiṃ tīrthair gopradānair vā kiṃ yajñaiḥ kimupoṣitaiḥ / 382.015ab /
āgneyaṃ ye hi śṛṇvanti ahanyahani mānavāḥ // 382.015cd //
ye dadāti tilaprasthaṃ suvarṇasya ca māṣakaṃ / 382.016ab /
śṛṇoti ślokamekañca āgneyasya tadāpnuyāt // 382.016cd //
adhyāyapaṭhanañcāsya gopradānād viśiṣyate / 382.017ab /
ahorātrakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ śrotumicchoḥ praṇaśyati // 382.017cd //
kapilānāṃ śate datte yad bhavejjyeṣṭhapuṣkare / 382.018ab /
tadāgneyaṃ purāṇaṃ hi paṭhitvā phalamāpnuyāt // 382.018cd //
pravṛttañca nivṛttañca dharmaṃ vidyādvayātmakaṃ / 382.019ab /
āgneyasya purāṇasya śāstrasyāsya samaṃ na hi // 382.019cd //
paṭhannāgneyakaṃ nityaṃ śṛṇvan vāpi purāṇakaṃ / 382.020ab /
bhakto vaśiṣṭha manujaḥ sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate // 382.020cd //
nopasargā na cānarthā na caurāribhayaṃ gṛhe / 382.021ab /
tasman syād yatra cāgneyapurāṇasya hi pustakaṃ // 382.021cd //
||page:356
na garbhahāriṇībhītirna ca bālagrahā gṛhe / 382.022ab /
yatrāgneyaṃ purāṇaṃ syānna piśācādikaṃ bhayaṃ // 382.022cd //
śṛṇvanvipro vedavit syāt kṣatriyaḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ / 382.023ab /
ṛddhiṃ prāpnoti vaiśyaś ca śūdraścārogyamṛcchati // 382.023cd //
yaḥ paṭhetśṛṇuyānnityaṃ samadṛgviṣṇumānasaḥ / 382.024ab /
brahmāgneyaṃ purāṇaṃ sattatra naśyantyupadravāḥ // 382.024cd //
divyāntarīkṣabhaumādyā duḥsvapnādyabhicārakāḥ / 382.025ab /
yaccānyadduritaṃ kiñcittatsarvaṃ hanti keśavaḥ // 382.025cd //
paṭhataḥ śṛṇvataḥ puṃsaḥ pustakaṃ yajato mahat / 382.026ab /
āgneyaṃ śrīpurāṇaṃ hi hemante yaḥ śṛṇoti vai // 382.026cd //
prapūjya gandhapuṣpādhyair agniṣṭomaphalaṃ labhet / 382.027ab /
śiśire puṇḍarīkasya vasante cāśvamedhajam // 382.027cd //
grīṣme tu vājapeyasya rājasūyasya varṣati / 382.028ab /
gosahasrasya śaradi phalaṃ tatpaṭhato hy ṛtau // 382.028cd //
āgneyaṃ hi purāṇaṃ yo bhaktyāgre paṭhete hareḥ / 382.029ab /
so 'rcayecca vasiṣṭheha jñānayajñena keśavam // 382.029cd //
yasyāgneyapurāṇasya pustakaṃ tasya vai jayaḥ / 382.030ab /
likhitaṃ pūjitaṃ gehe bhuktirmuktiḥ kare 'sti hi // 382.030cd //
iti kālāgnirūpeṇa gītaṃ me hariṇā purā / 382.031ab /
āgneyaṃ hi purāṇaṃ vai brahmavidyādvayāspadam / 382.031cd /
vidyādvayaṃ vasiṣṭhedaṃ bhaktebhyaḥ kathayiṣyasi // 382.031ef //
vasiṣṭha uvāca
vyāsāgneyapurāṇaṃ te rūpaṃ vidyādvayātmakaṃ / 382.032ab /
kathitaṃ brahmaṇo viṣṇoragninā kathitaṃ yathā // 382.032cd //
||page:357
sārdhaṃ devaiś ca munibhirmahyaṃ sarvāthadarśakaṃ / 382.033ab /
purāṇamagninā gautamāgneyaṃ brahmasanmitaṃ // 382.033cd //
yaḥ paṭhecchṛṇuyāddhyāsa likhedvā lekhayedapi / 382.034ab /
śrāvayetpāṭhayedvāpi pūjayeddhārayedapi // 382.034cd //
sarvapāpavinirmuktaḥ prāprakāmo divaṃ vrajet / 382.035ab /
lekhayitvā purāṇaṃ yo dadyādviprebhya uttamaṃ // 382.035cd //
sa brahmalokamāpnoti kulānāṃ śatamuddharet / 382.036ab /
ekaṃ ślokaṃ paṭhedyastu pāpapaṅkādvimucyate // 382.036cd //
tasmādvyāsa sadā śrāvyaṃ śiṣyebhyaḥ sarvadarśanaṃ / 382.037ab /
śukādyair munibhiḥ sardhaṃ śrotukāmaiḥ purāṇakaṃ // 382.037cd //
āgneyaṃ paṭhitaṃ dhyātaṃ śubhaṃ syād bhuktimuktidaṃ / 382.038ab /
agnaye tu namastasmai yena gītaṃ purānakaṃ // 382.038cd //
vyāsa uvāca
vasiṣṭhena purā gītaṃ sūtaitatte mayoditaṃ / 382.039ab /
parāvidyāparāvidyāsvarūpaṃ paramaṃ padam // 382.039cd //
āgneyaṃ durlabhaṃ rūpaṃ prāpyate bhāgyasaṃyutaiḥ / 382.040ab /
dhyāyanto brahma cāgneyaṃ purāṇaṃ harimāgatāḥ // 382.040cd //
vidyārthinas tathā vidyāṃ rājyaṃ rājyārthino gatāḥ / 382.041ab /
aputrāḥ putriṇaḥ santi nāśrayā āśrayaṃ gatāḥ // 382.041cd //
saubhāgyārthī ca saubhāgyaṃ mokṣaṃ mokṣārthino gatāḥ / 382.042ab /
likhanto lekhayantaś ca niṣpāpaś ca śriyaṃ gatāḥ // 382.042cd //
śukapailamukhaiḥ sūta āgneyantu purāṇakaṃ / 382.043ab /
rūpaṃ cintaya yātāsi bhuktiṃ muktiṃ na saṃśayaḥ // 382.043cd //
śrāvaya tvañca śiṣyebhyo bhaktebhyaś ca purāṇakam / 382.044ab /
||page:358
sūta uvāca
vyāsa prasādādāgneyaṃ purāṇaṃ śrutamādarāt // 382.044cd //
āgneyaṃ brahmarūpaṃ hi munayaḥ śaunakādayaḥ / 382.045ab /
bhavanto naimiṣāraṇye yajanto harimīśvaraṃ // 382.045cd //
tiṣṭhantaḥ śraddhayā yuktāstasmādvaḥ samudīritam / 382.046ab /
agninā proktamāgneyaṃ purāṇaṃ vedasammitaṃ // 382.046cd //
brahmavidyādvayopetaṃ bhuktidaṃ muktidaṃ mahat / 382.047ab /
nāsmātparataraḥ sāro nāsmātparataraḥ suhṛt // 382.047cd //
nāsmātparataro grantho nāsmātparataro gatiḥ / 382.048ab /
nāsmātparataraṃ śāstraṃ nāsmātparatarā śrutiḥ // 382.048cd //
nāsmātparataraṃ jñānaṃ nāsmātparatarā smṛtiḥ / 382.049ab /
nāsmātparo hy āgamo 'sti nāsmādvidyā parāsti hi // 382.049cd //
nāsmātparaḥ syātsiddhanto nāsmātparamamaṅgalam / 382.050ab /
nāsmātparo 'sti vedāntaḥ purāṇaṃ paramantvidaṃ // 382.050cd //
nāsmātparataraṃ bhūmau vidyate vastu durlabham / 382.051ab /
āgneye hi purāṇe 'smin sarvavidyāḥ pradarśitāḥ // 382.051cd //
sarve matsyāvatārādyā gītā rāmāyaṇantviha / 382.052ab /
harivaṃśo bhāratañca nava sargāḥ pradarśitāḥ // 382.052cd //
āgamo vaiṣṇavo gītaḥ pūjādīkṣāpratiṣṭhayā / 382.053ab /
pavitrārohaṇādīni pratimālakṣaṇādikaṃ // 382.053cd //
prāsādalakṣaṇādyañca mantrā vai bhuktimuktidāḥ / 382.054ab /
śaivāgamastadarthaś ca śākteyaḥ saura eva ca // 382.054cd //
maṇḍalāni ca vāstuś ca mantāṇi vividhāni ca / 382.055ab /
pratisargaścānugīto brahmāṇḍaparimaṇḍalaṃ // 382.055cd //
||page:359
gīto bhuvanakoṣaś ca dvīpavarṣādinimnagāḥ / 382.056ab /
gayāgaṅgāprayāgādi tīrthamāhātmyamīritaṃ // 382.056cd //
jyotiś cakraṃ jyotiṣādi gīto yuddhajayārṇavaḥ / 382.057ab /
manvantarādayo gītāḥ dharmā varṇādikasya ca // 382.057cd //
aśaucaṃ dravyaśuddhiś ca prāyaścittaṃ pradarśitaṃ / 382.058ab /
rājadharmā dānadharmā vratāni vividhāni ca // 382.058cd //
vyavahārāḥ śāntayaś ca ṛgvedādividhānakaṃ / 382.059ab /
sūryavaṃśaḥ somavaṃśo dhanurvedaś ca vaidyakaṃ // 382.059cd //
gāndharvavedo 'rthaśāstraṃ mīmāṃsā nyāyavistaraḥ / 382.060ab /
purāṇasaṃkhyāmāhatmyaṃ chando vyakaraṇaṃ smṛtaṃ // 382.060cd //
alaṅkāro vighaṇḍuś ca śikṣākalpa ihoditaḥ smṛtaḥ / 382.061ab /
naimittikaḥ prākṛtiko laya ātyantikaḥ // 382.061cd //
vedāntaṃ brahmavijñānaṃ yogo hy aṣṭāṅga īritaḥ / 382.062ab /
stotraṃ purāṇamāhātmyaṃ vidyā hy aṣṭādaśa smṛtāḥ // 382.062cd //
ṛgvedādyāḥ parā hy atra parāvidyākṣaraṃ paraṃ / 382.063ab /
saprapañcaṃ niṣprapañcaṃ brahmaṇo rūpamīritaṃ // 382.063cd //
idaṃ pañcadaśasohasraṃ śatakoṭipravistaraṃ / 382.064ab /
devaloke daivataiś ca purāṇaṃ paṭhyate sadā // 382.064cd //
lokānāṃ hitakāmena saṃkṣipyodgītamagninā / 382.065ab /
sarvaṃ brahmeti jānīdhvaṃ munayaḥ śaunakādayaḥ // 382.065cd //
śṛṇuyācchrāvayedvāpi yaḥ paṭhetpāṭhayedapi / 382.066ab /
likhellekhāpayedvāpi yujayetkīrtayedapi // 382.066cd //
purāṇapāṭhakañcaiva pūjayet prayato nṛpaḥ / 382.067ab /
||page:360
gobhūhiraṇyadānādyair vastrālaṅkāratarpaṇaiḥ // 382.067cd //
taṃ saṃpūjya labheccaiva purāṇaśravaṇāt phalaṃ / 382.068ab /
purāṇānte ca vai kuryādavaśyaṃ dvijabhojanaṃ // 382.068cd //
nirmalaḥ prāptasarvārthaḥ sakulaḥ svargamāpnuyāt / 382.069ab /
śarayantraṃ pustakāya sūtraṃ vai patrasañcayaṃ // 382.069cd //
paṭṭikābandhavastrādi dadyād yaḥ svargamāpnuyāt / 382.070ab /
yo dadyādbrahmalokī syāt pustakaṃ yasya vai gṛhe // 382.070cd //
tasyotpātabhayaṃ nāsti bhuktimuktimavāpnuyāt / 382.071ab /
yūyaṃ samarata cāgneyaṃ purāṇaṃ rūpamaiśvaraṃ / 382.071cd /
sūto gataḥ pujitastaiḥ śaunakādyā hariṃ yāyaḥ // 382.071ef //
||ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe āgneyapurāṇamāhātmyaṃ nāma dvyaśītyadhikatriśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ ||
